  3139                                  
  3140                                  ;SR; WIN386 support
  3141                                  
  3142                                  ; WIN386 instance data structure
  3143                                  ;
  3144                                  ; Here is a Win386 startup info structure which we set up and to which
  3145                                  ; we return a pointer when Win386 initializes.
  3146                                  
  3147 0000083B 0300                    Win386_SI:	db 3, 0			; SI_Version
  3148                                  					; Startup Info for Win386
  3149 0000083D 00000000                SI_Next:	dd 0			; pointer to next info structure
  3150 00000841 00000000                		dd 0			; a field we don't need
  3151 00000845 00000000                		dd 0			; another field	we don't need
  3152 00000849 [4D08]                  SI_Instance:	dw Instance_Table
  3153 0000084B 7000                    		dw 70h	; Bios_Data	; far pointer to instance table
  3154                                  
  3155                                  ; This table gives Win386 the instance data in the BIOS and ROM-BIOS data
  3156                                  ; areas. Note that the address and size of the hardware stacks must
  3157                                  ; be calculated and inserted at boot time.
  3158                                  
  3159 0000084D 00005000                Instance_Table:	dw 0, 50h		; print	screen status...
  3160 00000851 0200                    		dw 2			; ... 2	bytes
  3161 00000853 0E005000                		dw 0Eh,	50h		; ROM Basic data...
  3162 00000857 1400                    		dw 14h			; ... 14H bytes
  3163 00000859 [0C00]                  		dw altah		; a con	device buffer...
  3164 0000085B 7000                    		dw 70h			; Bios_Data segment
  3165 0000085D 0100                    		dw 1			; ... 1 byte
  3166                                  
  3167                                  NextStack:
  3168                                  
  3169                                  ; NOTE:  If stacks are disabled by STACKS=0,0, the following
  3170                                  ;	instance items WILL NOT be filled in by SYSINIT.
  3171                                  ;	That's just fine as long as these are the last items
  3172                                  ;	in the instance list since the first item is initialized
  3173                                  ;	to 0000 at load time.
  3174                                  
  3175 0000085F 00000000                		dw 0, 0			; pointer to next stack	to be used...
  3176 00000863 0200                    		dw 2			; ... 2 bytes
  3177 00000865 00000000                IT_StackLoc:	dd 0			; location of hardware stacks
  3178 00000869 0000                    IT_StackSize:	dw 0			; size of hardware stacks
  3179 0000086B 00000000                		dd 0			; terminate the	instance table

  3186                                  ;This routine was originally in BIOS_CODE but this causes a lot of problems
  3187                                  ;when we call it including checking of A20. The code being only about 
  3188                                  ;30 bytes, we might as well put it in BIOS_DATA
  3189                                  
  3190                                  V86_Crit_SetFocus:

  3192 00000871 06                      		push	es
  3193 00000872 53                      		push	bx
  3194 00000873 50                      		push	ax
  3195 00000874 31FF                    		xor	di, di
  3196 00000876 8EC7                    		mov	es, di
  3197 00000878 BB1500                  		mov	bx, 15h		; Device ID of DOSMGR device
  3198 0000087B B88416                  		mov	ax, 1684h	; Get API entry	point
  3199 0000087E CD2F                    		int	2Fh		; - Multiplex -	MS WINDOWS - GET DEVICE	API ENTRY POINT
  3200                                  					; BX = virtual device (VxD) ID,	ES:DI =	0000h:0000h
  3201                                  					; Return: ES:DI	-> VxD API entry point,	or 0:0 if the VxD does not support an API
  3202 00000880 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  3203 00000882 09F8                    		or	ax, di
  3204 00000884 740A                    		jz	short Skip	; Here,	es:di is address of API	routine.
  3205                                  					; Set up stack frame to	simulate a call.
  3206 00000886 0E                      		push	cs
  3207                                  		;;mov	ax,offset Skip
  3208                                  		;mov	ax,Skip
  3209                                  		;push	ax
  3210                                  		; 08/10/2023
  3211 00000887 68[9008]                		push	Skip
  3212 0000088A 06                      		push	es
  3213 0000088B 57                      		push	di		; API far call address
  3214 0000088C B80100                  		mov	ax,1		; SetFocus function number
  3215 0000088F CB                      		retf			; do the call
  3216                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3217                                  
  3218                                  Skip:					
  3219 00000890 58                      		pop	ax
  3220 00000891 5B                      		pop	bx
  3221 00000892 07                      		pop	es
  3222 00000893 5F                      		pop	di
  3223 00000894 CB                      		retf
  3224

  3498                                  
  3499                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3500                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3501                                  ;***************************************************************************
  3502                                  
  3503                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3504                                  
  3505                                  ;***	ibm_disk_io - main routine, fixes at rom bug
  3506                                  ;
  3507                                  ;	entry:	(ah) = function, 02 or 0a for read.
  3508                                  ;		(dl) = drive number (80h or 81h).
  3509                                  ;		(dh) = head number.
  3510                                  ;		(ch) = cylinder number.
  3511                                  ;		(cl) = sector number (high 2 bits has cylinder number).
  3512                                  ;		(al) = number of sectors.
  3513                                  ;		(es:bx) = address of read buffer.
  3514                                  ;		for more on register contents see rom bios listing.
  3515                                  ;		stack set up for return by an iret.
  3516                                  ;
  3517                                  ;	exit:	(ah) = status of current operation.
  3518                                  ;		(cy) = 1 if failed, 0 if successful.
  3519                                  ;		for other register contents see rom bios listing.
  3520                                  ;
  3521                                  ;	uses:	
  3522                                  ;
  3523                                  ;
  3524                                  ;	warning: uses old13 vector for non-read calls.
  3525                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3526                                  ;		does segment arithmatic.
  3527                                  ;
  3528                                  ;	effects: performs disk i/o operation.
  3529                                  
  3530                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3531                                  ; 28/05/2019
  3532                                  cmd_block equ 42h ; ROMBIOS DATA segment (40h) offset 42h ; 13/12/2022
  3533                                  
  3534                                  ;* offsets into cmd_block for registers
  3535                                  
  3536                                  pre_comp equ 0	;write pre-compensation
  3537                                  sec_cnt	 equ 1	;sector count
  3538                                  sec_num	 equ 2	;sector number
  3539                                  cyl_low	 equ 3	;cylinder number, low part
  3540                                  cyl_high equ 4	;cylinder number, high part
  3541                                  drv_head equ 5	;drive/head (bit 7 = ecc mode, bit 5 = 512 byte sectors, 
  3542                                  		;            bit 4 = drive number, bits 3-0 have head number)
  3543                                  cmd_reg  equ 6	;command register
  3544                                  
  3545                                  ; 01/10/2022
  3546                                  disk_status1	equ 74h
  3547                                  hf_num		equ 75h
  3548                                  control_byte	equ 76h
  3549                                  
  3550                                  ; 30/12/2022
  3551                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:12DEh)
  3552                                  
  3553                                  ibm_disk_io:				
  3554 0000127C 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h		; main routine,	fixes at rom bug
  3555 0000127F 720A                    		jb	short atd1	; pass through floppy disk calls. 
  3556 00001281 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3557 00001284 740A                    		jz	short atd2	; intercept call 02 (read sectors).
  3558 00001286 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 0Ah
  3559 00001289 7405                    		jz	short atd2	; and call 0Ah (read long).
  3560                                  atd1:
  3561 0000128B 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]					
  3562                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13	; use rom int 13h handler
  3563                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3564                                  
  3565                                  atd2:					
  3566 00001290 53                      		push	bx
  3567 00001291 51                      		push	cx
  3568 00001292 52                      		push	dx
  3569 00001293 57                      		push	di
  3570 00001294 1E                      		push	ds
  3571 00001295 06                      		push	es
  3572 00001296 50                      		push	ax
  3573 00001297 B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h		; bioseg (rombios data segment)
  3574                                  					; establish bios segment addressing
  3575 0000129A 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  3576                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3577 0000129C C606740000              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 0
  3578                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 0 ; [disk_status1]
  3579                                  					; initially no error code.
  3580 000012A1 80E27F                  		and	dl, 7Fh		; mask to hard disk number
  3581 000012A4 3A167500                		cmp	dl, [hf_num]
  3582                                  		;cmp	dl, ds:75h	; [hf_num] ; 40h:75h
  3583 000012A8 7207                    		jb	short atd3	; disk number in range
  3584                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 1 ; bad_disk
  3585 000012AA C606740001              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 1
  3586 000012AF EB20                    		jmp	short atd4	; disk number out of range error,
  3587                                  					; return
  3588                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3589                                  
  3590                                  atd3:					
  3591 000012B1 53                      		push	bx
  3592 000012B2 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  3593 000012B4 C1EB04                  		shr	bx, 4		; make es:bx to seg:000x form.
  3594 000012B7 01D8                    		add	ax, bx
  3595 000012B9 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  3596 000012BB 5B                      		pop	bx
  3597 000012BC 83E30F                  		and	bx, 0Fh
  3598 000012BF 0E                      		push	cs
  3599 000012C0 E8DF00                  		call	check_dma
  3600 000012C3 720C                    		jb	short atd4	; abort if dma across segment boundary
  3601 000012C5 58                      		pop	ax
  3602 000012C6 50                      		push	ax
  3603 000012C7 E81A00                  		call	setcmd		; set up command block for disk op
  3604 000012CA BAF603                  		mov	dx, 3F6h	; hf_reg_port 
  3605 000012CD EE                      		out	dx, al		; write out command modifier
  3606 000012CE E86B00                  		call	docmd		; carry out command
  3607                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3608                                  
  3609                                  atd4:	
  3610                                  
  3611                                  ;  new code - let logical or clear carry and then set carry if ah!=0
  3612                                  ;	      and save a couple bytes while were at it.
  3613                                  				
  3614 000012D1 58                      		pop	ax
  3615                                  		;mov	ah, ds:74h	; [disk_status1]
  3616 000012D2 8A267400                		mov	ah, [disk_status1]
  3617 000012D6 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  3618 000012D8 7401                    		jz	short atd5
  3619 000012DA F9                      		stc
  3620                                  atd5:					
  3621 000012DB 07                      		pop	es
  3622 000012DC 1F                      		pop	ds
  3623 000012DD 5F                      		pop	di
  3624 000012DE 5A                      		pop	dx
  3625 000012DF 59                      		pop	cx
  3626 000012E0 5B                      		pop	bx
  3627 000012E1 CA0200                  		retf	2		; far return, dropping flags
  3628                                  
  3629                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3630                                  
  3631                                  ;***	setcmd - set up cmd_block for the disk operation
  3632                                  ;
  3633                                  ;	entry:	(ds) = bios data segment.
  3634                                  ;		(es:bx) in seg:000x form.
  3635                                  ;		other registers as in int 13h call
  3636                                  ;	
  3637                                  ;	exit:	cmd_block set up for disk read call.
  3638                                  ;		control_byte set up for disk operation.
  3639                                  ;		(al) = control byte modifier
  3640                                  ;
  3641                                  ;	sets the fields of cmd_block using the register contents
  3642                                  ;	and the contents of the disk parameter block for the given drive.
  3643                                  ;
  3644                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3645                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3646                                  
  3647                                  setcmd:		; proc near		
  3648                                  		;mov	ds:43h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3649                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3650 000012E4 A24300                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_cnt], al
  3651                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 20h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3652 000012E7 C606480020              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 20h ; assume function 02h (read)
  3653 000012EC 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3654 000012EF 7405                    		jz	short setc1	; cmd_reg = 20h	if function 02h	(read)
  3655 000012F1 C606480022              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 22h
  3656                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 22h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3657                                  					; cmd_reg = 22h	if function 0Ah	(read long)
  3658                                  setc1:					
  3659 000012F6 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3660 000012F8 243F                    		and	al, 3Fh		; mask sector number
  3661                                  		;mov	ds:44h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_num]
  3662                                  		;mov	ds:45h,	ch	; [cmd_block+cyl_low]
  3663 000012FA A24400                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_num], al ; mov [44h],al
  3664 000012FD 882E4500                		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_low], ch ; mov [45h],ch
  3665 00001301 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3666 00001303 C0E806                  		shr	al, 6		; get two high bits of cylinder	number
  3667                                  		;mov	ds:46h,	al	; [cmd_block+cyl_high]
  3668 00001306 A24600                  		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_high], al ; mov [46h],al
  3669 00001309 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
  3670 0000130B C0E004                  		shl	al, 4		; drive	number
  3671 0000130E 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh
  3672 00001311 08E0                    		or	al, ah		; head number
  3673 00001313 0CA0                    		or	al, 0A0h	; set ecc and 512 bytes	per sector
  3674                                  		;mov	ds:47h,	al	; [cmd_block+drv_head]
  3675 00001315 A24700                  		mov	[cmd_block+drv_head], al  ; mov [47h],al 
  3676 00001318 06                      		push	es
  3677 00001319 53                      		push	bx
  3678 0000131A 0E                      		push	cs
  3679 0000131B E85C00                  		call	get_vec
  3680 0000131E 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+fdp_precomp]
  3681                                  			 		; write pre-comp from disk parameters
  3682 00001322 C1E802                  		shr	ax, 2
  3683                                  		;mov	ds:42h,	al	; [cmd_block+pre_comp]
  3684 00001325 A24200                  		mov	[cmd_block+pre_comp], al ; mov [42h],al
  3685                                  					; only use low part
  3686 00001328 268A4708                		mov	al, [es:bx+8]	; [es:bx+fdp_control]
  3687                                  					; control byte modifier
  3688 0000132C 5B                      		pop	bx
  3689 0000132D 07                      		pop	es
  3690                                  		;mov	ah, ds:76h	; [control_byte]
  3691 0000132E 8A267600                		mov	ah, [control_byte] ; mov ah,[76h]
  3692 00001332 80E4C0                  		and	ah, 0C0h	; keep disable retry bits	
  3693 00001335 08C4                    		or	ah, al
  3694                                  		;mov	ds:76h,	ah
  3695 00001337 88267600                		mov	[control_byte], ah ; mov [76h],al
  3696 0000133B C3                      		retn
  3697                                  
  3698                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3699                                  
  3700                                  ;***	docmd - carry out read operation to at hard disk
  3701                                  ;
  3702                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = address for read in data.
  3703                                  ;		cmd_block set up for disk read.
  3704                                  ;
  3705                                  ;	exit:	buffer at (es:bx) contains data read.
  3706                                  ;		disk_status1 set to error code (0 if success).
  3707                                  ;
  3708                                  ;	
  3709                                  ;
  3710                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx), (dx), (di) destroyed.
  3711                                  ;		no check is made for dma boundary overrun.
  3712                                  ;
  3713                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3714                                  ;		performs disk input.
  3715                                  
  3716                                  docmd:		; proc near		
  3717 0000133C 89DF                    		mov	di, bx
  3718 0000133E 0E                      		push	cs
  3719 0000133F E84000                  		call	command
  3720 00001342 7535                    		jnz	short doc3
  3721                                  doc1:					
  3722 00001344 0E                      		push	cs
  3723 00001345 E84200                  		call	waitt		; wait for controller to complete read
  3724 00001348 752F                    		jnz	short doc3
  3725 0000134A B90001                  		mov	cx, 256		; 256 words per sector
  3726 0000134D BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3727 00001350 FC                      		cld			; string op goes up
  3728 00001351 FA                      		cli			; disable interrupts
  3729                                  					; (bug was forgetting this)
  3730                                  
  3731                                  ;	M062 -- some of these old machines have intermittent failures
  3732                                  ;		when the read is done at full speed. Instead of using
  3733                                  ;		a string rep instruction, we'll use a loop. There is
  3734                                  ;		a slight performance hit, but it only affects these
  3735                                  ;		very old machines with an exact date code match, and
  3736                                  ;		it makes said machines more reliable
  3737                                  ;
  3738                                  ;M062	repz	insw		;read in sector
  3739                                  
  3740                                  rsct_loop:				
  3741 00001352 6D                      		insw
  3742 00001353 E2FD                    		loop	rsct_loop
  3743 00001355 FB                      		sti
  3744                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3745 00001356 F606480002              		test	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 02h
  3746                                  		;test	byte ptr ds:48h, 2 ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3747                                  					; (ds =	40h)
  3748 0000135B 7410                    		jz	short doc2	; no ecc bytes to read.
  3749 0000135D 0E                      		push	cs
  3750 0000135E E83100                  		call	wait_drq	; wait for controller to complete read
  3751 00001361 7216                    		jb	short doc3
  3752 00001363 B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes of ecc
  3753 00001366 BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3754 00001369 FA                      		cli
  3755 0000136A F36C                    		rep insb		; read in ecc
  3756 0000136C FB                      		sti
  3757                                  doc2:					
  3758 0000136D 0E                      		push	cs
  3759 0000136E E82900                  		call	check_status
  3760 00001371 7506                    		jnz	short doc3	; operation failed
  3761                                  		;dec	byte ptr ds:43h	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3762 00001373 FE0E4300                		dec	byte [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3763 00001377 75CB                    		jnz	short doc1	; loop while more sectors to read
  3764                                  doc3:					
  3765 00001379 C3                      		retn
  3766                                  
  3767                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3768                                  
  3769                                  ;***	define where the rom routines are actually located
  3770                                  ;	   in the buggy old AT BIOS that we might need to
  3771                                  ;	   install a special level of int13 handler for
  3772                                  
  3773                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3774                                  
  3775                                  romsegment 	equ 0F000h  ; segment
  3776                                  romcommand 	equ 2E1Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3777                                  romwait		equ 2E7Fh   ; offset in romsegment
  3778                                  romwait_drq 	equ 2EE2h   ; offset in romsegment
  3779                                  romcheck_status equ 2EF8h   ; offset in romsegment
  3780                                  romcheck_dma 	equ 2F69h   ; offset in romsegment	
  3781                                  romget_vec	equ 2F8Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3782                                  romfret		equ 0FF65h  ; far return in rom	
  3783                                  
  3784                                  ;***	get_vec - get pointer to hard disk parameters.
  3785                                  ;
  3786                                  ;	entry:	(dl) = low bit has hard disk number (0 or 1).
  3787                                  ;
  3788                                  ;	exit:	(es:bx) = address of disk parameters table.
  3789                                  ;
  3790                                  ;	uses:	ax for segment computation.
  3791                                  ;
  3792                                  ;	loads es:bx from interrupt table in low memory, vector 46h (disk 0)
  3793                                  ;	or 70h (disk 1).
  3794                                  ;	
  3795                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3796                                  ;		this does a direct call to the at rom.
  3797                                  
  3798                                  get_vec:	; proc near		
  3799                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3800                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F8Eh
  3801                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3802 0000137A 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3803 0000137D EA8E2F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romget_vec
  3804                                  
  3805                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3806                                  
  3807                                  ;***	command - send contents of cmd_block to disk controller.
  3808                                  ;
  3809                                  ;	entry:	control_byte 
  3810                                  ;		cmd_block - set up with values for hard disk controller.
  3811                                  ;
  3812                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3813                                  ;		nz if error, zr for no error.
  3814                                  ;
  3815                                  ;
  3816                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3817                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3818                                  ;
  3819                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3820                                  
  3821                                  command:	; proc near		
  3822                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3823                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E1Eh
  3824                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3825 00001382 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3826 00001385 EA1E2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcommand
  3827                                  
  3828                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3829                                  
  3830                                  ;***	waitt - wait for disk interrupt
  3831                                  ;
  3832                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3833                                  ;
  3834                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3835                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3836                                  ;
  3837                                  ;
  3838                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx) destroyed.
  3839                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3840                                  ;		
  3841                                  ;	effects: calls int 15h, function 9000h.
  3842                                  
  3843                                  waitt:		; proc near		
  3844                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3845                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E7Fh
  3846                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3847 0000138A 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3848 0000138D EA7F2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait
  3849                                  
  3850                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3851                                  
  3852                                  ;***	wait_drq - wait for data request.
  3853                                  ;
  3854                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3855                                  ;
  3856                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3857                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3858                                  ;
  3859                                  ;	warning: (al), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3860                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3861                                  
  3862                                  wait_drq:	; proc near		
  3863                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3864                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EE2h
  3865                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3866 00001392 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3867 00001395 EAE22E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait_drq
  3868                                  
  3869                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3870                                  
  3871                                  ;***	check_status - check hard disk status.
  3872                                  ;
  3873                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3874                                  ;
  3875                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3876                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3877                                  ;
  3878                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3879                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3880                                  
  3881                                  check_status:	; proc near		
  3882                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3883                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EF8h
  3884                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3885 0000139A 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3886 0000139D EAF82E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_status
  3887                                  
  3888                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3889                                  
  3890                                  ;***	check_dma - check for dma overrun 64k segment.
  3891                                  ;
  3892                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = addr. of memory buffer in seg:000x form.
  3893                                  ;		cmd_block set up for operation.
  3894                                  ;
  3895                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 - error code.
  3896                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3897                                  ;
  3898                                  ;	warning: does a direct call to the at rom.
  3899                                  
  3900                                  check_dma:	; proc near		
  3901                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3902                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F69h
  3903                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3904 000013A2 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3905 000013A5 EA692F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_dma
  3906                                  
  3907                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3908                                  
  3909                                  endatrom:
  3910                                  
  3911                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3912                                  
  3913                                  ;; M015 -- begin changes
  3914                                  ;;
  3915                                  ;; Certain old COMPAQ '286 machines have a bug in their ROM BIOS.
  3916                                  ;; When Int13 is done with AH > 15h and DL >= 80h, they trash
  3917                                  ;; the byte at DS:74h, assuming that DS points to ROM_DATA.
  3918                                  ;; If our init code detects this error, it will install this
  3919                                  ;; special Int13 hook through the same mechanism that was set
  3920                                  ;; up for the IBM patch above. This code is also dynamically
  3921                                  ;; relocated by MSINIT.
  3922                                  
  3923                                  compaq_disk_io:
  3924 000013AA 80FC15                  		cmp	ah, 15h		; compaq_disk_io proc far
  3925                                  					;
  3926                                  					; the following	label defines the end of the at	rom patch.
  3927                                  					; this is used at configuration	time.
  3928                                  					;
  3929                                  					; warning!!!
  3930                                  					; this code will be dynamically	relocated by msinit
  3931 000013AD 7705                    		ja	short mebbe_hookit ; only deal with functions > 15h
  3932                                  no_hookit:				
  3933                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13
  3934                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3935 000013AF 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]
  3936                                  
  3937                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3938                                  
  3939                                  mebbe_hookit:
  3940 000013B4 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h
  3941 000013B7 72F6                    		jb	short no_hookit
  3942 000013B9 1E                      		push	ds
  3943                                  		
  3944                                  		; 07/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3945                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:1830h
  3946                                  		;push	ax
  3947                                  		;mov	ax, 40h
  3948                                  		;mov	ds, ax
  3949                                  		;pop	ax
  3950 000013BA 6A40                    		push	40h
  3951 000013BC 1F                      		pop	ds
  3952                                  
  3953 000013BD 9C                      		pushf
  3954                                  		;call	cs:Old13
  3955                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3956 000013BE 2EFF1E[0601]            		call	far [cs:Old13]
  3957 000013C3 1F                      		pop	ds
  3958 000013C4 CA0200                  		retf	2
  3959                                  
  3960                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3961                                  
  3962 000013C7 00                      end_compaq_i13hook: db 0			
  3963                                  
  3964                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3965                                  
  3966                                  ; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3967                                  %if 0  
  3968                                  
  3969                                  ; CMOS Clock setting support routines used by MSCLOCK.		
  3970                                  ; Warning!!! This code will be dynamically relocated by MSINIT.
  3971                                  
  3972                                  daycnt_to_day:	; proc far
  3973                                  
  3974                                  ; entry: [daycnt] = number of days since 1-1-80
  3975                                  ;
  3976                                  ; return: ch - century in bcd
  3977                                  ;	  cl - year in bcd
  3978                                  ;	  dh - month in bcd
  3979                                  ;	  dl - day in bcd
  3980                                  
  3981                                  		; 16/10/2022		
  3982                                  		push	word [cs:daycnt] ; save daycnt
  3983                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3984                                  					; # days from 1-1-1980 to 1-1-2000
  3985                                  		jnb	short century20
  3986                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 19
  3987                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 80
  3988                                  		jmp	short years
  3989                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3990                                  		
  3991                                  century20:				
  3992                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 20
  3993                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 0
  3994                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3995                                  					; adjust daycnt
  3996                                  years:					
  3997                                  		xor	dx, dx
  3998                                  		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  3999                                  		mov	bx, 1461	; (366+365*3)
  4000                                  					; # of days in a Leap year block
  4001                                  		div	bx		; AX = # of leap block,	DX = daycnt
  4002                                  		mov	[cs:daycnt], dx	; save daycnt left
  4003                                  		mov	bl, 4
  4004                                  		mul	bl		; AX = # of years. Less	than 100
  4005                                  		add	[cs:base_year], al ; So, ah = 0. Adjust year
  4006                                  		inc	word [cs:daycnt]	; set daycnt to	1 base
  4007                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; daycnt=remainder of leap year	bk
  4008                                  		jbe	short leapyear	; within 366+355+355+355 days.
  4009                                  		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	; if daycnt <= 366, then leap year
  4010                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; else daycnt--, base_year++ ;
  4011                                  		mov	cx, 3		; And next three years are normal
  4012                                  regularyear:				
  4013                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 365	; for(i=1; i>3 or daycnt <=365;	i++)
  4014                                  		jbe	short yeardone	; {if (daycnt >	365)
  4015                                  		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	;   { daycnt -=	365
  4016                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 365	;   }
  4017                                  		loop	regularyear	; }
  4018                                  					;
  4019                                  					; should never fall through loop
  4020                                  leapyear:				
  4021                                  		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 29 ; leap year.
  4022                                  					; change month table.
  4023                                  yeardone:				
  4024                                  		xor	bx, bx
  4025                                  		xor	dx, dx
  4026                                  		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  4027                                  		;mov	si, offset month_tab
  4028                                  		mov	si, month_tab	; 19/10/2022
  4029                                  		mov	cx, 12
  4030                                  months:					
  4031                                  		inc	bl
  4032                                  
  4033                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (if DS=CS, what for CS: prefixes are used !?)
  4034                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:si]
  4035                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (may be to keep code addrs as unchanged/fix!?)
  4036                                  		; ds = cs !? ((ofcourse ds must be same with cs here))
  4037                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 20/03/2019 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  4038                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  4039                                  		
  4040                                  		mov	dl, [si] ; ?	; mov dl, [cs:si]
  4041                                  		cmp	ax, dx		; cmp daycnt for each month till fit
  4042                                  					; dh=0
  4043                                  		jbe	short month_done
  4044                                  		inc	si		; next month
  4045                                  		sub	ax, dx		; adjust daycnt
  4046                                  		loop	months		;
  4047                                  					; should never fall through loop
  4048                                  month_done:				
  4049                                  		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 28
  4050                                  					; restore month table value
  4051                                  		mov	dl, bl
  4052                                  		mov	dh, [cs:base_year]
  4053                                  		mov	cl, [cs:base_century] ; al=day,dl=month,dh=year,cl=cntry
  4054                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  4055                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; convert "day"	to bcd
  4056                                  					; dl = bcd day,	al = month
  4057                                  		xchg	dl, al
  4058                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  4059                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; dh = bcd month, al = year
  4060                                  		xchg	dh, al
  4061                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  4062                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; cl = bcd year, al = century
  4063                                  		xchg	cl, al
  4064                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  4065                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; ch = bcd century
  4066                                  		mov	ch, al
  4067                                  		pop	word [cs:daycnt] ; restore original value
  4068                                  		retf
  4069                                  
  4070                                  enddaycnttoday:	
  4071                                  
  4072                                  %endif
  4073                                  
  4074                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4075                                  
  4076                                  ; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  4077                                  %if 0  
  4078                                  
  4079                                  bin_to_bcd:	; proc far		; real time clock support
  4080                                  
  4081                                  ;convert a binary input in al (less than 63h or 99 decimal)
  4082                                  ;into a bcd value in al. ah destroyed.	
  4083                                  		
  4084                                  		push	cx		
  4085                                  		aam			; al=high digit	bcd, ah=low digit bcd
  4086                                  		mov	cl, 4
  4087                                  		shl	ah, cl		; mov the high digit to	high nibble
  4088                                  		or	al, ah
  4089                                  		pop	cx
  4090                                  		retf
  4091                                  %endif
  4092                                  
  4093                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4094                                  
  4095                                  ; the k09 requires the routines for reading the clock because of the suspend/
  4096                                  ; resume facility. the system clock needs to be reset after resume.
  4097                                  
  4098                                  ; the following routine is executed at resume time when the system
  4099                                  ; powered on after suspension. it reads the real time clock and
  4100                                  ; resets the system time and date, and then irets.
  4101                                  
  4102                                  ; warning!!! this code will be dynamically relocated by msinit.
  4103                                  
  4104                                  	; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  4105                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:183Eh
  4106                                  int_6Ch:
  4107 000013C8 0E                      		push	cs
  4108 000013C9 1F                      		pop	ds
  4109                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0  
  4110 000013CA 803E[0D00]00            		cmp	byte [inHMA], 0
  4111 000013CF 7405                    		jz      short int6c
  4112 000013D1 BB[9007]                		mov     bx, EnsureA20On
  4113 000013D4 FFD3                    		call    bx
  4114                                  int6c:					
  4115                                  		;push	cs
  4116                                  		;pop	ds
  4117 000013D6 8F06[B306]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr]	; pop off return address
  4118 000013DA 8F06[B506]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr+2]
  4119 000013DE 9D                      		popf
  4120 000013DF E81300                  		call	read_real_date	; get the date from the clock
  4121 000013E2 FA                      		cli
  4122 000013E3 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si	; update dos copy of date
  4123 000013E7 FB                      		sti
  4124 000013E8 E8B900                  		call	read_real_time	; get the time from the	rtc
  4125 000013EB FA                      		cli
  4126 000013EC B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  4127 000013EE CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  4128                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  4129                                  					; Return: time of day set
  4130 000013F0 FB                      		sti
  4131                                  		;jmp	int6c_ret_addr	; long jump
  4132                                  		; 16/10/2022
  4133 000013F1 FF2E[B306]              		jmp	far [int6c_ret_addr] ; long jump
  4134                                  
  4135                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4136                                  
  4137                                  ;   read_real_date reads real-time clock for date and returns the number
  4138                                  ;   of days elapsed since 1-1-80 in si
  4139                                  
  4140                                  read_real_date:	; proc near		
  4141 000013F5 50                      		push	ax
  4142 000013F6 51                      		push	cx
  4143 000013F7 52                      		push	dx
  4144 000013F8 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; throw	away clock roll	over
  4145 000013FA CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  4146                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  4147                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  4148                                  					; midnight
  4149                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
  4150 000013FC 5A                      		pop	dx
  4151 000013FD 59                      		pop	cx
  4152 000013FE 58                      		pop	ax
  4153 000013FF 50                      		push	ax
  4154 00001400 53                      		push	bx
  4155 00001401 51                      		push	cx
  4156 00001402 52                      		push	dx
  4157                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 1
  4158                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  4159                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:187Ah
  4160 00001403 C706[BB06]0100          		mov	word [daycnt2], 1
  4161                                  					; REAL TIME CLOCK ERROR	FLAG (+1 DAY)
  4162 00001409 B404                    		mov	ah, 4
  4163 0000140B CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ DATE FROM REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  4164                                  					; Return: DL = day in BCD
  4165                                  					; DH = month in	BCD
  4166                                  					; CL = year in BCD
  4167                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  4168 0000140D 7303                    		jnb	short read_ok
  4169 0000140F E98300                  		jmp	r_d_ret
  4170                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4171                                  
  4172                                  read_ok:
  4173 00001412 882E[B706]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch
  4174 00001416 880E[B806]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl
  4175 0000141A 8836[B906]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh
  4176 0000141E 8816[BA06]              		mov	[bin_date_time+3], dl
  4177                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 2 ; READ OF R-T CLOCK SUCCESSFUL
  4178                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4179                                  		;mov	byte [daycnt2], 2
  4180 00001422 FE06[BB06]              		inc	byte [daycnt2] ; 2
  4181 00001426 E83401                  		call	bcd_verify	; verify bcd values in range
  4182 00001429 726A                    		jb	short r_d_ret	; some value out of range
  4183                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 3
  4184                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4185                                  		;mov	byte [daycnt2], 3
  4186 0000142B FE06[BB06]              		inc	byte [daycnt2] ; 3
  4187 0000142F E8DB00                  		call	date_verify
  4188 00001432 7261                    		jb	short r_d_ret
  4189                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 0
  4190                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4191 00001434 C606[BB06]00            		mov	byte [daycnt2], 0
  4192 00001439 E8A100                  		call	in_bin
  4193 0000143C A0[B806]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1]
  4194 0000143F 98                      		cbw
  4195 00001440 803E[B706]14            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20 ; 20th century?
  4196 00001445 7503                    		jnz	short century_19 ; no
  4197 00001447 83C064                  		add	ax, 100		; add in a century
  4198                                  century_19:				
  4199 0000144A 83E850                  		sub	ax, 80		; subtract off 1-1-80
  4200 0000144D B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; leap year every 4
  4201 0000144F F6F1                    		div	cl		; al= #	leap year blocks, ah= remainder
  4202 00001451 88E3                    		mov	bl, ah		; save odd years
  4203 00001453 98                      		cbw			; zero ah
  4204 00001454 B9B505                  		mov	cx, 1461	; 366+(3*365)
  4205                                  					; # of days in leap year blocks
  4206 00001457 F7E1                    		mul	cx
  4207                                  		;mov	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; SAVE COUNT OF DAYS
  4208                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4209 00001459 A3[BB06]                		mov	[daycnt2], ax
  4210 0000145C 88D8                    		mov	al, bl		; get odd years	count
  4211 0000145E 98                      		cbw
  4212 0000145F 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  4213 00001461 740B                    		jz	short leap_year
  4214 00001463 B96D01                  		mov	cx, 365		; days in year
  4215 00001466 F7E1                    		mul	cx
  4216                                  		;add	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; ADD ON DAYS IN ODD YEARS
  4217                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4218 00001468 0106[BB06]              		add	[daycnt2], ax
  4219 0000146C EB07                    		jmp	short leap_adjustment ;	account	for leap year
  4220                                  					; possibly account for a leap day
  4221                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4222                                  
  4223                                  leap_year:
  4224 0000146E 803E[B906]02            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 2 ; is	month february?
  4225 00001473 7604                    		jbe	short no_leap_adjustment ; jan or feb. no leap day yet.
  4226                                  leap_adjustment:
  4227                                  		;inc	word [cs:daycnt2] ; account for leap day
  4228                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4229 00001475 FF06[BB06]              		inc	word [daycnt2]
  4230                                  no_leap_adjustment:			
  4231 00001479 8A0E[BA06]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+3] ; get days of month
  4232 0000147D 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
  4233 0000147F 49                      		dec	cx		; because of offset from day 1,	not day	0
  4234                                  		;add	[cs:daycnt2], cx ; GET DAYS IN MONTHS PRECEEDING
  4235                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4236 00001480 010E[BB06]              		add	[daycnt2], cx
  4237 00001484 8A0E[B906]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+2] ; get month
  4238                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4239                                  		;xor	ch, ch
  4240 00001488 49                      		dec	cx		; january starts at offset 0
  4241                                  		
  4242                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4243                                  		;shl	cx, 1		; word offset
  4244                                  		;;mov	si, month_table
  4245                                  		;add	si, cx
  4246                                  		;; 16/10/2022
  4247                                  		;; ds must be same with cs here, if so..
  4248                                  		;; what for cs: prefixes are used !?)
  4249                                  		;; mov	ax, [cs:si]
  4250                                  		;; mov	ax, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - BIOSDATA:15D5h)
  4251                                  		;mov	ax, [si]	; mov ax, [cs:si]
  4252                                  		;			; get #	days in	previous months
  4253                                  		;add	[cs:daycnt2], ax
  4254                                  
  4255                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  4256                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:1907h
  4257 00001489 B400                    		mov	ah, 0
  4258 0000148B BE[F604]                		mov	si, month_tab
  4259                                  r_d_sum_loop:
  4260 0000148E AC                      		lodsb
  4261 0000148F 0106[BB06]              		add	[daycnt2], ax
  4262 00001493 E2F9                    		loop	r_d_sum_loop
  4263                                  r_d_ret:
  4264                                  		;mov	si, [cs:daycnt2]
  4265                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4266 00001495 8B36[BB06]              		mov	si, [daycnt2]
  4267 00001499 5A                      		pop	dx
  4268 0000149A 59                      		pop	cx
  4269 0000149B 5B                      		pop	bx
  4270 0000149C 58                      		pop	ax
  4271 0000149D C3                      		retn
  4272                                  
  4273                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4274                                  
  4275                                  r_t_retj:				
  4276 0000149E 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  4277 000014A0 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  4278 000014A2 EB38                    		jmp	short r_t_ret
  4279                                  
  4280                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4281                                  
  4282                                  ; read_real_time reads the time from the rtc. on exit, it has the number of
  4283                                  ; ticks (at 18.2 ticks per sec.) in cx:dx.
  4284                                  
  4285                                  read_real_time:	; proc near		
  4286 000014A4 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  4287 000014A6 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  4288                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  4289                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  4290                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  4291 000014A8 72F4                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4292 000014AA 882E[B706]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch ; hours
  4293 000014AE 880E[B806]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl ; minutes
  4294 000014B2 8836[B906]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh ; seconds
  4295 000014B6 C606[BA06]00            		mov	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; unused for time
  4296 000014BB E89F00                  		call	bcd_verify
  4297 000014BE 72DE                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4298 000014C0 E88500                  		call	time_verify
  4299 000014C3 72D9                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4300 000014C5 E81500                  		call	in_bin		; from bcd to bin
  4301 000014C8 8A2E[B706]              		mov	ch, [bin_date_time]
  4302 000014CC 8A0E[B806]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+1]
  4303 000014D0 8A36[B906]              		mov	dh, [bin_date_time+2]
  4304 000014D4 8A16[BA06]              		mov	dl, [bin_date_time+3]
  4305                                  		; 16/10/2022
  4306                                  		; 17/09/2022
  4307                                  		; 31/05/2019
  4308 000014D8 FF1E[C106]              		call	far [ttticks] 
  4309                                  		;call	dword ptr ttticks ; note: indirect far call
  4310                                  					; cx:dx	= number of ticks
  4311                                  					; (at 18.2 ticks per sec.)
  4312                                  r_t_ret:				
  4313 000014DC C3                      		retn
  4314                                  
  4315                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  4316                                  
  4317                                  ;   in_bin converts bin_date_time values from bcd to bin
  4318                                  
  4319                                  in_bin:		; proc near
  4320 000014DD A0[B706]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time] ; century or hours
  4321 000014E0 E81F00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4322 000014E3 A2[B706]                		mov	[bin_date_time], al
  4323 000014E6 A0[B806]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1] ; years or minutes
  4324 000014E9 E81600                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4325 000014EC A2[B806]                		mov	[bin_date_time+1], al
  4326 000014EF A0[B906]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+2] ; months or seconds
  4327 000014F2 E80D00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4328 000014F5 A2[B906]                		mov	[bin_date_time+2], al
  4329 000014F8 A0[BA06]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+3] ; days (not used for time)
  4330 000014FB E80400                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4331 000014FE A2[BA06]                		mov	[bin_date_time+3], al
  4332 00001501 C3                      		retn
  4333                                  
  4334                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  4335                                  
  4336                                  ;   bcd_to_bin converts two bcd nibbles in al (value <= 99.) to
  4337                                  ;   a binary representation in al
  4338                                  ;   ah is destroyed
  4339                                  
  4340                                  bcd_to_bin:	; proc near
  4341 00001502 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4342 00001504 240F                    		and	al, 0Fh
  4343 00001506 B104                    		mov	cl, 4
  4344 00001508 D2EC                    		shr	ah, cl
  4345 0000150A D50A                    		aad
  4346 0000150C C3                      		retn
  4347                                  
  4348                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4349                                  
  4350                                  ;   date_verify loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4351                                  ;   in bin_date_time
  4352                                  
  4353                                  date_verify:	; proc near
  4354 0000150D 803E[B706]20            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20h ; century check
  4355 00001512 7732                    		ja	short date_error
  4356 00001514 740E                    		jz	short century_20 ; jmp in 21th century
  4357 00001516 803E[B706]19            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 19h ; century check
  4358                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4359                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4360 0000151B 722A                    		jb	short date_err2
  4361 0000151D 803E[B806]80            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 80h ; year check
  4362                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4363                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4364 00001522 7223                    		jb	short date_err2
  4365                                  century_20:
  4366 00001524 803E[B806]99            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 99h ; year check
  4367 00001529 771B                    		ja	short date_error
  4368 0000152B 803E[B906]12            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 12h ; month check
  4369 00001530 7714                    		ja	short date_error
  4370 00001532 803E[B906]00            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 0
  4371                                  		;jbe	short date_error
  4372 00001537 760D                    		jna	short date_error
  4373 00001539 803E[BA06]31            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 31h ; day check
  4374 0000153E 7706                    		ja	short date_error
  4375                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; day check
  4376                                  		;;jbe	short date_error
  4377                                  		;jna	short date_error
  4378                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4379                                  		; cf=0
  4380                                  		;clc
  4381                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4382 00001540 803E[BA06]01            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 1 ; day check
  4383 00001545 C3                      		retn
  4384                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4385                                  
  4386                                  date_error:
  4387 00001546 F9                      		stc
  4388                                  date_err2:
  4389 00001547 C3                      		retn
  4390                                  
  4391                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4392                                  
  4393                                  ; time_verify very loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4394                                  ; in bin_date_time
  4395                                  
  4396                                  time_verify:	; proc near
  4397 00001548 803E[B706]24            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 24h ; hour check
  4398 0000154D 770C                    		ja	short time_error
  4399 0000154F 803E[B806]59            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 59h ; minute check
  4400 00001554 7705                    		ja	short time_error
  4401                                  		; 12/12/2022h
  4402                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 59h ; second check
  4403                                  		;ja	short time_error
  4404                                  		;clc
  4405                                  		;retn
  4406                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4407 00001556 803E[B906]5A            		cmp	byte  [bin_date_time+2], 5Ah	
  4408                                  time_error:
  4409                                  bv_error:
  4410 0000155B F5                      		cmc	; cf=0 -> cf=1, cf=1 -> cf=0
  4411 0000155C C3                      		retn
  4412                                  
  4413                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4414                                  
  4415                                  ;time_error:				
  4416                                  		;stc
  4417                                  		;retn
  4418                                  
  4419                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4420                                  
  4421                                  ;   bcd_verify checks values in bin_date_time to be valid
  4422                                  ;   bcd numerals.  carry set if any nibble out of range
  4423                                  
  4424                                  bcd_verify:	; proc near
  4425 0000155D B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes to check
  4426 00001560 BB[B706]                		mov	bx, bin_date_time
  4427                                  bv_loop:
  4428 00001563 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; get a	bcd number (0..99)
  4429 00001565 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4430 00001567 250FF0                  		and	ax, 0F00Fh	; 10's place in high ah, 1's in al
  4431                                  					; is 1's place in range?
  4432 0000156A 3C0A                    		cmp	al, 10
  4433 0000156C 77ED                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4434 0000156E D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4435 00001570 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4436 00001572 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4437 00001574 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4438 00001576 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh		; get rid of any erroneous bits
  4439 00001579 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 10		; is 10's place in range
  4440 0000157C 77DD                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4441 0000157E 43                      		inc	bx		; next byte
  4442 0000157F 49                      		dec	cx
  4443 00001580 75E1                    		jnz	short bv_loop
  4444 00001582 F8                      		clc			; set success flag
  4445 00001583 C3                      		retn
  4446                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4447                                  
  4448                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4449                                  ;bv_error:
  4450                                  		;stc			; set error flag
  4451                                  		;retn
  4452                                  
  4453                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4454                                  
  4455                                  endk09:

  4457                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4458                                  
  4459                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4460                                  ;									:
  4461                                  ;	System initialization						:
  4462                                  ;									:
  4463                                  ;	The entry conditions are established by the bootstrap		:
  4464                                  ;	loader and are considered unknown. The following jobs		:
  4465                                  ;	will be performed by this module:				:
  4466                                  ;									:
  4467                                  ;	1.	All device initialization is performed			:
  4468                                  ;	2.	A local stack is set up and DS:SI are set		:
  4469                                  ;		to point to an initialization table. Then		:
  4470                                  ;		an inter-segment call is made to the first		:
  4471                                  ;		byte of the dos 					:
  4472                                  ;	3.	Once the dos returns from this call the ds		:
  4473                                  ;		register has been set up to point to the start		:
  4474                                  ;		of free memory. The initialization will then		:
  4475                                  ;		load the command program into this area 		:
  4476                                  ;		beginning at 100 hex and transfer control to		:
  4477                                  ;		this program.						:
  4478                                  ;									:
  4479                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4480                                  
  4481                                  ; 01/10/2022
  4482                                  ; 08/01/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  4483                                  
  4484                                  ; drvfat must be the first location of freeable space!
  4485                                  
  4486                                  ; 22/12/2022
  4487                                  align 2
  4488                                  		;db 90h
  4489                                  
  4490                                  ; 30/12/2022
  4491                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:16D6h)
  4492                                  
  4493 00001584 0000                    drvfat:		dw 0			; drive	and fat	id of dos
  4494 00001586 0000                    bios_l:		dw 0			; first	sector of data (low word)
  4495 00001588 0000                    bios_h:		dw 0			; first	sector of data (high word)
  4496 0000158A 0000                    doscnt:		dw 0			; how many sectors to read
  4497 0000158C 00                      fbigfat:	db 0			; flags	for drive
  4498 0000158D 0000                    fatloc:		dw 0			; seg addr of fat sector
  4499 0000158F 0000                    init_bootseg:	dw 0			; seg addr of buffer for reading boot record
  4500 00001591 80                      rom_drv_num:	db 80h			; rom drive number
  4501 00001592 0002                    md_sectorsize:	dw 200h			; used by get_fat_sector proc.

  4739                                  
  4740                                  ;	entry point to call utility functions in Bios_Code. At this time,
  4741                                  ;	  we aren't doing any A20 switching. During MSINIT time Bios_Code
  4742                                  ;	  will not yet be moved to its final resting place, so we know
  4743                                  ;	  it'll be low.
  4744                                  ;
  4745                                  ;	to use this function, do a "push cs" and load bp with the offset of
  4746                                  ;	  the function you want to call in Bios_Code. This routine will
  4747                                  ;	  push the address of a retf in Bios_Code onto the stack which
  4748                                  ;	  will get executed when the utility function finishes. It will
  4749                                  ;	  then transfer control to Bios_Code:bp using a couple of pushes
  4750                                  ;	  and a retf
  4751                                  
  4752                                  ; 16/10/2022
  4753                                  ;BC_RETF equ bc_retf - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  4754                                  ; 09/12/2022
  4755                                  BC_RETF equ bc_retf
  4756                                  
  4757                                  addr_of_bcretf:	;dw 0C8h		; dw bc_retf
  4758                                  					; 2C7h:0C8h = 70h:2638h
  4759 0000161B [CA00]                  		dw BC_RETF
  4760                                  
  4761                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4762                                  
  4763                                  call_bios_code:	; proc far			
  4764 0000161D 2EFF36[1B16]            		push	word [cs:addr_of_bcretf] 
  4765                                  					; set up near return to far return
  4766 00001622 2EFF36[BF06]            		push	word [cs:cdev+2] ; push Bios_Code segment
  4767 00001627 55                      		push	bp		; save offset of utility function
  4768 00001628 CB                      		retf			; far jump to (DOS)BIOS code
  4769
