  7728                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  7729                                  					; Return: AH = status
  7730                                  got_end_of_bds_chain:	; 18/12/2022
  7731 00001FBE C3                      		retn
  7732                                  
  7733                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7734                                  
  7735                                  ; al = device number
  7736                                  
  7737                                  aux_init:
  7738 00001FBF 98                      		cbw
  7739 00001FC0 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  7740                                  		;mov	al, 0A3h	; RSINIT ; 0A3h
  7741                                  					; 2400,n,1,8 (msequ.inc)
  7742                                  		;mov	ah, 0
  7743                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7744 00001FC2 B8A300                  		mov	ax, 00A3h
  7745 00001FC5 CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - INITIALIZE USART
  7746                                  					; 	AL = initializing parameters,
  7747                                  					;	DX = port number (0-3)
  7748                                  					; Return: AH = RS-232 status code bits,
  7749                                  					;	  AL = modem status bits
  7750 00001FC7 C3                      		retn
  7751                                  
  7752                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7753                                  
  7754                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7755                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7756                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7757                                  ; (19/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0)
  7758                                  
  7759                                  ; domini **********************************************************************
  7760                                  ;
  7761                                  ;mini disk initialization routine. called right after dohard
  7762                                  ;modified for >2 hardfile support
  7763                                  ;
  7764                                  ; **cs=ds=es=datagrp
  7765                                  ;
  7766                                  ; **domini will search for every extended partition in the system, and
  7767                                  ;   initialize it.
  7768                                  ;
  7769                                  ; **bdsm stands for bds table for mini disk and located right after the label
  7770                                  ;   end96tpi. end_of_bdsm will have the offset value of the ending
  7771                                  ;   address of bdsm table.
  7772                                  ;
  7773                                  ; **bdsm is the same as usual bds structure except that tim_lo, tim_hi entries
  7774                                  ;   are overlapped and used to identify mini disk and the number of hidden_trks.
  7775                                  ;   right now, they are called as ismini, hidden_trks respectively.
  7776                                  ;
  7777                                  ; **domini will use the same routine in sethard routine after label set2 to
  7778                                  ;   save coding.
  7779                                  ;
  7780                                  ; **drvmax determined in dohard routine will be used for the next
  7781                                  ;   available logical mini disk drive number.
  7782                                  ;
  7783                                  ; input: drvmax, dskdrvs
  7784                                  ;
  7785                                  ; output: minidisk installed. bdsm table established and installed to bds.
  7786                                  ;	  end_of_bdsm - ending offset address of bdsm.
  7787                                  ;
  7788                                  ; called modules:
  7789                                  ;		  getboot
  7790                                  ;		  find_mini_partition (new), xinstall_bds (new), M038
  7791                                  ;
  7792                                  ;		  setmini (new, it will use set2 routine)
  7793                                  ;
  7794                                  ; variables used: end_of_bdsm
  7795                                  ;		  rom_minidisk_num
  7796                                  ;		  mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7797                                  ;		  BDS_STRUC, start_bds
  7798                                  ;
  7799                                  ;******************************************************************************
  7800                                  
  7801                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7802                                  domini:	
  7803 00001FC8 8A36[0916]              		mov	dh, [hnum]	; get number of hardfiles
  7804                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7805 00001FCC 20F6                    		and	dh, dh
  7806                                  		;cmp	dh, 0
  7807 00001FCE 7430                    		jz	short dominiret	; no hard file?	then exit.
  7808 00001FD0 B280                    		mov	dl, 80h		; start	with hardfile 80h
  7809                                  domini_loop:				
  7810 00001FD2 52                      		push	dx
  7811 00001FD3 8816[0816]              		mov	[rom_minidisk_num], dl
  7812 00001FD7 B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  7813 00001FD9 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7814                                  					; DL = drive number
  7815                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  7816                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  7817                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  7818                                  		
  7819                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7820                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2B36h
  7821                                  		;inc	dh
  7822                                  		;xor	ax, ax
  7823                                  		;mov	al, dh
  7824 00001FDB 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
  7825 00001FDD 88F0                    		mov	al, dh	; <= 255
  7826 00001FDF 40                      		inc	ax	; (0FFh -> 100h)
  7827 00001FE0 A3[0E16]                		mov	[mini_hdlim], ax ; # of heads
  7828                                  		;and	cl, 3Fh
  7829                                  		;mov	al, cl
  7830                                  		; 08/08/2023
  7831 00001FE3 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  7832 00001FE5 83E03F                  		and	ax, 3Fh
  7833 00001FE8 A3[1016]                		mov	[mini_seclim], ax ; # of sectors/track
  7834 00001FEB 06                      		push	es
  7835 00001FEC 8A16[0816]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7836 00001FF0 E883FB                  		call	getboot		; read master boot record into
  7837                                  					; initbootsegment:bootbias
  7838 00001FF3 7203                    		jb	short domininext
  7839 00001FF5 E80900                  		call	find_mini_partition
  7840                                  domininext:				
  7841 00001FF8 07                      		pop	es
  7842 00001FF9 5A                      		pop	dx
  7843 00001FFA FEC2                    		inc	dl		; next hard file
  7844 00001FFC FECE                    		dec	dh
  7845 00001FFE 75D2                    		jnz	short domini_loop
  7846                                  dominiret:				
  7847 00002000 C3                      		retn
  7848                                  
  7849                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7850                                  
  7851                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7852                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7853                                  
  7854                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
  7855                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
  7856                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
  7857                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
  7858                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
  7859                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7860                                  ;
  7861                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
  7862                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
  7863                                  
  7864                                  
  7865                                  find_mini_partition:	
  7866 00002001 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
  7867                                  fmpnext:				
  7868 00002005 26803F05                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 5 ; 5 = extended partition id.
  7869 00002009 740A                    		jz	short fmpgot
  7870 0000200B 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7871 0000200E 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7872 00002012 75F1                    		jnz	short fmpnext
  7873                                  		;jmp	short fmpnextfound ; extended partition	not found
  7874                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7875                                  fmpnextfound:
  7876 00002014 C3                      		retn
  7877                                  
  7878                                  ;		; 30/07/2019 - Retro DOS v3.2
  7879                                  ;		jb	short fmpnext
  7880                                  ;fmpret:
  7881                                  ;		retn	; 29/05/2019
  7882                                  
  7883                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7884                                  
  7885                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7886                                  fmpgot:					; found my partition.				
  7887 00002015 E8A500                  		call	dmax_check	; check	for drvmax already 26
  7888 00002018 73FA                    		jnb	short fmpnextfound ; done if too many
  7889 0000201A 8B3E[0C16]              		mov	di, [end_of_bdss] ; get next free	bds
  7890 0000201E C745470100              		mov	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  7891                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7892 00002023 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1
  7893                                  		;or	word [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  7894                                  					; fNon_Removable
  7895 00002027 C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  7896                                  					; ffHardFile
  7897 0000202B C606[8C15]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit fat.
  7898 00002030 A1[0E16]                		mov	ax, [mini_hdlim]
  7899 00002033 894515                  		mov	[di+15h], ax	; [di+BDS.heads]
  7900 00002036 A1[1016]                		mov	ax, [mini_seclim]
  7901 00002039 894513                  		mov	[di+13h], ax	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  7902 0000203C A0[0816]                		mov	al, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7903 0000203F 884504                  		mov	[di+4],	al	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  7904                                  					; set physical number
  7905 00002042 A0[7500]                		mov	al, [drvmax]
  7906 00002045 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  7907                                  					; set logical number
  7908 00002048 26837F0A00              		cmp	word [es:bx+10], 0
  7909 0000204D 7707                    		ja	short fmpgot_cont
  7910 0000204F 26837F0840              		cmp	word [es:bx+8], 64 ; with current bpb,
  7911                                  					; only lower word is meaningful.
  7912 00002054 72BE                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7913                                  					; should be bigger than 64 sectors at least
  7914                                  fmpgot_cont:				
  7915 00002056 83EB04                  		sub	bx, 4		; let bx point to the start of the entry
  7916 00002059 268A7702                		mov	dh, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder
  7917 0000205D 80E6C0                  		and	dh, 0C0h	; get higher bits of cyl
  7918 00002060 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7919 00002062 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7920 00002064 268A5703                		mov	dl, [es:bx+3]	; cyl byte
  7921 00002068 895549                  		mov	[di+49h], dx	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  7922                                  					; set hidden trks
  7923 0000206B 268B4F02                		mov	cx, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder,cylinder/sector
  7924 0000206F 268A7701                		mov	dh, [es:bx+1]	; head
  7925 00002073 8A16[0816]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7926 00002077 BB0002                  		mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  7927 0000207A B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  7928 0000207D CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  7929                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  7930                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  7931                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  7932 0000207F 7293                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7933 00002081 BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  7934                                  
  7935                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7936                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2C7Ch
  7937 00002084 26817F3C55AA            		cmp	word [es:bx+3Ch], 0AA55h ; 03C2h+03Ch = 3FEh
  7938 0000208A 7588                    		jne	short fmpnextfound ; not a valid boot sector !
  7939                                  
  7940                                  		; 13/08/2023
  7941                                  		;push	es
  7942 0000208C E80800                  		call	setmini		; install a mini disk.
  7943                                  					; bx value saved.
  7944                                  		;pop	es  ; 13/08/2023
  7945 0000208F 7203                    		jc	short fmpnextchain
  7946 00002091 E83E00                  		call	xinstall_bds	; -- install the bdsm into table
  7947                                  fmpnextchain:
  7948 00002094 E96EFF                  		jmp	fmpnext		; let's find out
  7949                                  					; if we	have any chained partition
  7950                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7951                                  
  7952                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7953                                  ;fmpnextfound:				
  7954                                  		;retn
  7955                                  
  7956                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7957                                  
  7958                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7959                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.21)
  7960                                  
  7961                                  setmini:	; 'setmini' is called from 'find_mini_partition' procedure
  7962                                  	
  7963 00002097 57                      		push	di
  7964 00002098 53                      		push	bx
  7965                                  		; 12/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7966                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA segment
  7967                                  		;push	ds
  7968 00002099 06                      		push	es
  7969                                  setmini_1:				
  7970 0000209A 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; FAT12 partition
  7971 0000209E 741A                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7972 000020A0 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4 ; FAT16 partition
  7973 000020A4 7414                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7974 000020A6 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6 ; FAT16 BIG partition
  7975 000020AA 740E                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7976 000020AC 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7977 000020AF 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7978 000020B3 75E5                    		jnz	short setmini_1
  7979 000020B5 F9                      		stc
  7980 000020B6 07                      		pop	es
  7981                                  		; 12/08/2023
  7982                                  		;pop	ds
  7983 000020B7 5B                      		pop	bx
  7984 000020B8 5F                      		pop	di
  7985 000020B9 C3                      		retn
  7986                                  
  7987                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7988                                  setmini_2:
  7989 000020BA E964FB                  		jmp	set2		; branch into middle of sethard
  7990                                  
  7991                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7992                                  
  7993                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2
  7994                                  ; (SYSINITSEG is 473h for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS) 
  7995                                  
  7996                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7997                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7998                                  ;
  7999                                  ; dmax_check --- call this when we want to install a new drive.
  8000                                  ;		it checks for drvmax < 26 to see if there is
  8001                                  ;		a drive letter left.
  8002                                  ;
  8003                                  ;	drvmax < 26 : carry SET!
  8004                                  ;	drvmax >=26 : carry RESET!, error flag set for message later
  8005                                  ;			trash ax
  8006                                  
  8007                                  dmax_check:
  8008 000020BD 803E[7500]1A            		cmp	byte [drvmax], 26 ; checks for drvmax < 26
  8009 000020C2 720D                    		jb	short dmax_ok	; return with carry if okay
  8010 000020C4 06                      		push	es
  8011                                  		;mov	ax, 46Dh	; SYSINIT_SEG (SYSINIT segment)
  8012 000020C5 B84104                  		mov	ax, SYSINITSEG	; 17/10/2022	
  8013 000020C8 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  8014                                  		; 18/10/2022
  8015 000020CA 26C606[8303]01          		mov	byte [es:TOOMANYDRIVESFLAG], 1 ; 09/12/2022 
  8016                                  		;mov	byte ptr es:3FFh, 1 ; [es:toomanydrivesflag]
  8017                                  					; set message flag
  8018                                  					; [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag]
  8019 000020D0 07                      		pop	es
  8020                                  
  8021                                  		;;push	es
  8022                                  		;;mov	ax,SYSINIT_SEG
  8023                                  		;;mov	es,ax
  8024                                  		;;mov	byte [es:toomanydrivesflag],1
  8025                                  					; set message flag
  8026                                  		;;pop	es
  8027                                  		;
  8028                                  		;mov	byte [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag],1
  8029                                  dmax_ok:
  8030 000020D1 C3                      		retn
  8031                                  
  8032                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8033                                  
  8034                                  ; 18/10/2022
  8035                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8036                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0						
  8037                                  ;								 
  8038                                  ;	link next bds (at ds:di) into the chain. assume that the
  8039                                  ;	  chain is entirely within ds == datagrp. also update drvmax,
  8040                                  ;	  dskdrv_table, and end_of_bdss.	
  8041                                  
  8042                                  xinstall_bds:		
  8043 000020D2 56                      		push	si
  8044 000020D3 53                      		push	bx
  8045 000020D4 8B36[1901]              		mov	si, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  8046                                  xinstall_bds_1:				
  8047 000020D8 833CFF                  		cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; is this the last one?
  8048 000020DB 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ;	skip ahead if so
  8049                                  		;mov	si, [si+BDS.link]
  8050 000020DD 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
  8051 000020DF EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1
  8052                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8053                                  
  8054                                  xinstall_bds_2:				
  8055                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link], di
  8056 000020E1 893C                    		mov	[si], di
  8057                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link+2], ds
  8058 000020E3 8C5C02                  		mov	[si+2], ds
  8059                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
  8060 000020E6 C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
  8061                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
  8062 000020EA 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
  8063                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8064                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
  8065 000020ED 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
  8066 000020F0 8B36[0A16]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]
  8067 000020F4 891C                    		mov	[si], bx
  8068 000020F6 8306[0A16]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
  8069 000020FB FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]
  8070 000020FF 8306[0C16]64            		add	word [end_of_bdss], 100 ; BDS.size = 100
  8071 00002104 5B                      		pop	bx
  8072 00002105 5E                      		pop	si
  8073 00002106 C3                      		retn
  8074                                  
  8075                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8076                                  
  8077                                  ; 17/10/2022
  8078                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8079                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8080                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  8081                                  
  8082                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  8083 00002107 50                      		push	ax
  8084 00002108 51                      		push	cx
  8085 00002109 52                      		push	dx
  8086 0000210A 55                      		push	bp
  8087 0000210B 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  8088                                  loop_clock:				
  8089 0000210D 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  8090 0000210F 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  8091 00002111 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  8092 00002113 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  8093                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  8094                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  8095                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  8096 00002115 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  8097 00002118 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  8098 0000211A 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  8099 0000211D 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  8100 0000211F 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  8101 00002122 741C                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was	at zero	setting.
  8102 00002124 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  8103 00002125 B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  8104                                  delay:					
  8105 00002128 E2FE                    		loop	delay
  8106 0000212A EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  8107                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8108                                  
  8109                                  clock_present:				
  8110 0000212C 2EC606[F304]01          		mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  8111 00002132 E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  8112                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  8113                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  8114 00002135 56                      		push	si
  8115 00002136 E8BCF2                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  8116 00002139 FA                      		cli
  8117                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  8118 0000213A 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  8119 0000213E FB                      		sti
  8120 0000213F 5E                      		pop	si
  8121                                  
  8122                                  no_readdate:				
  8123 00002140 5D                      		pop	bp
  8124 00002141 5A                      		pop	dx
  8125 00002142 59                      		pop	cx
  8126 00002143 58                      		pop	ax
  8127 00002144 C3                      		retn
  8128                                  
  8129                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8130                                  
  8131                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  8132                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  8133                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  8134                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  8135                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  8136                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  8137                                  ;
  8138                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  8139                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  8140                                  ;
  8141                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  8142                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  8143                                  ;
  8144                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  8145                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  8146                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initilization routine
  8147                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  8148                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  8149                                  ;
  8150                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  8151                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  8152                                  
  8153                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits	
  8154                                  
  8155                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  8156                                  
  8157                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  8158                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  8159                                  			
  8160 00002145 50                      		push	ax
  8161 00002146 2E803E[3606]FC          		cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  8162 0000214C 7525                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  8163 0000214E 2E803E[3706]06          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  8164                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  8165 00002154 7408                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS	periodic rate if 06
  8166 00002156 2E803E[3706]04          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  8167                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  8168 0000215C 7315                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST  
  8169                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0 
  8170                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  8171                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE 
  8172                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06 
  8173                                  cmosck4:				
  8174 0000215E B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  8175                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  8176 00002160 B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  8177                                  					; Set divider &	rate selection
  8178 00002162 E83000                  		call	cmos_write
  8179 00002165 B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  8180                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  8181 00002167 E80B00                  		call	cmos_read
  8182 0000216A 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  8183                                  					; clear	SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  8184 0000216C 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  8185 0000216E B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  8186                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  8187 00002170 E82200                  		call	cmos_write
  8188                                  cmosck9:				
  8189 00002173 58                      		pop	ax
  8190 00002174 C3                      		retn
  8191                                  
  8192                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8193                                  
  8194                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  8195                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  8196                                  ;									       :
  8197                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  8198                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  8199                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  8200                                  ;									       :
  8201                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  8202                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled.  during the cmos read both nmi and  :
  8203                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  8204                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  8205                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  8206                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  8207                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8208                                  
  8209                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)	
  8210 00002175 9C                      		pushf
  8211 00002176 FA                      		cli
  8212 00002177 53                      		push	bx
  8213 00002178 50                      		push	ax		; AL = cmos table address to be	read
  8214 00002179 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  8215 0000217B E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  8216                                  					; RTC Seconds
  8217 0000217D 90                      		nop			; (undocumented	delay needed)
  8218 0000217E E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  8219 00002180 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax
  8220 00002182 58                      		pop	ax
  8221 00002183 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  8222 00002185 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  8223 00002187 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  8224                                  					; RTC Seconds
  8225 00002189 90                      		nop
  8226 0000218A E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  8227 0000218C 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  8228 0000218E 5B                      		pop	bx
  8229 0000218F 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  8230 00002190 E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  8231 00002193 C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  8232                                  
  8233                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8234                                  
  8235                                  cmos_popf:				
  8236 00002194 CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  8237                                  					; return far and restore flags
  8238                                  
  8239                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8240                                  
  8241                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  8242                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  8243                                  ;									       :
  8244                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  8245                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  8246                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  8247                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  8248                                  ;									       :
  8249                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  8250                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  8251                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  8252                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  8253                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  8254                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  8255                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8256                                  
  8257                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)	
  8258 00002195 9C                      		pushf			; write (ah) to location (al)
  8259 00002196 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  8260 00002197 FA                      		cli
  8261 00002198 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  8262 00002199 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  8263 0000219B E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  8264                                  					; RTC Seconds
  8265 0000219D 90                      		nop
  8266 0000219E 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  8267 000021A0 E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  8268 000021A2 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  8269 000021A3 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  8270 000021A5 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  8271 000021A7 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  8272                                  					; RTC Seconds
  8273 000021A9 90                      		nop
  8274 000021AA E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  8275 000021AC 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  8276 000021AD 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  8277 000021AE E8E3FF                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  8278 000021B1 C3                      		retn
  8279                                  
  8280                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8281                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8282                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8283                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  8284                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8285                                  
  8286                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8287                                  ;
  8288                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  8289                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  8290                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  8291                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  8292                                  
  8293                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8294                                  
  8295                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  8296                                  ;
  8297                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  8298                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  8299                                  ;  es:di = load location
  8300                                  
  8301                                  ; 17/10/2022
  8302                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8303                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8304                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  8305                                  
  8306                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8307                                  getclus:
  8308                                  		; 13/12/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.22 IO.SYS)
  8309                                  		; ds = cs
  8310                                  				
  8311 000021B2 51                      		push	cx
  8312 000021B3 57                      		push	di
  8313                                  		;mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  8314 000021B4 890E[8A15]              		mov	[doscnt], cx ; 13/12/2023
  8315 000021B8 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  8316 000021BA 48                      		dec	ax
  8317 000021BB 48                      		dec	ax
  8318 000021BC F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  8319                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  8320                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  8321                                  		;add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  8322                                  		;adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  8323                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8324 000021BE 0306[8615]              		add	ax, [bios_l]
  8325 000021C2 1316[8815]              		adc	dx, [bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  8326                                  unpack:					
  8327 000021C6 1E                      		push	ds ; ds = cs ; 13/12/2023
  8328 000021C7 52                      		push	dx ; * ; 13/12/2023
  8329 000021C8 50                      		push	ax
  8330 000021C9 53                      		push	bx
  8331                                  		;mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  8332 000021CA 8B36[8D15]              		mov	si, [fatloc] ; 13/12/2023
  8333 000021CE 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si
  8334 000021D0 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  8335 000021D2 2EF606[8C15]40          		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  8336                                  					; 16 bit fat?
  8337 000021D8 752F                    		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  8338 000021DA D1EE                    		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  8339                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  8340 000021DC 01DE                    		add	si, bx		;
  8341                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  8342                                  		;push	dx ; 13/12/2023
  8343 000021DE 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  8344                                  		; 12/12/2023
  8345                                  		; ds = FAT buffer segment
  8346 000021E0 E86500                  		call	get_fat_sector
  8347                                  		;pop	dx ; 12/12/2023
  8348                                  
  8349 000021E3 8B07                    		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  8350 000021E5 750C                    		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  8351                                  		; 25/06/2023
  8352                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  8353                                  
  8354                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8355                                  		;mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  8356 000021E7 50                      		push	ax ; **	; al = low 8 bits of 12 bits cluster number
  8357                                  
  8358 000021E8 46                      		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  8359                                  
  8360                                  		;push	dx ; 13/12/2023
  8361 000021E9 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  8362 000021EB E85A00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  8363                                  		;pop	dx ; 13/12/2023
  8364                                  
  8365                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  8366                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8367                                  		; ds = FAT buffer segment
  8368                                  		;mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  8369                                  		;mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  8370                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  8371                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8372                                  		;mov	al, [cs:temp_cluster]
  8373 000021EE 58                      		pop	ax  ; ** ; al = low 8 bits of 12 bits cluster number
  8374 000021EF 8A260000                		mov	ah, [0] ; high 4 bits (bits 7 to 11) of 12 bits cluster num
  8375                                  even_odd:				
  8376 000021F3 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  8377 000021F4 53                      		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  8378 000021F5 D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  8379 000021F7 7308                    		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  8380 000021F9 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  8381                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  8382 000021FB D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  8383 000021FD D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  8384 000021FF D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  8385                                  havclus:				
  8386 00002201 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  8387 00002203 81E3FF0F                		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  8388 00002207 EB0B                    		jmp	short unpackx
  8389                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8390                                  
  8391                                  unpack16:				
  8392                                  		;push	dx	; 13/12/2023	
  8393 00002209 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx ; 0
  8394 0000220B D1E6                    		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  8395                                  		;adc	dx, 0
  8396                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8397 0000220D D1D2                    		rcl	dx, 1
  8398                                  
  8399                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8400                                  		; ds = FAT buffer segment
  8401 0000220F E83600                  		call	get_fat_sector
  8402                                  		;pop	dx	; 13/12/2023
  8403 00002212 8B1F                    		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  8404                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  8405                                  unpackx:				
  8406 00002214 5E                      		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  8407 00002215 58                      		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  8408 00002216 5A                      		pop	dx ; * ; 13/12/2023
  8409 00002217 1F                      		pop	ds
  8410                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8411                                  		; (this is a fast kernel loading method by the MSDOS programmer)
  8412                                  		; ((consequtive clusters --> consequtive sectors))
  8413                                  		; ds = cs
  8414 00002218 29DE                    		sub	si, bx
  8415 0000221A 83FEFF                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart? (consequtive?)
  8416                                  					; (current = previous+1)
  8417 0000221D 7506                    		jnz	short getcl2	; no, read [doscnt] sectors 
  8418                                  		;add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  8419 0000221F 010E[8A15]              		add	[doscnt], cx ; 13/12/2023 ; add to read count
  8420 00002223 EBA1                    		jmp	short unpack
  8421                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8422                                  
  8423                                  getcl2:

  8425 00002226 52                      		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  8426 00002227 50                      		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  8427

  8433 0000222B 8B0E[8A15]              		mov	cx, [doscnt]

  8437                                  		; 13/12/2023

  8444                                  		;pop	ds

  8455                                  		; ds = cs
  8456 0000223B 5B                      		pop	bx

  8458                                  
  8459                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  8460                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8461 0000223D A1[8A15]                		mov	ax, [doscnt]
  8462 00002240 86E0                    		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  8463 00002242 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  8464 00002244 01C7                    		add	di, ax		; update load location
  8465 00002246 59                      		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  8466 00002247 C3                      		retn

  8468                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8469                                  
  8470                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  8471                                  ;
  8472                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  8473                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  8474                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  8475                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  8476                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  8477                                  ;
  8478                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  8479                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  8480                                  ;      other registera saved.
  8481                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  8482                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  8483                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  8484                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  8485                                  
  8486                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8487                                  get_fat_sector:	
  8488                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8489                                  		; ds = fat buffer segment
  8490                                  
  8491                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8492                                  		;push	ax ; (not necessary)
  8493 00002248 51                      		push	cx ; read count (sectors per cluster)
  8494 00002249 57                      		push	di ; IBMDOS.COM/MSDOS.SYS load offset
  8495 0000224A 56                      		push	si ; FAT offset value (from fat entry 0)
  8496 0000224B 06                      		push	es ; IBMDOS.COM/MSDOS.SYS load segment
  8497 0000224C 1E                      		push	ds ; FAT buffer segment
  8498                                  
  8499                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8500 0000224D 0E                      		push	cs
  8501 0000224E 1F                      		pop	ds
  8502                                  
  8503 0000224F 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  8504                                  		;;mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8505                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8506                                  		;mov	cx, [md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8507                                  		;div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
  8508                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8509                                  		;nop
  8510                                  
  8511                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8512 00002251 F736[9215]              		div	word [md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8513                                  
  8514                                  		; ax = FAT sector (sequence/index) number
  8515                                  		; dx = cluster number offset
  8516                                  
  8517                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  8518                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  8519                                  
  8520                                  		; 13/12/2023 ; *
  8521                                  		;push	es ; *
  8522                                  		;push	ds ; *
  8523                                  		;push	di ; *
  8524 00002255 50                      		push	ax
  8525                                  		;push	cs ; *
  8526                                  		;pop	ds ; *
  8527                                  
  8528                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  8529                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8530 00002256 A1[8415]                		mov	ax, [drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id 
  8531 00002259 BD[6D05]                		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  8532                                  		;;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  8533                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  8534 0000225C 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8535 0000225D E8BDF3                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  8536 00002260 58                      		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  8537 00002261 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  8538                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  8539                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8540                                  		;pop	di ; *
  8541                                  		;pop	ds ; *
  8542                                  		;pop	es ; *
  8543                                  
  8544                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8545                                  		; ds = cs
  8546 00002265 3B06[9415]              		cmp	ax, [last_fat_sec_num]
  8547                                  		;cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  8548 00002269 741C                    		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  8549 0000226B A3[9415]                		mov	[last_fat_sec_num], ax
  8550                                  		;mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax
  8551                                  					; sector number
  8552                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  8553                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8554 0000226E 07                      		pop	es ; FAT buffer segment (DS on top of the stack)
  8555 0000226F 06                      		push	es ; (put it on top of the stack again)
  8556                                  
  8557 00002270 52                      		push	dx ; cluster number offset
  8558                                  
  8559                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8560 00002271 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  8561 00002273 890E[2305]              		mov	[start_sec_h], cx ;0 
  8562                                  		;mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  8563                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  8564                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  8565 00002277 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  8566                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8567 00002279 41                      		inc	cx ; cx = 1
  8568                                  		;mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  8569                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  8570 0000227A A1[8415]                		mov	ax, [drvfat]
  8571                                  		;push	ds
  8572                                  		;pop	es
  8573                                  
  8574 0000227D 31FF                    		xor	di, di	; 0	; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  8575                                  		
  8576                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8577                                  		;push	ds
  8578                                  		;push	cs
  8579                                  		;pop	ds
  8580                                  		
  8581 0000227F 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8582 00002280 BD[5E09]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  8583                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  8584                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  8585 00002283 E897F3                  		call	call_bios_code
  8586                                  
  8587                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8588                                  		;pop	ds
  8589                                  		; ds = cs = biosdata segment
  8590                                  
  8591 00002286 5A                      		pop	dx ; cluster number offset 
  8592                                  
  8593                                  gfs_split_chk:
  8594                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8595                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8596 00002287 8B0E[9215]              		mov	cx, [md_sectorsize]
  8597                                  ;gfs_split_chk:				
  8598 0000228B 49                      		dec	cx		; 511
  8599 0000228C 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  8600                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  8601                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  8602 0000228E 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  8603                                  		
  8604                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8605                                  		; bx = dx = cluster number offset in the FAT buffer
  8606 00002290 1F                      		pop	ds ; FAT buffer segment
  8607 00002291 07                      		pop	es ; IBMDOS.COM/MSDOS.SYS load segment
  8608 00002292 5E                      		pop	si ; FAT offset value (from fat entry 0)
  8609 00002293 5F                      		pop	di ; IBMDOS.COM/MSDOS.SYS load offset
  8610 00002294 59                      		pop	cx ; read count (sectors per cluster)
  8611                                  		;pop	ax
  8612                                  
  8613 00002295 C3                      		retn
  8614                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8615                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
  8616                                  
  8617                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8618                                  
  8619                                  		; 09/12/2022
  8620                                  		;db 0
  8621                                  
  8622                                  numbertodiv	equ ($-BData_start)
  8623                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)
  8624                                  
  8625                                  %if (numbertomod>0) & (numbertomod<16) ; 17/09/2023
  8626 00002296 00<rep Ah>              		times (16-numbertomod) db 0
  8627                                  %endif
  8628                                  
  8629                                  ;align 16
  8630                                  
  8631                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8632                                  IOSYSCODESEGOFF	equ $ - BData_start
  8633                                  IOSYSCODESEG	equ (IOSYSCODESEGOFF>>4)+(700h>>4)
  8634

  8641                                  
  8642                                  ;============================================================================
  8643                                  ; DOS BIOS (IO.SYS) CODE SEGMENT 
  8644                                  ;============================================================================
  8645                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8646                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
  8647                                  
  8648                                  section .BIOSCODE vstart=0 
  8649                                  
  8650                                  ; 30/12/2022
  8651                                  ; (BIOSCODE SEGMENT is 2CCh for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)  -- ((25C0h+700h)>>4) --
  8652                                  
  8653                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
  8654                                   
  8655                                  ; 02/10/2022
  8656                                  
  8657                                  ;--- DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------------
  8658                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8659                                  ; MSBIO1.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8660                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8661                                  
  8662                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  8663 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  8664 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  8665                                  
  8666                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8667                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  8668                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8669                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  8670                                  
  8671                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8672                                  
  8673                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  8674                                  
  8675                                  ;************************************************************************
  8676                                  ;*									*
  8677                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  8678                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  8679                                  ;*									*
  8680                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  8681                                  ;*									*
  8682                                  ;************************************************************************
  8683                                  
  8684                                  	; 20/09/2023	
  8685                                  	; 10/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  8686                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0032h 
  8687                                  
  8688                                  _seg_reinit:
  8689 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  8690                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  8691                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  8692 00000037 BF[BF06]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  8693                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8694                                  		;mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  8695                                  		; 10/08/2023
  8696 0000003A B90300                  		mov	cx, 3 ; (PCDOS 7.1)
  8697                                  _seg_reinit_1:
  8698 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  8699 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  8700 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  8701 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  8702                                  
  8703                                  		; 10/08/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
  8704                                  		; (direct jump to i2f_handler from BIOSDATA:bios_i2f)
  8705                                  		; (instead of 'bcode_i2f: dw i2f_handler, IOSYSCODESEG')
  8706                                  		
  8707                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8708 00000042 26A3[0800]              		mov	[es:bios_i2f_seg], ax ; actual BIOSCODE segment
  8709                                  		
  8710 00000046 CB                      		retf
  8711                                  
  8712                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8713                                  
  8714                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8715                                  
  8716                                  ;************************************************************************
  8717                                  ;*									*
  8718                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  8719                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  8720                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  8721                                  ;*									*
  8722                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  8723                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  8724                                  ;*									*
  8725                                  ;************************************************************************
  8726                                  
  8727                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  8728 00000047 56                      		push	si
  8729 00000048 50                      		push	ax
  8730 00000049 51                      		push	cx
  8731 0000004A 52                      		push	dx
  8732 0000004B 57                      		push	di
  8733 0000004C 55                      		push	bp
  8734 0000004D 1E                      		push	ds
  8735 0000004E 06                      		push	es
  8736 0000004F 53                      		push	bx
  8737 00000050 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  8738 00000052 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  8739                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  8740                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8741 00000055 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8742                                  		; 20/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:005Ah)
  8743 0000005A C434                    		les	si, [si]
  8744                                  		;mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  8745 0000005C 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  8746 0000005E A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  8747 00000061 8826[E704]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  8748                                  		;mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  8749 00000065 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  8750 00000069 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  8751 0000006D 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  8752 00000071 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  8753 00000075 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  8754                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8755 00000079 81FE[3805]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  8756                                  		;;cmp	si, 579h	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
  8757                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  8758                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  8759 0000007D 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8760                                  
  8761                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  8762                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  8763                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  8764                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  8765                                  ;
  8766                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  8767                                  ;
  8768                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  8769                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  8770                                  ;	  it has been used.
  8771                                  ;
  8772                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  8773                                  
  8774                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8775                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  8776 0000007F C706[2305]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  8777 00000085 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  8778 00000088 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8779 0000008A 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  8780                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  8781                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  8782 0000008E 8916[2305]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  8783 00000092 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  8784                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  8785                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  8786 00000096 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8787 00000097 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  8788 0000009B 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
  8789 0000009E 732B                    		jnb	short command_error
  8790 000000A0 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  8791 000000A1 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  8792 000000A3 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  8793 000000A5 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8794 000000A6 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  8795 000000AA FC                      		cld
  8796                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8797 000000AB 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  8798                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  8799 000000AF 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  8800 000000B1 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8801                                  already_got_ah_status:
  8802                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022
  8803                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8804                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  8805 000000B3 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8806                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8807 000000B8 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  8808 000000BC 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  8809                                  					; mark operation complete
  8810 000000BF 5B                      		pop	bx
  8811 000000C0 07                      		pop	es
  8812 000000C1 1F                      		pop	ds
  8813 000000C2 5D                      		pop	bp
  8814 000000C3 5F                      		pop	di
  8815 000000C4 5A                      		pop	dx
  8816 000000C5 59                      		pop	cx
  8817 000000C6 58                      		pop	ax
  8818 000000C7 5E                      		pop	si
  8819                                  		;add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  8820                                  		; 20/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1	- IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:00C8h)
  8821 000000C8 44                      		inc	sp
  8822 000000C9 44                      		inc	sp	
  8823                                  
  8824                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  8825                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  8826                                  bc_retf:
  8827 000000CA CB                      		retf
  8828                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8829                                  
  8830                                  command_error:				
  8831 000000CB E80700                  		call	bc_cmderr
  8832 000000CE EBE3                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  8833                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8834                                  ; 01/05/2019
  8835                                  
  8836                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8837                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  8838                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  8839                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  8840                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  8841                                  ; high.
  8842                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8843                                  
  8844                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  8845                                  
  8846                                  		; 20/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
  8847                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0D0h)
  8848                                  		; 15/10/2022
  8849                                  		;dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  8850                                  
  8851 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  8852                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  8853                                  		
  8854                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8855                                  
  8856                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  8857                                  
  8858                                  bc_cmderr:				
  8859 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8860                                  					; unknown command error
  8861                                  
  8862                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8863                                  
  8864                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  8865                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  8866                                  
  8867                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  8868                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  8869                                  
  8870                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  8871                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8872                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8873 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8874 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  8875                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  8876 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  8877 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  8878 000000E2 C3                      		retn
  8879                                  
  8880                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8881                                  
  8882                                  ;Bios_Code ends
  8883
