  8885                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  8886                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8887                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8888                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8889                                  
  8890                                  ; 30/04/2019
  8891                                  
  8892                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  8893                                  
  8894                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  8895                                  
  8896                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  8897                                  
  8898                                  ;************************************************************************
  8899                                  ;*									*
  8900                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  8901                                  ;*									*
  8902                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  8903                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  8904                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  8905                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  8906                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  8907                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  8908                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  8909                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  8910                                  ;*									*
  8911                                  ;************************************************************************
  8912                                  
  8913                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8914                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:00E3h)
  8915                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8916 000000E3 00                      		db 0
  8917                                  
  8918                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8919 000000E4 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  8920                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  8921 000000E5 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8922                                  					; 00 init
  8923 000000E7 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  8924 000000E9 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  8925 000000EB [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8926                                  					; 03
  8927 000000ED [5C01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  8928                                  					; 04
  8929 000000EF [9F01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  8930                                  					; 05
  8931 000000F1 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  8932 000000F3 [0802]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  8933                                  					; 07
  8934 000000F5 [FC01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  8935                                  					; 08
  8936 000000F7 [FC01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  8937 000000F9 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  8938                                  con_table_end:
  8939 000000FB 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  8940                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  8941 000000FC [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  8942 000000FE [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8943 00000100 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8944 00000102 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  8945 00000104 [1902]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  8946                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  8947 00000106 [C701]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8948                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  8949 00000108 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8950 0000010A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8951 0000010C [1E02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  8952 0000010E [1E02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  8953 00000110 [4F02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  8954 00000112 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  8955 00000114 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  8956 00000116 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  8957 00000118 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  8958 0000011A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  8959 0000011C [8902]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  8960 0000011E [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  8961 00000120 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  8962 00000122 [B702]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  8963 00000124 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  8964 00000126 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  8965 00000128 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  8966 0000012A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  8967 0000012C [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  8968 0000012E [EC02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  8969                                  prn_table_end:
  8970 00000130 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  8971                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  8972 00000131 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  8973 00000133 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8974 00000135 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8975 00000137 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8976 00000139 [0703]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  8977 0000013B [2C03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  8978 0000013D [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8979 0000013F [6203]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  8980 00000141 [6903]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  8981 00000143 [6903]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  8982 00000145 [4C03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  8983                                  aux_table_end:
  8984 00000147 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  8985                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  8986 00000148 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  8987 0000014A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8988 0000014C [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8989 0000014E [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8990 00000150 [CE04]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
  8991 00000152 [C701]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8992 00000154 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8993 00000156 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8994 00000158 [CF03]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
  8995 0000015A [CF03]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  8996                                  tim_table_end:
  8997                                  
  8998                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8999                                  
  9000                                  ;************************************************************************
  9001                                  ;*									*
  9002                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  9003                                  ;*									*
  9004                                  ;************************************************************************
  9005                                  
  9006                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  9007                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  9008 0000015C E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  9009                                  con_loop:				
  9010 0000015E E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  9011 00000161 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  9012 00000162 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  9013                                  con_exit:				
  9014 00000164 F8                      		clc
  9015 00000165 C3                      		retn
  9016                                  
  9017                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9018                                  
  9019                                  ;************************************************************************
  9020                                  ;*									*
  9021                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  9022                                  ;*									*
  9023                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  9024                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  9025                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  9026                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  9027                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  9028                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  9029                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  9030                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  9031                                  ;*									*
  9032                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  9033                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  9034                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  9035                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  9036                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  9037                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  9038                                  ;*									*
  9039                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  9040                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  9041                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  9042                                  ;*									*
  9043                                  ;************************************************************************
  9044                                  
  9045                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9046                                  chrin:		
  9047 00000166 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  9048 0000016A 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  9049 0000016C 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  9050 00000170 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9051 00000172 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  9052 00000174 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  9053 00000176 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  9054 00000178 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  9055 0000017A 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  9056 0000017D 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  9057 0000017F B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  9058 00000181 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  9059                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9060                                  
  9061                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  9062                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  9063                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  9064                                  ;	 goto keyret
  9065                                  ;      else
  9066                                  ;	 set al to zero
  9067                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  9068                                  ;      endif
  9069                                  ;    endif
  9070                                  ;  endif
  9071                                  
  9072                                  alt_ext_chk:
  9073 00000183 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  9074 00000188 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  9075 0000018A 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  9076 0000018C 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  9077 0000018E 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  9078 00000190 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  9079 00000192 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  9080 00000194 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  9081                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9082                                  
  9083                                  not_ext:				
  9084 00000196 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  9085 00000198 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  9086                                  alt_save:				
  9087 0000019A 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  9088                                  keyret:					
  9089 0000019E C3                      		retn
  9090                                  
  9091                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9092                                  
  9093                                  ;************************************************************************
  9094                                  ;*									*
  9095                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  9096                                  ;*									*
  9097                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  9098                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  9099                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  9100                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  9101                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  9102                                  ;*									*
  9103                                  ;************************************************************************
  9104                                  
  9105                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9106                                  con_rdnd:				
  9107 0000019F A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  9108 000001A2 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9109 000001A4 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  9110 000001A6 8A26[E604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  9111 000001AA CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  9112 000001AC 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  9113 000001AE 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  9114 000001B3 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  9115 000001B5 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  9116                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9117 000001B9 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  9118                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  9119 000001BE 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  9120 000001C0 B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  9121 000001C3 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  9122 000001C5 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  9123                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  9124                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  9125                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  9126                                  z_bus_exit:				
  9127 000001C7 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  9128 000001C8 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  9129 000001CA C3                      		retn
  9130                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9131                                  
  9132                                  gotchr:					
  9133 000001CB 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  9134 000001CD 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  9135 000001CF 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  9136 000001D3 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  9137 000001D5 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  9138                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9139                                  
  9140                                  notbrk:					
  9141 000001D7 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  9142 000001DA 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  9143 000001DC B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  9144 000001DE EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  9145                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9146                                  
  9147                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  9148 000001E0 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  9149 000001E5 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  9150 000001E7 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  9151 000001E9 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  9152 000001EB 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  9153 000001EE 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  9154 000001F0 B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  9155                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  9156                                  rdexit:					
  9157 000001F2 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  9158 000001F6 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  9159                                  					; return keyboard character here
  9160                                  bc_exvec:				
  9161 000001FA F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  9162                                  					; indicate normal termination
  9163 000001FB C3                      		retn
  9164                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9165                                  
  9166                                  ;************************************************************************
  9167                                  ;*									*
  9168                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  9169                                  ;*									*
  9170                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  9171                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  9172                                  ;*									*
  9173                                  ;************************************************************************
  9174                                  
  9175                                  con_writ:
  9176                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  9177 000001FC E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  9178                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9179                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  9180                                  con_lp:					
  9181 000001FE 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  9182 00000201 47                      		inc	di
  9183 00000202 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  9184                                  					; AL = character to display
  9185 00000204 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  9186                                  cc_ret:					
  9187 00000206 F8                      		clc
  9188 00000207 C3                      		retn
  9189                                  
  9190                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9191                                  
  9192                                  ;************************************************************************
  9193                                  ;*									*
  9194                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  9195                                  ;*									*
  9196                                  ;************************************************************************
  9197                                  
  9198                                  con_flush:
  9199 00000208 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  9200                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  9201 0000020D B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  9202 0000020F CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  9203                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  9204                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  9205                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  9206 00000211 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  9207 00000213 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9208 00000215 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  9209                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  9210 00000217 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  9211

  9214                                  ; 15/10/2022

  9216                                  ;************************************************************************
  9217                                  ;*									*
  9218                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  9219                                  ;*									*
  9220                                  ;************************************************************************
  9221                                  
  9222                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  9223                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  9224                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  9225                                  
  9226                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  9227                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  9228                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  9229                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  9230                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  9231                                  ;
  9232                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  9233                                  
  9234                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  9235                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  9236                                  
  9237                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9238                                  
  9239                                  ;************************************************************************
  9240                                  ;*									*
  9241                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  9242                                  ;*									*
  9243                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  9244                                  ;*									*
  9245                                  ;************************************************************************
  9246                                  
  9247                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  9248 00000219 E8BBFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  9249                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  9250                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9251                                  prn_done:
  9252 0000021C F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  9253 0000021D C3                      		retn
  9254                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9255                                  
  9256                                  ;************************************************************************
  9257                                  ;*									*
  9258                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  9259                                  ;*									*
  9260                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  9261                                  ;*									*
  9262                                  ;************************************************************************
  9263                                  
  9264                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  9265                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  9266 0000021E E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  9267                                  prn_loop:				
  9268 00000220 BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  9269                                  prn_out:				
  9270 00000223 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  9271 00000226 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  9272 00000228 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  9273 0000022B 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9274 0000022D E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  9275 00000230 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  9276 00000232 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  9277 00000235 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  9278 00000237 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  9279 00000239 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  9280 0000023E EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  9281                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9282                                  
  9283                                  _prnwf:					
  9284 00000240 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  9285 00000243 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  9286                                  TestPrnError:				
  9287 00000245 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  9288 00000246 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  9289                                  pmessg:					
  9290 00000248 E98CFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  9291                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9292                                  
  9293                                  prn_con:				
  9294 0000024B 47                      		inc	di		; point	to next	char and continue
  9295 0000024C E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  9296                                  ;prn_done:				
  9297                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9298                                  prn_done2:
  9299                                  		;clc
  9300                                  		; cf=0
  9301 0000024E C3                      		retn
  9302                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9303                                  
  9304                                  ;************************************************************************
  9305                                  ;*									*
  9306                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  9307                                  ;*									*
  9308                                  ;************************************************************************
  9309                                  
  9310                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  9311 0000024F E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  9312 00000252 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  9313 00000254 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  9314                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  9315                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9316 00000257 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  9317 00000259 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  9318                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9319                                  
  9320                                  ;************************************************************************
  9321                                  ;*									*
  9322                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  9323                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  9324                                  ;*									*
  9325                                  ;************************************************************************
  9326                                  
  9327                                  prnstat:				
  9328 0000025C B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  9329                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  9330                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  9331                                  					; Return: AH = status
  9332                                  
  9333                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9334                                  
  9335                                  ;************************************************************************
  9336                                  ;*									*
  9337                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  9338                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  9339                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  9340                                  ;*									*
  9341                                  ;************************************************************************
  9342                                  
  9343                                  prnop:	
  9344 0000025E 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  9345 00000262 CD17                    		int	17h		
  9346                                  
  9347                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  9348                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  9349                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  9350                                  
  9351 00000264 50                      		push	ax
  9352 00000265 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  9353 00000268 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  9354 0000026B 58                      		pop	ax
  9355 0000026C 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  9356 0000026E 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  9357 00000271 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  9358                                  
  9359                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  9360                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  9361                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  9362                                  
  9363                                  NextTest:				
  9364 00000274 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  9365                                  					; i/o error?
  9366 00000277 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  9367                                  
  9368                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  9369                                  
  9370 00000279 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  9371                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  9372 0000027B F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  9373 0000027E 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  9374 00000280 FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  9375                                  ret1:					
  9376 00000282 C3                      		retn
  9377                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9378                                  
  9379                                  checknotready:				
  9380 00000283 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  9381 00000285 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  9382 00000288 C3                      		retn
  9383                                  
  9384                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9385                                  
  9386                                  ;************************************************************************
  9387                                  ;*									*
  9388                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  9389                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  9390                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  9391                                  ;*									*
  9392                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  9393                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  9394                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  9395                                  ;*									*
  9396                                  ;************************************************************************
  9397                                  
  9398                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9399                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  9400 00000289 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  9401                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  9402 0000028B 51                      		push	cx
  9403 0000028C 53                      		push	bx
  9404 0000028D 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  9405 0000028F 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  9406 00000293 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  9407                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  9408 00000295 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  9409 00000299 5B                      		pop	bx
  9410                                  prn_getstat:				
  9411 0000029A E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  9412 0000029D 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  9413 0000029F F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  9414 000002A2 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  9415 000002A4 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  9416 000002A5 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  9417 000002A7 26                      		es
  9418 000002A8 AC                      		lodsb
  9419                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  9420                                  					; lodsb
  9421 000002A9 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9422 000002AB E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  9423 000002AE 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  9424 000002B0 E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  9425                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9426                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  9427                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  9428 000002B2 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  9429

  9435 000002B4 E920FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt

  9531                                  ;************************************************************************
  9532                                  ;*									*
  9533                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  9534                                  ;*									*
  9535                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  9536                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  9537                                  ;*									*
  9538                                  ;************************************************************************
  9539                                  
  9540                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  9541                                  
  9542                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  9543                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  9544                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  9545                                  
  9546                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  9547                                  
  9548                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  9549                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  9550                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  9551                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  9552                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  9553                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  9554                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  9555                                  
  9556                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  9557                                  
  9558                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  9559                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  9560                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
  9561                                  
  9562                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9563                                  
  9564                                  ;************************************************************************
  9565                                  ;*									*
  9566                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  9567                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  9568                                  ;*									*
  9569                                  ;************************************************************************
  9570                                  
  9571                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  9572                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
  9573 00000307 E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  9574 00000309 E87500                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  9575 0000030C 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  9576 0000030E 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  9577 00000310 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9578 00000312 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  9579                                  aux1:					
  9580 00000314 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  9581                                  					; won't return if error
  9582                                  aux2:

  9584 00000318 E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
  9585                                  exvec2:

  9587                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
  9588 0000031B C3                      		retn

  9590                                  
  9591                                  ;************************************************************************
  9592                                  ;*									*
  9593                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  9594                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  9595                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  9596                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
  9597                                  ;*									*
  9598                                  ;************************************************************************
  9599                                  
  9600                                  auxin:

  9602 0000031E E83A00                  		call	auxop

  9604                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  9605                                  		;retn
  9606                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
  9607 00000324 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
  9608                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9609                                  
  9610                                  arbad:					
  9611 00000326 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
  9612                                  		;xor	al, al
  9613                                  		;or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  9614                                  		; 11/08/2023
  9615 00000327 B0B0                    		mov	al, 0B0h	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0334h
  9616 00000329 E9ABFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  9617                                  
  9618                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9619                                  
  9620                                  ;************************************************************************
  9621                                  ;*									*
  9622                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  9623                                  ;*									*
  9624                                  ;************************************************************************
  9625                                  
  9626                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h
  9627 0000032C E85200                  		call	getbx

  9629 00000331 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
  9630 00000333 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  9631 00000335 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
  9632 00000338 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
  9633 0000033B 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9634 0000033D A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  9635 0000033F 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9636 00000341 E8D8FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  9637 00000344 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  9638                                  auxdrx:					
  9639 00000346 E9A9FE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status
  9640                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9641

  9656 00000353 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
  9657 00000356 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9658                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9659                                  		; cf=0	; (test instruction resets cf)
  9660                                  		;clc
  9661 00000358 C3                      		retn
  9662                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9663                                  
  9664                                  ;************************************************************************
  9665                                  ;*									*
  9666                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
  9667                                  ;*									*
  9668                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
  9669                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  9670                                  ;*									*
  9671                                  ;************************************************************************
  9672                                  
  9673                                  auxstat:				
  9674 00000359 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
  9675                                  
  9676                                  		; fall into auxop
  9677                                  
  9678                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9679                                  
  9680                                  ;************************************************************************
  9681                                  ;*									*
  9682                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
  9683                                  ;*									*
  9684                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
  9685                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
  9686                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  9687                                  ;*									*
  9688                                  ;************************************************************************
  9689                                  
  9690                                  auxop:		; proc near		
  9691 0000035B 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
  9692                                  					; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
  9693                                  					; get port number
  9694 0000035F CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
  9695                                  					; DX = port number (0-3)
  9696                                  					; Return: AX = port status code
  9697 00000361 C3                      		retn
  9698                                  
  9699                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9700                                  
  9701                                  ;************************************************************************
  9702                                  ;*									*
  9703                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
  9704                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
  9705                                  ;*									*
  9706                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
  9707                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
  9708                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
  9709                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
  9710                                  ;*									*
  9711                                  ;************************************************************************
  9712                                  
  9713                                  aux_flsh:				; 2C7h:36Ch = 70h:28DCh
  9714 00000362 E81C00                  		call	getbx		; flush	aux input buffer
  9715 00000365 C60700                  		mov	byte [bx], 0	; get bx to point to auxbuf
  9716                                  					; zero out buffer
  9717                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  9718                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9719                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
  9720 00000368 C3                      		retn
  9721                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9722                                  
  9723                                  ;************************************************************************
  9724                                  ;*									*
  9725                                  ;*	aux_writ - write to aux device					*
  9726                                  ;*									*
  9727                                  ;************************************************************************
  9728                                  
  9729                                  aux_writ:				; 2C7h:374h = 70h:28E4h
  9730                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2	; write	to aux device (if cx > 0)
  9731 00000369 E3AF                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  9732                                  aux_loop:				
  9733 0000036B 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to be written
  9734                                  					; move di pointer to next character
  9735 0000036E 47                      		inc	di
  9736 0000036F B401                    		mov	ah, 1		; auxfunc_send - indicates a write
  9737 00000371 E8E7FF                  		call	auxop		; send character over aux port
  9738 00000374 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; check	for error
  9739 00000377 7405                    		jz	short awok	; then no error
  9740 00000379 B00A                    		mov	al, 10		; else indicate	write fault
  9741 0000037B E959FD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines
  9742                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9743                                  
  9744                                  awok:					
  9745 0000037E E2EB                    		loop	aux_loop	; if cx	is non-zero,
  9746                                  					; still	more character to print
  9747                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  9748                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9749                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)	
  9750 00000380 C3                      		retn
  9751                                  
  9752                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9753                                  
  9754                                  ;************************************************************************
  9755                                  ;*									*
  9756                                  ;*	getbx - return bx -> single byte input buffer for		*
  9757                                  ;*		selected aux port ([auxnum])				*
  9758                                  ;*									*
  9759                                  ;************************************************************************
  9760                                  
  9761                                  getbx:

  9763                                  					; for selected aux port	([auxnum])
  9764                                  		;add	bx, offset auxbuf
  9765 00000385 81C3[1600]              		add	bx, auxbuf	; 19/10/2022
  9766                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9767                                  		; cf=0 (if [uaxnum] is valid number) 
  9768 00000389 C3                      		retn
  9769                                  
  9770                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9771                                  
  9772                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9773                                  
  9774                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  9775                                  ;								:
  9776                                  ;		    clock device driver 			:
  9777                                  ;								:
  9778                                  ;								:
  9779                                  ;   this file contains the clock device driver. 		:
  9780                                  ;								:
  9781                                  ;   the routines in this files are:				:
  9782                                  ;								:
  9783                                  ;	routine 		function			:
  9784                                  ;	------- 		--------			:
  9785                                  ;	tim_writ		set the current time		:
  9786                                  ;	tim_read		read the current time		:
  9787                                  ;	time_to_ticks		convert time to corresponding	:
  9788                                  ;				  number of clock ticks 	:
  9789                                  ;								:
  9790                                  ; the clock ticks at the rate of:				:
  9791                                  ;								:
  9792                                  ;	1193180/65536 ticks/second (about 18.2 ticks per second):
  9793                                  ; see each routine for information on the use.			:
  9794                                  ;								:
  9795                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  9796                                  
  9797                                  ; convert time to ticks
  9798                                  ; input : time in cx and dx
  9799                                  ; ticks returned in cx:dx
  9800                                  
  9801                                  ;19/07/2019
  9802                                  ;09/03/2019
  9803                                  
  9804                                  time_to_ticks:				; 0070h:2906h =	02C7h:0396h
  9805                                  
  9806                                  ; first convert from hour,min,sec,hund. to
  9807                                  ; total number of 100th of seconds
  9808                                  
  9809 0000038A B03C                    		mov	al, 60
  9810 0000038C F6E5                    		mul	ch		; hours	to minutes
  9811 0000038E B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  9812 00000390 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; total	minutes
  9813 00000392 B97017                  		mov	cx, 6000	; 60*100
  9814 00000395 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; get out of the way of	the multiply
  9815 00000397 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to 1/100 sec
  9816 00000399 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
  9817 0000039B B064                    		mov	al, 100
  9818 0000039D F6E7                    		mul	bh		; convert seconds to 1/100 sec
  9819 0000039F 01C1                    		add	cx, ax		; combine seconds with hours and min
  9820 000003A1 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; ripple carry
  9821 000003A4 B700                    		mov	bh, 0
  9822 000003A6 01D9                    		add	cx, bx		; combine 1/100	sec
  9823 000003A8 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  9824                                  
  9825                                  	; dx:cx is time in 1/100 sec
  9826                                  
  9827 000003AB 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  9828 000003AC 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; now time is in cx:ax
  9829 000003AD BB0BE9                  		mov	bx, 59659
  9830 000003B0 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply low half
  9831 000003B2 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx
  9832 000003B4 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; cx->ax, ax->dx, dx->cx
  9833 000003B5 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply high	half
  9834 000003B7 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; combine overlapping products
  9835 000003B9 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  9836 000003BC 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; ax:dx=time*59659
  9837 000003BD BB0500                  		mov	bx, 5
  9838 000003C0 F6F3                    		div	bl		; divide high half by 5
  9839 000003C2 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
  9840 000003C4 B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  9841 000003C6 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; remainder of divide-by-5
  9842 000003C8 98                      		cbw
  9843 000003C9 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; use it to extend low half
  9844 000003CA F7F3                    		div	bx		; divide low half by 5
  9845 000003CC 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax		; cx:dx	is now number of ticks in time
  9846 000003CE CB                      		retf			; far return
  9847                                  
  9848                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9849                                  
  9850                                  ; 17/10/2022
  9851                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9852                                  
  9853                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  9854                                  ;
  9855                                  ; tim_writ sets the current time
  9856                                  ;
  9857                                  ; on entry es:[di] has the current time:
  9858                                  ;
  9859                                  ;	number of days since 1-1-80	(word)
  9860                                  ;	minutes (0-59)			(byte)
  9861                                  ;	hours (0-23)			(byte)
  9862                                  ;	hundredths of seconds (0-99)	(byte)
  9863                                  ;	seconds (0-59)			(byte)
  9864                                  ;
  9865                                  ; each number has been checked for the correct range.
  9866                                  ;
  9867                                  ;	NOTE: Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  9868                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  9869                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  9870                                  ;
  9871                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  9872                                  
  9873                                  	; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  9874                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:03EAh
  9875                                  tim_writ:				; 2C7h:3DBh = 70h:294Bh
  9876 000003CF 268B05                  		mov	ax, [es:di]
  9877 000003D2 50                      		push	ax		; daycnt. we need to set this at the very
  9878                                  					; end to avoid tick windows.
  9879 000003D3 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  9880                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0

  9882 000003DA 268A4503                		mov	al, [es:di+3]	; near indirect	calls
  9883                                  					; get binary hours
  9884                                  					; convert to bcd
  9885                                  		;call	far [bintobcd]
  9886                                  		;;call	ds:bintobcd	; call far [bintobcd]
  9887                                  		; 08/08/2023

  9890 000003E3 268A4502                		mov	al, [es:di+2]	; get binary minutes

  9892                                  		;;call	ds:bintobcd	; convert to bcd

  9895 000003EC 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; get binary seconds

  9897                                  		;;call	ds:bintobcd

  9902 000003F7 FA                      		cli

  9905                                  					; CH = hours in	BCD, CL	= minutes in BCD
  9906                                  					;  DH =	seconds	in BCD,DL = 01h	if daylight savings, 00h if standard time
  9907                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set

  9915                                  					; convert time to ticks
  9916                                  					; cx:dx	now has	time in	ticks

  9918 0000040A B401                    		mov	ah, 1

  9921                                  					; Return: time of day set

  9924 00000412 FB                      		sti
  9925                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  9926 00000413 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  9927 00000418 7409                    		jz	short no_cmos_2

  9938                                  					; DL = day in BCD, DH =	month in BCD, CL = year	in BCD
  9939                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)

  9955                                  ; Warning!!! This code will be dynamically relocated by MSINIT.

  9957                                  daycnttoday:	; proc near
  9958                                  
  9959                                  ; entry: [daycnt] = number of days since 1-1-80
  9960                                  ;
  9961                                  ; return: ch - century in bcd
  9962                                  ;	  cl - year in bcd
  9963                                  ;	  dh - month in bcd
  9964                                  ;	  dl - day in bcd
  9965                                  
  9966                                  		; 08/08/2023 (ds:) (near proc)
  9967                                  		; 16/10/2022 (cs:) (far proc)		
  9968 00000424 FF36[F004]              		push	word [daycnt] ; save daycnt
  9969 00000428 813E[F004]891C          		cmp	word [daycnt], 7305 ; (365*20+(20/4))
  9970                                  					; # days from 1-1-1980 to 1-1-2000
  9971 0000042E 7308                    		jnb	short century20
  9972                                  		;mov	byte [base_century], 19
  9973                                  		;mov	byte [base_year], 80
  9974                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9975 00000430 C706[F404]1350          		mov	word [base_century], 5013h
  9976 00000436 EB0C                    		jmp	short years
  9977                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9978                                  		
  9979                                  century20:				
  9980                                  		;mov	byte [base_century], 20
  9981                                  		;mov	byte [base_year], 0
  9982                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9983 00000438 C706[F404]1400          		mov	word [base_century], 20
  9984 0000043E 812E[F004]891C          		sub	word [daycnt], 7305 ; (365*20+(20/4))
  9985                                  					; adjust daycnt
  9986                                  years:					
  9987 00000444 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  9988 00000446 A1[F004]                		mov	ax, [daycnt]
  9989 00000449 BBB505                  		mov	bx, 1461	; (366+365*3)
  9990                                  					; # of days in a Leap year block
  9991 0000044C F7F3                    		div	bx		; AX = # of leap block,	DX = daycnt
  9992 0000044E 8916[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], dx	; save daycnt left
  9993 00000452 B304                    		mov	bl, 4
  9994 00000454 F6E3                    		mul	bl		; AX = # of years. Less	than 100
  9995 00000456 0006[F504]              		add	[base_year], al ; So, ah = 0. Adjust year
  9996 0000045A FF06[F004]              		inc	word [daycnt]	; set daycnt to	1 base
  9997                                  		; 08/08/2023
  9998 0000045E BB6E01                  		mov	bx, 366
  9999 00000461 B90300                  		mov	cx, 3
 10000                                  		;cmp	word [daycnt], 366 ; daycnt=remainder of leap year
 10001 00000464 391E[F004]              		cmp	[daycnt], bx ; 366
 10002 00000468 7619                    		jbe	short leapyear	; within 366+355+355+355 days.
 10003 0000046A FE06[F504]              		inc	byte [base_year] ; if daycnt <= 366, then leap year
 10004                                  		;sub	word [daycnt], 366 ; else daycnt--, base_year++ ;
 10005 0000046E 291E[F004]              		sub	[daycnt], bx ; 366 ; 08/08/2023
 10006                                  		;mov	cx, 3		; And next three years are normal
 10007                                  regularyear:	
 10008                                  		; 08/08/2023
 10009 00000472 4B                      		dec	bx ; 365			
 10010                                  		;cmp	word [daycnt], 365 ; for(i=1; i>3 or daycnt <=365; i++)
 10011 00000473 391E[F004]              		cmp	[daycnt], bx ; 365 ; 08/08/2023
 10012 00000477 760F                    		jbe	short yeardone	; {if (daycnt >	365)
 10013 00000479 FE06[F504]              		inc	byte [base_year] ; { daycnt -=	365
 10014                                  		;sub	word [daycnt], 365 ; }
 10015 0000047D 291E[F004]              		sub	[daycnt], bx ; 365 ; 08/08/2023 
 10016 00000481 E2EF                    		loop	regularyear	; }
 10017                                  					;
 10018                                  					; should never fall through loop
 10019                                  leapyear:	
 10020 00000483 C606[F704]1D            		mov	byte [february], 29 ; 08/08/2023			
 10021                                  		;mov	byte [month_tab+1], 29 ; leap year.
 10022                                  					; change month table.
 10023                                  yeardone:				
 10024 00000488 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx
 10025 0000048A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 10026 0000048C A1[F004]                		mov	ax, [daycnt]
 10027                                  		;mov	si, offset month_tab
 10028 0000048F BE[F604]                		mov	si, month_tab	; 19/10/2022
 10029                                  		;mov	cx, 12
 10030                                  		; 08/08/2023
 10031 00000492 B10C                    		mov	cl, 12
 10032                                  months:					
 10033 00000494 FEC3                    		inc	bl
 10034                                  		; 08/08/2023
 10035 00000496 8A14                    		mov	dl, [si]	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:04B7h
 10036 00000498 39D0                    		cmp	ax, dx		; cmp daycnt for each month till fit
 10037                                  					; dh=0

 10040 0000049D 29D0                    		sub	ax, dx		; adjust daycnt
 10041 0000049F E2F3                    		loop	months		;
 10042                                  					; should never fall through loop
 10043                                  month_done:	
 10044 000004A1 C606[F704]1C            		mov	byte [february], 28 ; 08/08/2023
 10045                                  		;mov	byte [month_tab+1], 28
 10046                                  					; restore month table value
 10047 000004A6 88DA                    		mov	dl, bl
 10048 000004A8 8A36[F504]              		mov	dh, [base_year]
 10049 000004AC 8A0E[F404]              		mov	cl, [base_century] ; al=day,dl=month,dh=year,cl=cntry
 10050 000004B0 E81600                  		call	bintobcd	; convert "day"	to bcd
 10051                                  					; dl = bcd day,	al = month
 10052 000004B3 86D0                    		xchg	dl, al

 10054 000004B8 86F0                    		xchg	dh, al
 10055 000004BA E80C00                  		call	bintobcd	; cl = bcd year, al = century
 10056 000004BD 86C8                    		xchg	cl, al
 10057 000004BF E80700                  		call	bintobcd	; ch = bcd century

 10064                                  bintobcd:	; proc near		; real time clock support
 10065                                  
 10066                                  ;convert a binary input in al (less than 63h or 99 decimal)
 10067                                  ;into a bcd value in al. ah destroyed.	
 10068                                  		
 10069 000004C9 D40A                    		aam			; AH = AL/10, AL = AL MOD 10
 10070 000004CB D510                    		aad     10h             ; db 0D5h,10h
 10071                                  					; AL = (AH*10H)+AL, AH = 0
 10072 000004CD C3                      		retn
