 12029 00000BC6 FF0E[2C05]              		dec	word [soft_ecc_cnt]
 12030 00000BCA 749A                    		jz	short noverify	; no more retry
 12031 00000BCC E83705                  		call	ResetDisk	; reset	disk
 12032 00000BCF EB3E                    		jmp	short dskerr1	; retry
 12033                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12034                                  
 12035                                  not_softecc_err:			; other error.			
 12036 00000BD1 E83205                  		call	ResetDisk
 12037 00000BD4 FF0E[2A05]              		dec	word [vretry_cnt]
 12038 00000BD8 EB1C                    		jmp	short dskerr0
 12039                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12040                                  
 12041                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12042                                  ; need to special case the change-line error ah=06h.
 12043                                  ; if we get this, we need to return it.
 12044                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12045                                  
 12046                                  dskerr:					
 12047 00000BDA 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0	; do we	have changeline	support?
 12048 00000BDF 7403                    		jz	short dskerr_nochangeline ; brif not
 12049 00000BE1 E80B0D                  		call	checkio
 12050                                  dskerr_nochangeline:			
 12051 00000BE4 803E[2E05]01            		cmp	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1 ; multi trk format request?
 12052 00000BE9 7508                    		jnz	short dochkagain ; no more retry.
 12053 00000BEB BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1
 12054 00000BEE C606[2E05]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0 ; clear the flag.
 12055                                  dochkagain:				
 12056 00000BF3 E8AA00                  		call	again
 12057                                  dskerr0:				
 12058 00000BF6 7420                    		jz	short harderr
 12059 00000BF8 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12060                                  					; fnon_removable
 12061 00000BFD 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 12062 00000BFF 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 12063 00000C02 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 12064                                  skip_timeout_chk:			
 12065 00000C04 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 12066 00000C07 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 12067 00000C09 C706[2C05]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 12068                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 12069                                  dskerr1:				
 12070 00000C0F 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 12071                                  		;jmp	retry
 12072                                  		; 09/12/2022
 12073 00000C10 E9F9FE                  		jmp	_retry
 12074                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12075                                  
 12076                                  write_fault_err:			
 12077 00000C13 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 12078                                  					; for write fault error.
 12079 00000C16 EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 12080                                  
 12081                                  		; fall into harderr
 12082                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12083                                  
 12084                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 12085                                  
 12086                                  harderr:				
 12087 00000C18 E84D00                  		call	maperror
 12088                                  harderr2:				
 12089 00000C1B C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 12090                                  					; force a media check through rom
 12091 00000C20 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 12092 00000C24 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 12093                                  
 12094                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 12095                                  
 12096                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 12097                                  		; 09/12/2022
 12098 00000C28 E958FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 12099                                  
 12100                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12101                                  
 12102                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 12103                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 12104                                  
 12105                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12106                                  normspeed:
 12107 00000C2B 803E[3006]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 12108 00000C30 751E                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 12109 00000C32 06                      		push	es
 12110 00000C33 50                      		push	ax
 12111 00000C34 A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 12112 00000C37 C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 12113 00000C3B 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12114 00000C3F 58                      		pop	ax
 12115 00000C40 07                      		pop	es
 12116 00000C41 E80C00                  		call	fastspeed
 12117 00000C44 06                      		push	es
 12118 00000C45 C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]
 12119 00000C49 26C6440901              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12120                                  					; 1 is fast settle value
 12121 00000C4E 07                      		pop	es
 12122 00000C4F C3                      		retn
 12123                                  
 12124                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12125                                  
 12126                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 12127                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 12128                                  
 12129                                  fastspeed:		
 12130 00000C50 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 12131                                  					; ftoobig
 12132 00000C55 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 12133 00000C57 06                      		push	es
 12134 00000C58 8E06[2F05]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 12135 00000C5C CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 12136 00000C5E 8C06[2F05]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 12137 00000C62 07                      		pop	es
 12138 00000C63 C3                      		retn
 12139                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12140                                  
 12141                                  notready:				
 12142 00000C64 F9                      		stc
 12143 00000C65 B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 12144 00000C67 C3                      		retn
 12145                                  
 12146                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12147                                  
 12148                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 12149                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 12150                                  
 12151                                  maperror:	
 12152 00000C68 51                      		push	cx
 12153 00000C69 06                      		push	es
 12154 00000C6A 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 12155 00000C6B 07                      		pop	es
 12156 00000C6C 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 12157 00000C6E A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 12158                                  		;mov	cx, 11 ; PCDOS 7.1 ; 02/09/2023
 12159 00000C71 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 12160                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 12161 00000C74 BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 12162 00000C77 F2AE                    		repne scasb
 12163                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12164                                  		;mov	al, [di+10] ; PCDOS 7.1
 12165                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12166 00000C79 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 12167                                  					; get translation
 12168                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 12169                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 12170 00000C7C 07                      		pop	es
 12171 00000C7D 59                      		pop	cx
 12172 00000C7E F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 12173 00000C7F C3                      		retn
 12174                                  
 12175                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12176                                  
 12177                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 12178                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 12179                                  
 12180                                  set_tim:		
 12181 00000C80 50                      		push	ax
 12182 00000C81 E898F8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 12183                                  
 12184                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 12185                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 12186                                  
 12187 00000C84 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 12188 00000C88 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 12189 00000C8A 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 12190                                  		;jz	short done_set
 12191                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12192 00000C8E 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 12193                                  setaccess:				
 12194 00000C90 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 12195 00000C95 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 12196 00000C99 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 12197                                  done_set:				
 12198 00000C9D F8                      		clc
 12199                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 12200 00000C9E 58                      		pop	ax
 12201 00000C9F C3                      		retn
 12202                                  
 12203                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12204                                  
 12205                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 12206                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 12207                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 12208                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 12209                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 12210                                  
 12211                                  again:	
 12212 00000CA0 E86304                  		call	ResetDisk
 12213 00000CA3 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 12214 00000CA6 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 12215                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 12216 00000CA8 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 12217 00000CA9 C3                      		retn
 12218                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12219                                  
 12220                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 12221 00000CAA 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 12222 00000CAC C3                      		retn

 12234                                  ;
 12235                                  ; NOTE: GetAccessFlag/SetAccessFlag is unpublished function.
 12236                                  ;
 12237                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 12238                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 12239                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 12240                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed
 12241                                  ;						1 disk i/o allowed
 12242                                  ;      SetAccessFlag will set/reset the unformatted_media bit in flags -
 12243                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 allow disk i/o
 12244                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o
 12245                                  ; ==========================================================================

 12252 00000CAD 00                      		db 0
 12253

 12255                                  %if 0
 12256                                  
 12257                                  IoReadJumpTable: db 8	; ((IoWriteJumpTable-IoReadJumpTable)-1)/2
 12258                                  		dw 0CA7h	; 60h	; GetDeviceParameters
 12259                                  		dw 0EE8h	; 61h	;gh ReadTrack
 12260                                  		dw 0E86h	; 62h	; VerifyTrack
 12261                                  		dw 0CA3h	 	; Cmd_Error_Proc
 12262                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 12263                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 12264                                  		dw 119Ah	; 66h	; GetMediaId
 12265                                  		dw 1269h	; 67h	; GetAccessFlag ; unpublished function
 12266                                  		dw 12C1h	; 68h	; SenseMediaType
 12267                                  
 12268                                  IoWriteJumpTable: db 7	; ((IOC_DC_Table-IoWriteJumpTable)-1)/2
 12269                                  		dw 0CF3h	; 40h	; SetDeviceParameters
 12270                                  		dw 0EEFh	; 41h	; WriteTrack
 12271                                  		dw 0DC1h	; 42h	; FormatTrack
 12272                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 12273                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 12274                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 12275                                  		dw 11D2h	; 46h	; SetMediaId
 12276                                  		dw 1280h	; 47h	; SetAccessFlag ; unpublished function
 12277                                  
 12278                                  %endif

 12281 00000CAE 09                      IoReadJumpTable: db ((IoWriteJumpTable-IoReadJumpTable)-1)/2 ; 8
 12282 00000CAF [190D]                  		dw GetDeviceParameters	; 60h
 12283 00000CB1 [5B0F]                  		dw ReadTrack		; 61h
 12284 00000CB3 [FB0E]                  		dw VerifyTrack		; 62h
 12285 00000CB5 [150D]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc
 12286 00000CB7 [150D]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc

 12296 00000CC8 [150D]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc

 12303                                  ; IOC_DC_Table
 12304                                  ;
 12305                                  ; This table contains all of the valid generic IOCtl Minor codes for
 12306                                  ; major function 08 to be used by the Ioctl_Support_Query function.
 12307                                  ; Added for 5.00
 12308                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12309                                  
 12310 00000CD2 60                      IOC_DC_Table:	db 60h			; GET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS
 12311 00000CD3 40                      		db 40h			; SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS
 12312 00000CD4 61                      		db 61h			; READ_TRACK
 12313 00000CD5 41                      		db 41h			; WRITE_TRACK
 12314 00000CD6 62                      		db 62h			; VERIFY_TRACK
 12315 00000CD7 42                      		db 42h			; FORMAT_TRACK
 12316 00000CD8 66                      		db 66h			; GET_MEDIA_ID
 12317 00000CD9 46                      		db 46h			; SET_MEDIA_ID
 12318 00000CDA 67                      		db 67h			; GET_ACCESS_FLAG
 12319 00000CDB 47                      		db 47h			; SET_ACCESS_FLAG
 12320 00000CDC 68                      		db 68h			; SENSE_MEDIA_TYPE
 12321

 12327                                  
 12328                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12329                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 12330                                  ;
 12331                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 12332                                  ;
 12333                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 12334                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 12335                                  ;	subfunctions.
 12336                                  ;
 12337                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12338                                  
 12339                                  ; 11/03/2019
 12340                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12341                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 12342 00000CDD E88DF8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 12343 00000CE0 06                      		push	es
 12344 00000CE1 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 12345 00000CE5 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 12346                                  					; RAWIO
 12347 00000CEA 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 12348 00000CEE 07                      		pop	es
 12349 00000CEF 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 12350                                  
 12351                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 12352                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 12353                                  
 12354                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12355 00000CF1 BE[AE0C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 12356                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 12357                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 12358 00000CF4 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 12359 00000CF6 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 12360                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12361 00000CF8 BE[C10C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 12362                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 12363                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 12364                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 12365 00000CFB 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 12366 00000CFD 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 12367 00000CFF 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 12368 00000D02 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 12369 00000D04 98                      		cbw
 12370 00000D05 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12371 00000D07 46                      		inc	si
 12372 00000D08 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 12373 00000D0A 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 12374                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 12375 00000D0D 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 12376                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12377                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 12378 00000D12 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 12379 00000D14 C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 12380                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12381                                  
 12382                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 12383                                  		; as a fall through from above
 12384                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h
 12385 00000D15 5A                      		pop	dx
 12386                                  
 12387                                  IoctlFuncErr:				
 12388 00000D16 E9BCF3                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 12389                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12390                                  
 12391                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12392                                  
 12393                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12394                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:
 12395                                  ;
 12396                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 12397                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 12398                                  ;
 12399                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 12400                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header
 12401                                  ;	EXIT	??? BUGBUG
 12402                                  ;	USES	??? BUGBUG
 12403                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12404                                  
 12405                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12406                                  GetDeviceParameters:
 12407                                  		; Copy info from bds to the device parameters packet
 12408                                  
 12409 00000D19 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 12410 00000D1D C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12411                                  					; (DS:BX) = return buffer
 12412 00000D20 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+34]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12413 00000D24 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 12414 00000D27 268B4523                		mov	ax, [es:di+35]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12415 00000D2B 83E003                  		and	ax, 3		; fnon_removable+fchangeline
 12416                                  					; Mask off other bits
 12417 00000D2E 894702                  		mov	[bx+2],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]
 12418 00000D31 268B4525                		mov	ax, [es:di+37]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12419 00000D35 894704                  		mov	[bx+4],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 12420 00000D38 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Set media type to default
 12421 00000D3A 884706                  		mov	[bx+6],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_MEDIATYPE]
 12422                                  					
 12423                                  		; copy recommended bpb
 12424 00000D3D 8D7527                  		lea	si, [di+39]	; [di+BDS.rbytespersec]	= [di+BDS.R_BPB]
 12425 00000D40 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 12426                                  					; BUILD_DEVICE_BPB
 12427 00000D43 7412                    		jz	short UseBpbPresent
 12428 00000D45 1E                      		push	ds		; Save request packet segment
 12429 00000D46 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 12430                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12431                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 12432                                  					; Point back to Bios_Data
 12433 00000D4B E887FB                  		call	checksingle
 12434 00000D4E E842F9                  		call	GetBp		; Build	the bpb	from scratch
 12435 00000D51 1F                      		pop	ds		; Restore request packet segment
 12436 00000D52 720F                    		jb	short GetParmRet
 12437 00000D54 8D7506                  		lea	si, [di+6]	; [di+BDS.bytespersec] = [di+BSD.DP_BPB]
 12438                                  					; Use this subfield of bds instead
 12439                                  UseBpbPresent:				
 12440 00000D57 8D7F07                  		lea	di, [bx+7]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB]
 12441                                  					; This is where	the result goes
 12442 00000D5A B91900                  		mov	cx, 25		; A_BPB.size - 6
 12443                                  					; For now use 'small' bpb
 12444 00000D5D 1E                      		push	ds		; reverse segments for copy
 12445 00000D5E 06                      		push	es
 12446 00000D5F 1F                      		pop	ds
 12447 00000D60 07                      		pop	es
 12448 00000D61 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 12449                                  		
 12450                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12451                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction -above- resets cf) 	
 12452                                  		;clc
 12453                                  GetParmRet:				
 12454 00000D63 C3                      		retn
 12455                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12456                                  
 12457                                  ; 17/10/2022
 12458                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12459                                  
 12460                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12461                                  ; SetDeviceParameters:

 12626                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12627                                  ; FormatTrack:
 12628                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 12629                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 12630                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 12631                                  ;
 12632                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 12633                                  ;
 12634                                  ; output:
 12635                                  ;	for status call:
 12636                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 12637                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 12638                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 12639                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 12640                                  ;		3 - no media present
 12641                                  ;	carry cleared.
 12642                                  ;
 12643                                  ;	for format track:
 12644                                  ;		carry set if error
 12645                                  ;
 12646                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12647                                  
 12648                                  ; 16/03/2019
 12649                                  
 12650                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12651                                  FormatTrack:
 12652 00000E37 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 12653 00000E3B C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET
 12654 00000E3E F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 12655                                  					; STATUS_FOR_FORMAT
 12656 00000E41 740E                    		jz	short DoFormatTrack
 12657 00000E43 1E                      		push	ds
 12658                                  		; 17/10/2022

 12662 00000E4C 1F                      		pop	ds
 12663 00000E4D 8807                    		mov	[bx], al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 12664 00000E4F F8                      		clc
 12665 00000E50 C3                      		retn
 12666                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 12697                                  					; about	the illegal combination)
 12698 00000E7E EB66                    		jmp	short FormatFailed

 12701                                  NeedToSetDasd:				
 12702 00000E80 52                      		push	dx

 12704 00000E84 5A                      		pop	dx
 12705                                  NoSetDasd:

 12708 00000E8A A3[3901]                		mov	[trknum], ax
 12709 00000E8D 880E[3801]              		mov	[hdnum], cl	; Store	head from packet
 12710 00000E91 88CC                    		mov	ah, cl

 12712 00000E96 8B0E[3105]              		mov	cx, [sectorspertrack]
 12713

 12716 00000E9C 83C304                  		add	bx, 4		; Skip to next sector field
 12717 00000E9F E2F9                    		loop	StoreCylinderHead
 12718                                  		;mov	cx, 5		; MAXERR - Set up retry	count
 12719                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12720 00000EA1 B105                    		mov	cl, 5
 12721                                  FormatRetry:

 12743                                  FormatError:

 12785 00000F00 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12786                                  
 12787                                  		; Come here with DS:[BX] -> packet, ES:[DI] -> bds
 12788                                  
 12789 00000F03 8B4F03                  		mov	cx, [bx+3]	; [bx+A_VERIFYPACKET.VP_CYLINDER]
 12790 00000F06 8B4701                  		mov	ax, [bx+1]	; [bx+A_VERIFYPACKET.VP_HEAD]
 12791 00000F09 8B5705                  		mov	dx, [bx+5]	; [bx+A_FORMATPACKET.FP_TRACKCOUNT]
 12792 00000F0C 8A1F                    		mov	bl, [bx]	; [bx+A_FORMATPACKET.FP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 12793                                  					; Get option flag word
 12794 00000F0E 1F                      		pop	ds
 12795 00000F0F C606[2001]04            		mov	byte [rflag], 4	; romverify
 12796 00000F14 890E[3301]              		mov	[curtrk], cx

 12798 00000F1B 8B0E[3105]              		mov	cx, [sectorspertrack]
 12799                                  
 12800                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 12801                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 12802                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 12803                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 12804                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 12805                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 12806                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 12807                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 12808                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay
 12809                                  		; we initalise cx to the total sectors. use ax as a temporary
 12810                                  		; register.
 12811                                  
 12812                                  					; Special function requested?

 12814 00000F22 7421                    		jz	short NormVerifyTrack
 12815 00000F24 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx		; Get ax = number of trks to verify
 12816 00000F26 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 12817 00000F28 752C                    		jnz	short VerifyTrack_Err ; #tracks > 255
 12818 00000F2A F6E1                    		mul	cl
 12819 00000F2C 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 12820 00000F2E 7526                    		jnz	short VerifyTrack_Err ; #sectors > 255	
 12821 00000F30 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
 12822                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12823 00000F32 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+35], 1
 12824                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12825                                  					; fnon_removable
 12826 00000F37 740C                    		jz	short NormVerifyTrack
 12827                                  					; Multitrack operation = on?
 12828                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12829                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12830 00000F39 F606[2705]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 12831                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 12832                                  		;;test	ds:multrk_flag,	80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 12833 00000F3E 7405                    		jz	short NormVerifyTrack
 12834 00000F40 C606[2E05]01            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1
 12835                                  NormVerifyTrack:			
 12836 00000F45 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax		; 1st sector
 12837 00000F47 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx
 12838 00000F49 891E[2F05]              		mov	[xfer_seg], bx	; Use 0:0 as the transfer address for verify
 12839 00000F4D E83F00                  		call	TrackIo

 12913                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12914                                  
 12915                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12916                                  
 12917                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12918                                  ;
 12919                                  ; TrackIo:
 12920                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 12921                                  ;
 12922                                  ;   input:
 12923                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 12924                                  ;		  3 = write
 12925                                  ;		  4 = verify
 12926                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 12927                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 12928                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 12929                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 12930                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 12931                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 12932                                  ;
 12933                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12934                                  
 12935                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12936                                  		
 12937                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12938                                  TrackIo:	
 12939                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 12940 00000F8F 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 12941 00000F93 E83FF9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 12942 00000F96 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1

 12949 00000FA3 58                      		pop	ax

 12953 00000FA9 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1

 12957                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 12958                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration

 12973                                  					; the track table

 12977                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 12978                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 12979                                  		;     only CL is valid.

 12991                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 12992 00000FCD 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 12993 00000FCF 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 12994 00000FD3 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx

 12996 00000FD8 5A                      		pop	dx
 12997 00000FD9 59                      		pop	cx

 12999 00000FDB C3                      		retn

 13001                                  
 13002                                  IoRemovable:

 13004                                  					; table	and save it

 13087                                  ; SetDASD

 13097                                  SetDasd:
 13098 00001014 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;
 13099                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type

 13101                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13102 0000101B 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h

 13104                                  					; set_dasd_true
 13105 00001020 7447                    		jz	short DasdHasBeenSet
 13106                                  		; 10/12/2022

 13109                                  					; ~set_dasd_true
 13110                                  DoSetDasd:
 13111 00001027 C606[3106]00            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 0 ; Reset it
 13112 0000102C C606[3B01]50            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 50h ; Format gap for 48tpi disks

 13163                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 13164                                  DasdHasBeenSet:
 13165 00001069 268A6513                		mov	ah, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]

 13169                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13170                                  
 13171                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13172                                  
 13173                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13174                                  ;
 13175                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 13176                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 13177                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 13178                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 13179                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 13180                                  ;
 13181                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 13182                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 13183                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 13184                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 13185                                  ;
 13186                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 13187                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 13188                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 13189                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 13190                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 13191                                  ;
 13192                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13193                                  
 13194                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13195                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 13196 00001072 51                      		push	cx
 13197 00001073 52                      		push	dx
 13198                                  
 13199                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 13200                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 13201                                  
 13202 00001074 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 13203 00001079 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 13204 0000107B 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 13205 0000107D 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13206 00001082 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 13207 00001084 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 13208                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13209                                  
 13210                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 13211 00001086 06                      		push	es
 13212 00001087 56                      		push	si
 13213                                  
 13214                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13215                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors

 13217 0000108A 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 13218                                  
 13219 0000108C 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 13220                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 13221                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 13222 00001091 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 13223 00001095 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 13224

 13226                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.

 13231                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:
 13232 000010A0 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 13233 000010A4 49                      		dec	cx

 13236 000010AA D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1

 13243 000010B9 57                      		push	di
 13244 000010BA B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 13245 000010BC CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 13246                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 13247 000010BE 7231                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 13248 000010C0 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 13249 000010C5 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting

 13251                                  
 13252                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13253                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 13254 000010C8 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 13255 000010CA 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0

 13258 000010CD 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]

 13260                                  					; Get current disk base	table

 13263

 13266                                  		;xor	si, si ; 0

 13331                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13332                                  ;
 13333                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 13334                                  ;
 13335                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 13336                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 13337                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 13338                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 13339                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 13340                                  ;
 13341                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13342                                  
 13343                                  ResetDisk:
 13344 00001106 50                      		push	ax
 13345                                  
 13346                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13347 00001107 B80100                  		mov	ax, 1 ; PCDOS 7.1
 13348 0000110A 3806[3006]              		cmp	[media_set_for_format], al ; 1
 13349                                  		;cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13350                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 13351 0000110E 7503                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 13352                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 13353                                  		;mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 13354 00001110 A2[3106]                		mov	[had_format_error], al ; 1
 13355                                  ResetDisk_cont:
 13356                                  		; 02/09/2023 (ah=0)
 13357                                  		;xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 13358 00001113 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 13359                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 13360 00001115 C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 13361                                  					; Zap up the speed
 13362 0000111A 58                      		pop	ax
 13363 0000111B C3                      		retn

 13367                                  ; 16/10/2022

 13369                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13370                                  ;
 13371                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 13372                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 13373                                  ;
 13374                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 13375                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 13376                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 13377                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 13378                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 13379                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 13380                                  ;
 13381                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 13382                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 13383                                  ;
 13384                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13385                                  
 13386                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13387                                  ToRom:	
 13388 0000111C 53                      		push	bx
 13389 0000111D 56                      		push	si
 13390                                  
 13391                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 13392                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 13393                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]
 13394                                  
 13395 0000111E F606[3006]01            		test	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13396 00001123 7536                    		jnz	short GotValidDpt
 13397 00001125 50                      		push	ax
 13398 00001126 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 13399 00001127 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 13400                                  					; ffSmall ; is it a 3.5" drive?

 13402 0000112D 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]

 13404 00001131 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]

 13407 00001136 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si

 13409                                  		
 13410 0000113E A0[3701]                		mov	al, [formt_eot]
 13411 00001141 26884404                		mov	[es:si+4], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]

 13414                                  					; Important for	format

 13416                                  					; Assume we are	doing a	seek operation
 13417                                  					; Setup	motor start correctly for 3.5" drives
 13418 00001151 9D                      		popf			; Get result of	earlier	cmp
 13419 00001152 7505                    		jnz	short MotorStrtOK

 13421                                  MotorStrtOK:				
 13422 00001159 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 13423 0000115A 58                      		pop	ax
 13424                                  GotValidDpt:				
 13425 0000115B 8B16[3901]              		mov	dx, [trknum]	; Set track number

 13427 00001161 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; Set drive number

 13433 00001171 5E                      		pop	si
 13434 00001172 5B                      		pop	bx
 13435 00001173 C3                      		retn

 13439                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)

 13441                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 13442                                  
 13443                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13444                                  ;
 13445                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 13446                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 13447                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 13448                                  ;
 13449                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13450                                  
 13451                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13452                                  ioctl_getown:
 13453 00001174 E8F6F3                  		call	SetDrive
 13454 00001177 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13455                                  					; Get physical drive number
 13456 0000117B C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 13457                                  ownloop:				
 13458 0000117F 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13459 00001183 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 13460                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13461 00001185 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 13462                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13463                                  					; fi_own_physical
 13464 0000118A 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 13465                                  getnextBDS:				
 13466 0000118C 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 13467 0000118F EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 13468                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13469                                  
 13470                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13471                                  ;
 13472                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 13473                                  ; in al to al.
 13474                                  ;
 13475                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13476                                  
 13477                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13478                                  ioctl_setown:
 13479 00001191 E8D9F3                  		call	SetDrive
 13480 00001194 C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 13481                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 13482 00001199 E839F7                  		call	checksingle
 13483                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13484 0000119C FE0E[7A00]              		dec	byte [fsetowner] ; 0
 13485                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 13486                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 13487                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 13488                                  
 13489                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13490                                  ;
 13491                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 13492                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 13493                                  ;
 13494                                  ; ==========================================================================

 13496                                  exitown:

 13498                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13499 000011A2 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 13500                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13501                                  					; fi_am_mult
 13502 000011A7 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult

 13504                                  					; Get logical drive number
 13505                                  					; Get it 1-based
 13506 000011AD FEC1                    		inc	cl
 13507                                  exitnomult:				
 13508 000011AF C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 13509 000011B3 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 13510                                  					; Exit normal termination
 13511                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13512                                  		; cf=0
 13513                                  		;clc
 13514 000011B6 C3                      		retn
