 15428                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 15429                                  
 15430                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 15431                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 15432                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 15433                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 15434                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 15435                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 15436                                  
 15437                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 15438 000017F1 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 15439 000017F3 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 15439 000017FC 736B6574746520666F-
 15439 00001805 7220647269766520   
 15440                                  
 15441                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 15442 0000180D 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 15442 00001816 65737320616E79206B-
 15442 0000181F 6579207768656E2072-
 15442 00001828 656164790D0A       
 15443 0000182E 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 15444                                  
 15445                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15446                                  
 15447                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15448                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15449                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 15450                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 15451                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15452                                  
 15453                                  chkopcnt:		
 15454 00001830 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 15455 00001835 C3                      		retn
 15456                                  
 15457                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15458                                  
 15459                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15460                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 15461                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 15462                                  ;
 15463                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15464                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15465                                  
 15466                                  mediacheck:	
 15467 00001836 E89CF0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 15468 00001839 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15469 0000183B E84D01                  		call	haschange
 15470 0000183E 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 15471 00001840 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 15472 00001843 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 15473 00001845 50                      		push	ax
 15474 00001846 52                      		push	dx
 15475 00001847 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15476                                  					; set logical drive number
 15477 0000184B B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 15478 0000184D CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 15479                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 15480                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 15481 0000184F 5A                      		pop	dx
 15482 00001850 58                      		pop	ax
 15483 00001851 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 15484 00001853 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 15485                                  
 15486                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 15487                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 15488                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 15489                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 15490                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 15491                                  ; status.
 15492                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15493 00001856 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 15494 0000185A 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15495                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 15496                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 15497                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 15498                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 15499 0000185E 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 15500                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 15501                                  
 15502                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 15503                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 15504                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 15505                                  
 15506 00001860 50                      		push	ax
 15507 00001861 51                      		push	cx
 15508 00001862 52                      		push	dx
 15509 00001863 E88DED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 15510 00001866 5A                      		pop	dx
 15511 00001867 59                      		pop	cx
 15512 00001868 58                      		pop	ax
 15513 00001869 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15514 0000186B 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 15515                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 15516 0000186D 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 15517                                  mediaret:				
 15518 0000186F C3                      		retn
 15519                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15520                                  
 15521                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 15522                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 15523                                  ; or write.
 15524                                  
 15525                                  mediadovolid:				
 15526 00001870 E820EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 15527 00001873 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 15528 00001875 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 15529 00001878 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 15530 0000187A E9EBF3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15531                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15532                                  
 15533                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 15534                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 15535                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 15536                                  ; dos.
 15537                                  ;
 15538                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 15539                                  
 15540                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15541                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 15542                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 15543                                  
 15544                                  checklatchio:	
 15545                                  
 15546                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 15547                                  			
 15548 0000187D E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15549 00001880 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 15550                                  
 15551                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 15552                                  
 15553 00001882 E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 15554 00001885 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 15555                                  
 15556                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 15557                                  ; expensive verification.
 15558                                  
 15559 00001887 E809EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 15560 0000188A 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 15561 0000188C E81600                  		call	check_vid
 15562 0000188F 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 15563 00001891 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15564 00001893 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 15565 00001895 E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 15566                                  checklatchret:				
 15567 00001898 E8CDF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15568                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 15569 0000189B F9                      		stc
 15570 0000189C 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 15571                                  checkret:				
 15572 0000189D C3                      		retn
 15573                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15574                                  
 15575                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 15576                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 15577                                  ;
 15578                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15579                                  
 15580                                  checkfatvid:				
 15581 0000189E E8BD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 15582 000018A1 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15583 000018A3 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 15584                                  
 15585                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 15586                                  
 15587                                  		; fall into check_vid
 15588                                  
 15589                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15590                                  
 15591                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 15592                                  ;
 15593                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 15594                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 15595                                  ;
 15596                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 15597                                  ;
 15598                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 15599                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 15600                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 15601                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 15602                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 15603                                  ;
 15604                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 15605                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 15606                                  ; routine.)
 15607                                  ;
 15608                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 15609                                  
 15610                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15611                                  check_vid:
 15612                                  
 15613                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 15614                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 15615                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 15616                                  
 15617 000018A5 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 15618                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 15619                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 15620 000018AA 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 15621 000018AC E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 15622 000018AF 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 15623 000018B1 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15624 000018B3 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 15625                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 15626 000018B8 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 15627                                  					; if not fat system
 15628 000018BA E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 15629 000018BD 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 15630 000018BF E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 15631 000018C2 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15632                                  					; definitely changed
 15633 000018C5 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 15634                                  
 15635 000018C7 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 15636                                  vid_no_changed:				
 15637 000018C8 E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 15638                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15639                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 15640                                  		;clc
 15641                                  checkfatret:				
 15642 000018CB C3                      		retn
 15643                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15644                                  
 15645                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15646                                  changed_drv:
 15647 000018CC F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 15648 000018CD C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 15649                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 15650 000018D2 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 15651                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15652                                  
 15653                                  ; extended id check
 15654                                  
 15655                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15656                                  
 15657                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 15658                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 15659                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 15660                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 15661                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 15662                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 15663                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 15664                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 15665                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 15666                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 15667                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 15668                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 15669                                  ;
 15670                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 15671                                  
 15672                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15673                                  do_ext_check_id:
 15674 000018D3 50                      		push	ax
 15675                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 15676                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 15677 000018D4 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 15678                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15679 000018D7 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15680 000018D9 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 15681 000018DD 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15682 000018DF A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 15683 000018E2 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 15684 000018E6 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15685                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 15686                                  					; don't know
 15687 000018E8 58                      		pop	ax
 15688 000018E9 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 15689                                  					; reset the flag
 15690                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15691                                  
 15692                                  ext_changed:
 15693 000018EB 58                      		pop	ax
 15694                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15695 000018EC 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 15696                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15697                                  					; disk changed!
 15698                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15699                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 15700                                  		;clc
 15701 000018ED EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 15702                                  
 15703                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15704                                  
 15705                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 15706                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 15707                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 15708                                  ;
 15709                                  ; es:di -> bds
 15710                                  
 15711                                  checkio:				
 15712 000018EF 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 15713 000018F2 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 15714 000018F4 E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15715 000018F7 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 15716 000018F9 E897ED                  		call	GetBp
 15717 000018FC 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 15718 000018FE E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 15719 00001901 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 15720 00001903 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15721 00001905 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 15722 00001907 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 15723 00001908 C3                      		retn
 15724                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15725                                  
 15726                                  checkioerr:				
 15727 00001909 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 15728                                  
 15729                                  checkioret:				
 15730 0000190C F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 15731 0000190D E908F3                  		jmp	harderr
 15732                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15733                                  
 15734                                  no_error_map:				
 15735 00001910 E908F3                  		jmp	harderr2
 15736                                  
 15737                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15738                                  
 15739                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 15740                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 15741                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 15742                                  
 15743                                  returnvid:		
 15744 00001913 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 15745                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 15746 00001916 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 15747 00001919 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 15748 0000191B F9                      		stc
 15749 0000191C C3                      		retn
 15750                                  
 15751                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15752                                  
 15753                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 15754                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 15755                                  ;
 15756                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 15757                                  ; **trashes si**
 15758                                  
 15759                                  media_set_vid:				
 15760 0000191D BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 15761                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 15762                                  
 15763                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 15764                                  
 15765                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15766                                  
 15767                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 15768                                  
 15769                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15770                                  vid_into_packet:
 15771 00001920 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 15772 00001921 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 15773 00001925 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15774 00001928 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 15775 0000192A 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15776 0000192D 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 15777 00001930 1F                      		pop	ds
 15778                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 15779 00001931 C3                      		retn
 15780                                  
 15781                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15782                                  
 15783                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15784                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 15785                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 15786                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 15787                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 15788                                  ;
 15789                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 15790                                  ;		ah has media byte
 15791                                  ;
 15792                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 15793                                  ;		    no registers modified
 15794                                  ;		carry set
 15795                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 15796                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 15797                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 15798                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 15799                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 15800                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 15801                                  ;
 15802                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15803                                  
 15804                                  hidensity:
 15805                                  
 15806                                  ; check for correct drive
 15807                                  		
 15808                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15809 00001932 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15810                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 15811                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 15812 00001937 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 15813                                  
 15814                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 15815                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 15816                                  
 15817 00001939 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 15818 0000193E 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 15819                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 15820                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 15821 00001940 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 15822 00001943 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 15823                                  
 15824                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 15825                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 15826                                  
 15827                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15828 00001945 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15829 00001949 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 15830                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15831                                  					; ffOther
 15832 0000194B 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 15833 0000194D 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 15834                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15835                                  					; ff288
 15836 0000194F 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 15837 00001951 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 15838 00001953 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 15839                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 15840                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 15841 00001956 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 15842                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 15843                                  					; 2 sides
 15844                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15845 00001959 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 15846 0000195A BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 15847                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 15848                                  					; & head max
 15849                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15850 0000195D E9A5ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 15851                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15852                                  
 15853                                  Is720K:
 15854                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15855 00001960 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 15856                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15857 00001961 E968ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 15858                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15859                                  
 15860                                  		; 18/12/2022
 15861                                  ;dofloppy:
 15862                                  		;retn
 15863                                  
 15864                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15865                                  
 15866                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15867                                  
 15868                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15869                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 15870                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 15871                                  ;
 15872                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 15873                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 15874                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15875                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 15876                                  ;
 15877                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 15878                                  ;
 15879                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 15880                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15881                                  
 15882                                  set_changed_dl:	
 15883 00001964 06                      		push	es
 15884 00001965 57                      		push	di
 15885                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 15886                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15887 00001966 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 15888                                  
 15889                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 15890                                  
 15891                                  scan_bds:				
 15892 0000196A 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15893 0000196E 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 15894                                  
 15895                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 15896                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 15897                                  
 15898 00001970 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15899                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 15900                                  get_next_bds:				
 15901 00001974 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 15902                                  					; go to	next bds
 15903 00001977 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 15904 0000197A 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 15905 0000197C 5F                      		pop	di
 15906 0000197D 07                      		pop	es
 15907 0000197E C3                      		retn
 15908                                  
 15909                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15910                                  
 15911                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15912                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 15913                                  ;
 15914                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 15915                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 15916                                  ;		zero reset - change
 15917                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15918                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15919                                  
 15920                                  checkromchange:	
 15921                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 15922                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15923 0000197F 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 15924                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15925                                  					; fchanged
 15926 00001984 C3                      		retn
 15927                                  
 15928                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15929                                  
 15930                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15931                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 15932                                  ;
 15933                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15934                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15935                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15936                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15937                                  
 15938                                  resetchanged:	
 15939                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 15940                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15941 00001985 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 15942                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15943                                  					; ~fchanged
 15944 0000198A C3                      		retn
 15945                                  
 15946                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15947                                  
 15948                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15949                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 15950                                  ;
 15951                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15952                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 15953                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 15954                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15955                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15956                                  
 15957                                  haschange:
 15958                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 15959                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15960 0000198B 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15961                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15962                                  					; fchangeline
 15963 00001990 C3                      		retn
 15964                                  
 15965                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15966                                  
 15967                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15968                                  
 15969                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15970                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 15971                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15972                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 15973                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 15974                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15975                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15976                                  
 15977                                  ; set_volume_id
 15978                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 15979                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 15980                                  ;
 15981                                  ;   on entry:
 15982                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 15983                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 15984                                  ;
 15985                                  ;   on exit:
 15986                                  ;	carry clear:
 15987                                  ;	   successful call
 15988                                  ;	carry set
 15989                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 15990                                  
 15991                                  set_volume_id:				
 15992 00001991 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 15993 00001992 50                      		push	ax
 15994 00001993 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 15995 00001996 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 15996 00001998 E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 15997 0000199B 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 15998 0000199D E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 15999 000019A0 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 16000                                  setvret:				
 16001                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16002                                  		; cf = 0
 16003                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 16004 000019A3 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 16005 000019A4 5A                      		pop	dx
 16006 000019A5 C3                      		retn
 16007                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16008                                  
 16009                                  seterr:					
 16010 000019A6 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 16011 000019A7 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 16012 000019A8 C3                      		retn
 16013                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16014 000019A9 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 16015                                  
 16016                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16017                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 16018                                  ; 09/12/2022
 16019                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 16020                                  
 16021                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16022                                  
 16023                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16024                                  
 16025                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 16026                                  ;
 16027                                  ;   on entry:
 16028                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 16029                                  ;
 16030                                  ;   on exit:
 16031                                  ;	carry clear
 16032                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 16033                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 16034                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 16035                                  ;
 16036                                  ;	carry set:
 16037                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 16038                                  
 16039                                  read_volume_id:
 16040 000019AB 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 16041 000019AC 51                      		push	cx
 16042 000019AD 53                      		push	bx
 16043 000019AE 50                      		push	ax
 16044 000019AF 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 16045 000019B0 57                      		push	di
 16046 000019B1 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 16047 000019B2 07                      		pop	es
 16048 000019B3 BF[AA08]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16049 000019B6 BE[9E08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16050                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; PCDOS 7.1 - 02/09/2023
 16051 000019B9 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 16052 000019BC F3A4                    		rep movsb
 16053 000019BE 5F                      		pop	di
 16054 000019BF 07                      		pop	es
 16055 000019C0 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 16056                                  					; # of fats
 16057 000019C4 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 16058                                  					; sectors / fat
 16059 000019C8 F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 16060 000019CA 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 16061                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 16062                                  					;
 16063                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 16064                                  		; 17/10/2022
 16065 000019CE 2EA3[A919]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 16066                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 16067                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 16068 000019D2 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 16069                                  					; # root dir entries
 16070 000019D6 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 16071 000019D8 D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 16072                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 16073                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 16074 000019DA 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 16075                                  next_sec:
 16076 000019DB 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 16077 000019DC 2EA1[A919]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 16078                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 16079                                  					; get sector #
 16080 000019E0 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 16081                                  					; sectors / track
 16082 000019E4 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 16083 000019E6 F7F1                    		div	cx
 16084                                  
 16085                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 16086                                  
 16087 000019E8 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 16088                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 16089 000019E9 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 16090 000019EB 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 16091 000019ED 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 16092                                  					; # heads on this disc
 16093 000019F1 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 16094 000019F3 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 16095 000019F5 E81BEE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 16096                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 16097 000019F8 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 16098 000019FA B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 16099 000019FD B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 16100                                  fvid_loop:
 16101                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16102 000019FF 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0				
 16103                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 16104 00001A01 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 16105 00001A03 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 16106 00001A06 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 16107 00001A08 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 16108 00001A0B 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 16109                                  ent_loop:
 16110 00001A0D 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 16111 00001A10 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 16112 00001A12 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 16113 00001A13 2EFF06[A919]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 16114                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 16115                                  					; next sector
 16116 00001A18 E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 16117                                  notfound:
 16118                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16119                                  		;xor	si, si
 16120 00001A1A EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 16121                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16122                                  
 16123                                  found_vid:
 16124                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16125                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  			
 16126 00001A1C 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 16127 00001A1D 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 16128 00001A1F 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 16129 00001A20 57                      		push	di
 16130 00001A21 1E                      		push	ds
 16131 00001A22 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 16132 00001A23 BF[AA08]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16133 00001A26 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 16134                                  					; length of string minus nul
 16135 00001A29 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 16136                                  		;xor	al, al
 16137                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16138 00001A2B 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 16139 00001A2C AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 16140                                  		;;xor	si, si
 16141                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16142                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 16143 00001A2D 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 16144 00001A2E 07                      		pop	es
 16145                                  fvid_ret:
 16146                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16147 00001A2F 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 16148                                  				
 16149 00001A31 58                      		pop	ax
 16150                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16151                                  		; cf = 0
 16152                                  		;clc
 16153                                  rvidret:
 16154 00001A32 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 16155 00001A33 59                      		pop	cx
 16156 00001A34 5A                      		pop	dx
 16157 00001A35 C3                      		retn
 16158                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16159                                  
 16160                                  no_vid:
 16161 00001A36 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 16162                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 16163                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16164 00001A37 EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 16165                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16166                                  
 16167                                  readviderr:
 16168 00001A39 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 16169 00001A3A 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 16170 00001A3B EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 16171                                  
 16172                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16173                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 16174                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 16175                                  preset_volid_addr:
 16176 00001A3D BE[AA08]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 16177                                  		;
 16178                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 16179                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 16180                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 16181                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 16182 00001A40 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16183 00001A43 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 16184                                  		;
 16185 00001A46 FC                      		cld
 16186 00001A47 C3                      		retn
 16187                                  
 16188                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16189                                  
 16190                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 16191                                  ;
 16192                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 16193                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 16194                                  
 16195                                  transfer_volume_id:
 16196 00001A48 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 16197 00001A49 56                      		push	si
 16198 00001A4A 51                      		push	cx
 16199                                  		
 16200                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16201                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 16202                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16203                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 16204                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 16205                                  		;cld
 16206                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16207 00001A4B E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 16208                                  
 16209 00001A4E F3A4                    		rep movsb
 16210 00001A50 59                      		pop	cx
 16211 00001A51 5E                      		pop	si
 16212 00001A52 5F                      		pop	di
 16213 00001A53 C3                      		retn
 16214                                  
 16215                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16216                                  
 16217                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 16218                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 16219                                  ;
 16220                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 16221                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 16222                                  
 16223                                  check_volume_id:
 16224 00001A54 57                      		push	di
 16225 00001A55 51                      		push	cx
 16226                                  		
 16227                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16228                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 16229                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16230                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 16231                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 16232                                  		;cld
 16233                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16234 00001A56 E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 16235                                  
 16236 00001A59 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 16237 00001A5B 59                      		pop	cx
 16238 00001A5C 5F                      		pop	di
 16239 00001A5D C3                      		retn
 16240                                  
 16241                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16242                                  
 16243                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 16244                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 16245                                  ;
 16246                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 16247                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 16248                                  ;
 16249                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 16250                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 16251                                  ;
 16252                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 16253                                  
 16254                                  fat_check:		
 16255 00001A5E 50                      		push	ax
 16256 00001A5F 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 16257 00001A61 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 16258 00001A64 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 16259                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 16260 00001A68 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 16261 00001A6A 4E                      		dec	si
 16262                                  okret1:					
 16263 00001A6B 58                      		pop	ax
 16264 00001A6C C3                      		retn
 16265                                  
 16266                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16267                                  
 16268                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 16269                                  		;times 7 db 0
 16270                                  
 16271                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 16272                                  
 16273                                  		; 09/12/2022
 16274                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 16275                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 16276                                  
 16277                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16278                                  
 16279                                  		; 09/12/2022
 16280                                  		;db 0
 16281                                  
 16282                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 16283                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 16284                                  
 16285                                  %if (number2mod>0) & (number2mod<16) ; 17/09/2023
 16286 00001A6D 00<rep 3h>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 16287                                  %endif
 16288                                  
 16289                                  ;align 16
 16290                                  
 16291                                  ; 09/12/2022
 16292                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 16293                                  ; 29/09/2023
 16294                                  BCODEEND:
 16295                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 16296                                  ; 13/12/2022
 16297                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 16298                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 16299

 16301                                  ; (SYSINITSEG is 473h for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
