 32035                                  
 32036                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32037                                  ;*** AddrToUmb - converts a segment address in AX to its appropriate UMB number
 32038                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32039                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a segment address
 32040                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain the UMB number which contains the address (0==conv)
 32041                                  ; ERROR:  If the address is above UM Range, AX will return as FFFF.
 32042                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 32043                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32044                                  ; An address in the following areas is treated as:
 32045                                  ;    0      <-> umbhead (0x9FFF)          = Conventional memory
 32046                                  ;    0x9FFF <-> addr of first UM sys MCB  = UMB #1
 32047                                  ;      ...
 32048                                  ;    addr of last UM sys MCB <-> TOM      = invalid; returns #0xFFFF
 32049                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32050                                  
 32051                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 32052                                  AddrToUmb:
 32053                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32054                                  	;push	cx
 32055                                  	;push	dx
 32056 00002C49 06                      	push	es
 32057                                  
 32058 00002C4A 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; DX = address to search for
 32059                                  
 32060 00002C4C E8DDFF                  	call	UmbHead		; AX = first segment
 32061 00002C4F 7222                    	jc	short atuE	; If it couldn't get it, error out.
 32062                                  
 32063                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32064                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *	; ES = first UMB segment
 32065 00002C51 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx ; 0	; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now... (cx = UMB#)
 32066                                  
 32067                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32068                                  atu10:
 32069 00002C53 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; ** ; 22/07/2023
 32070                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 32071                                  ; ATU10--ES - Current MCB address
 32072                                  ;        DX - Address given for conversion
 32073                                  ;        CX - Current UMB #
 32074                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 32075                                  
 32076                                  ;atu10:	
 32077                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 18/07/2023
 32078 00002C55 39D0                            cmp	ax,dx		; Present segment >= given segment?
 32079 00002C57 731D                    	jae	short atuX	; Yep--done.
 32080                                  
 32081 00002C59 E8DDFF                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if this is a system MCB
 32082 00002C5C 7501                    	jnz	short atu20
 32083                                  
 32084 00002C5E 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ a system MCB, we're in a new UMB.
 32085                                  atu20:	
 32086                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32087                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 32088                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32089                                  	; ax = es
 32090                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 32091 00002C5F 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32092 00002C64 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32093 00002C6A 7403                    	je	short atu30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 32094                                  
 32095                                  	;NextMCB es,ax
 32096                                  
 32097                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 32098                                  	;;add	ax,[es:3]
 32099                                  	;add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32100 00002C6C 40                      	inc	ax
 32101                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32102                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 32103 00002C6D EBE4                    	jmp	short atu10
 32104                                  
 32105                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32106                                  ; if we get to atu30, they specified a number that was past the last MCB.
 32107                                  ; make sure it's not _inside_ that MCB before we return an error condition.
 32108                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32109                                  
 32110                                  atu30:	
 32111                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32112                                  	; ax = es + [es:ARENA.SIZE] 
 32113                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 32114                                  	;add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE] ; **
 32115 00002C6F 39D0                    	cmp	ax,dx		; Present >= given?
 32116 00002C71 7303                    	jae	short atuX	; Yep! It _was_ inside.
 32117                                  atuE:	
 32118 00002C73 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx ; 0	; Else, fall through with UMB # == -1
 32119 00002C75 49                      	dec	cx		; (that makes it return 0xFFFF and sets CF)
 32120                                  atuX:	
 32121 00002C76 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx		; Return the UMB number in AX
 32122                                  	
 32123 00002C78 07                      	pop	es	
 32124                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32125                                  	;pop	dx
 32126                                  	;pop	cx
 32127 00002C79 C3                      	retn
 32128                                  
 32129                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32130                                  ;*** convUMB - checks after GetXNum to convert an address to a UMB number
 32131                                  ;            -- if GetXNum read a hex number, we interperete that as a segment
 32132                                  ; address rather than a UMB number... and use that address to look up a UMB.
 32133                                  ; This routine checks for that condition and calls AddrToUmb if necessary.
 32134                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32135                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a UMB number or segment, gnradix has been set by GetXNum
 32136                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain a UMB number

 32142                                  convUMB:

 32144 00002C80 7507                    	jne	short cu10	; If it didn't read in hex, it's not an address
 32145 00002C82 E8C4FF                  	call	AddrToUmb	; Else, convert the address to a UMB number

 32149                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32150 00002C85 40                      	inc	ax
 32151 00002C86 7401                    	jz	short cu10	; If too high, ignore it (make it conventional)
 32152 00002C88 48                      	dec	ax
 32153                                  cu10:	
 32154 00002C89 C3                      	retn

 32184                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32185                                  ;*** loadLow - returns AL==0 if UMB0 == 0, else AL==1
 32186                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32187                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 32188                                  ; EXIT:   AL==0 if mem strategy should be set to LOW_FIRST, else AL==1
 32189                                  ;         Carry set if UMB0 not specified (_NOT_ an error)
 32190                                  ; ERROR:  None
 32191                                  ; USES:   Flags, fm_strat, fm_umb
 32192                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32193                                  ; We want to set the memory strategy to LOW_FIRST if the user specified a
 32194                                  ; load UMB, and it is 0. That 0 can be either from the user having _specified_
 32195                                  ; zero (/L:0;...), or from having specified a too-big min size (/L:1,99999999)
 32196                                  ; such that the load UMB is too small, and shouldn't be used.
 32197                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32198                                  
 32199                                  loadLow:
 32200                                  	;push	ds
 32201                                  	;push	cs		; Point DS into appropriate data segment
 32202                                  	;pop	ds	
 32203                                  
 32204                                  	;mov	al,[UmbLoad]
 32205                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad]
 32206                                  	cmp	al,UNSPECIFIED ; 0FFh, -1
 32207                                  	jne	short ll10
 32208                                  
 32209                                  	stc
 32210                                  ll15:
 32211                                  	mov	al,1		; Return with AL==1 && STC if no UMBs specified
 32212                                  	;stc
 32213                                  	;jmp	short llX
 32214                                  	retn
 32215                                  ll10:	
 32216                                  	or	al,al		; AL=the load UMB: Is it == 0?
 32217                                  	;jz	short llX	; Yep... CF==0 (from OR) && AL=0, so just exit
 32218                                  
 32219                                  	jnz	short ll15	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32220                                  	retn
 32221                                  
 32222                                  	;mov	al,1
 32223                                  	;clc
 32224                                  ;llX:
 32225                                  	;pop	ds		; Return DS to where it was
 32226                                  	;retn
 32227                                  
 32228                                  %endif

 32691                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32692                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 32693                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 32694                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32695                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 32696                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 32697                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 32698                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 32699                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32700                                  
 32701                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32702                                  	; (SYSINIT:3344h)
 32703                                  findUMB:
 32704                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32705                                  	;push	ax
 32706                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32707 00002D52 51                      	push	cx ; *
 32708                                  	;push	dx
 32709                                  
 32710 00002D53 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 32711                                  
 32712 00002D55 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 32713                                  
 32714 00002D57 E8D2FE                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 32715                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32716                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 32717 00002D5A 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 32718                                  
 32719                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32720                                  fu10:
 32721 00002D5C 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; **
 32722                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32723                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 32724                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 32725                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 32726                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32727                                  
 32728                                  ;fu10:	
 32729 00002D5E 39D1                    	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 32730 00002D60 7417                    	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 32731                                  
 32732 00002D62 E8D4FE                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 32733 00002D65 7501                    	jnz	short fu20
 32734                                  
 32735 00002D67 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 32736                                  fu20:	
 32737                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32738                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32739                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32740 00002D68 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end 
 32741 00002D6E 7408                    	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 32742                                  
 32743                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 32744                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32745                                  	; ax = es
 32746                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 22/07/2023
 32747                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32748 00002D70 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32749 00002D75 40                      	inc	ax
 32750                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32751                                  	;mov	es,ax ; **
 32752 00002D76 EBE4                    	jmp	short fu10
 32753                                  fuE:	
 32754 00002D78 F9                      	stc
 32755                                  fuX:
 32756                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32757                                  	;pop	dx
 32758                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32759 00002D79 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 32760                                  	;pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 32761 00002D7A C3                      	retn
 32762                                  
 32763                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32764                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 32765                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32766                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 32767                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 32768                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 32769                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 32770                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32771                                  
 32772                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 32773                                  BigFree:
 32774                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32775                                  	;push	bx
 32776 00002D7B 51                      	push	cx
 32777                                  
 32778 00002D7C E8D3FF                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 32779 00002D7F 723A                    	jc	short bfX		; (would be "jc bfE"; it just does stc)
 32780                                  
 32781 00002D81 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 32782 00002D83 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 32783                                  
 32784                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32785                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 32786                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 32787                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 32788                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32789                                  
 32790                                  bf10:	
 32791 00002D85 E8B1FE                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 32792 00002D88 7428                    	jz	short bf30
 32793                                  
 32794                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 32795 00002D8A 26830E010000            	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 32796 00002D90 750C                    	jnz	short bf20
 32797                                  
 32798 00002D92 26A10300                	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32799                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 32800 00002D96 39C1                    	cmp	cx,ax
 32801                                  	;jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 32802                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32803 00002D98 7D04                    	jge	short bf20
 32804                                  
 32805 00002D9A 8CC3                    	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 32806                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 32807 00002D9C 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 32808                                  
 32809                                  bf20:	
 32810                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32811                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 32812                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32813                                  	;cmp	byte [es:0],'Z'
 32814 00002D9E 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32815 00002DA4 740C                    	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 32816                                  
 32817                                  	;NextMCB es,ax			; Go on forward.
 32818 00002DA6 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 32819                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32820 00002DA8 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32821 00002DAD 40                      	inc     ax
 32822 00002DAE 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 32823                                  
 32824 00002DB0 EBD3                    	jmp	short bf10
 32825                                  
 32826 00002DB2 8EC3                    bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 32827 00002DB4 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 32828 00002DB6 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 32829 00002DB8 7501                    	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 32830                                  bfE:	
 32831 00002DBA F9                      	stc
 32832                                  bfX:
 32833 00002DBB 59                      	pop	cx
 32834                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32835                                  	;pop	bx
 32836 00002DBC C3                      	retn
 32837                                  
 32838                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32839                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 32840                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32841                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 32842                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 32843                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32844                                  ; USES:     Flags

 32848                                  
 32849                                  isSpecified:

 32852

 32855

 32866                                  	; ds = cs
 32867 00002DC1 8A87[2A1F]              	mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 32868                                  
 32869 00002DC5 08C0                    	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 32870                                  
 32871                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32872                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32873                                  	;pop	ax
 32874                                  
 32875 00002DC7 C3                      	retn

 32877                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32878                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 32879                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32880                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 32881                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 32882                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 32883                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32884                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32885                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 32886                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 32887                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 32888                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 32889                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 32890                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32891                                  
 32892                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 32893                                  
 32894                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32895                                  
 32896                                  shrinkMCB:
 32897                                  	;pushreg <bx,cx,es>
 32898                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32899                                  	;push	bx
 32900 00002DC8 51                      	push	cx
 32901 00002DC9 06                      	push	es
 32902                                  
 32903 00002DCA 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 32904                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32905                                  	;mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 32906                                  
 32907 00002DCC 268B0E0300              	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32908                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32909 00002DD1 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx 
 32910                                  
 32911 00002DD3 83E820                  	sub	ax,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 32912                                  	;sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 32913                                  	;;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 32914                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 32915                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32916                                  	;cmp	cx,bx
 32917                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32918 00002DD6 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx
 32919 00002DD8 7228                    	jb	short smE ; (*)
 32920                                  
 32921 00002DDA 268A160000              	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32922                                  	
 32923                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32924                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32925 00002DDF 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32926                                  
 32927 00002DE1 26891E0300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 32928 00002DE6 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 32929                                  
 32930 00002DEC 01D8                    	add	ax,bx
 32931 00002DEE 40                      	inc	ax
 32932 00002DEF 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 32933                                  
 32934 00002DF1 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx
 32935 00002DF3 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx
 32936                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32937                                  	; ax > 0
 32938 00002DF5 48                      	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 32939                                  
 32940                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32941 00002DF6 2688160000              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 32942                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 32943 00002DFB 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 32944                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 32945                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 32946                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 32947                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 32948                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 32949                                  
 32950                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32951 00002DFF E8A801                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 32952                                  
 32953                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32954                                  	; cf=0
 32955                                  	;clc
 32956                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32957                                  	;jmp	short smX
 32958                                  smE:	
 32959                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32960                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 32961                                  	;stc
 32962                                  smX:	
 32963                                  	;popreg	<es,cx,bx>
 32964 00002E02 07                      	pop	es
 32965 00002E03 59                      	pop	cx
 32966                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32967                                  	;pop	bx
 32968 00002E04 C3                      	retn
 32969                                  
 32970                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32971                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 32972                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32973                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 32974                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 32975                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32976                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 32977                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32978                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 32979                                  ;
 32980                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 32981                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 32982                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 32983                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 32984                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 32985                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 32986                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 32987                                  ;       Endif
 32988                                  ;    Endif
 32989                                  ; Endif
 32990                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 32991                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 32992                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 32993                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 32994                                  ;    ENDIF
 32995                                  ; ENDIF
 32996                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32997                                  
 32998                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32999                                  	; (SYSINIT:3426h)
 33000                                  _hideUMB_:
 33001                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33002                                  	; ds = cs
 33003                                  
 33004                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33005                                  	;push	bx
 33006                                  	;push	dx
 33007 00002E05 06                      	push	es
 33008                                  
 33009 00002E06 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 33010 00002E08 E8B2FF                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 33011 00002E0B 742D                    	jz	short hu_20
 33012                                  
 33013 00002E0D 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 33014 00002E0F E869FF                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 33015 00002E12 7226                    	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 33016                                  
 33017 00002E14 50                      	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 33018 00002E15 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 33019 00002E17 E8AAFE                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 33020 00002E1A 5B                      	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 33021                                  
 33022 00002E1B 09C0                    	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 33023 00002E1D 741B                    	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 33024                                  
 33025 00002E1F 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 33026 00002E21 7607                    	jbe	short hu_10
 33027                                  
 33028 00002E23 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		;  Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 33029 00002E25 E81DFD                  	call	unMarkUMB
 33030 00002E28 EB10                    	jmp	short hu_20
 33031                                  hu_10:	
 33032                                  	;call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 33033                                  	;jz	short hu_20
 33034                                  	; 02/01/2023
 33035                                  ;isTiny:
 33036                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny] ; ds = cs
 33037                                  	;or	al,al
 33038 00002E2A 800E[261F]00            	or	byte [fUmbTiny],0
 33039 00002E2F 7409                    	jz	short hu_20
 33040                                  
 33041 00002E31 E894FF                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 33042 00002E34 7204                    	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 33043                                  
 33044 00002E36 8CC2                    	mov	dx,es
 33045 00002E38 EB09                    	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 33046                                  
 33047 00002E3A 89C8                    hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 33048 00002E3C E87EFF                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 33049 00002E3F 7510                    	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 33050                                  
 33051 00002E41 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 33052                                  hu_30:	
 33053 00002E43 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 33054                                  
 33055 00002E45 E89DFE                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 33056                                  
 33057 00002E48 09D2                    	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 33058 00002E4A 7405                    	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 33059                                  
 33060 00002E4C 8EC2                    	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 33061 00002E4E E8E6FE                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 33062                                  hu_X:	
 33063 00002E51 07                      	pop	es
 33064                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33065                                  	;pop	dx
 33066                                  	;pop	bx
 33067 00002E52 C3                      	retn
 33068                                  
 33069                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33070                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 33071                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33072                                  ; Entry:  None
 33073                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 33074                                  ; Error:  None
 33075                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 33076                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33077                                  
 33078                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)

 33085 00002E57 721C                    	jc	short ufX

 33087                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33088                                  uf10:

 33090

 33093                                  ; ------------------------------

 33095                                  ;uf10:

 33097 00002E5E 7505                    	jnz	short uf20

 33099                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33100                                  	; ax <> es
 33101 00002E63 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es ; *
 33102                                  uf20:	
 33103                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 33104                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33105                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33106 00002E65 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33107 00002E6B 7408                    	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.. that's it.
 33108                                  
 33109                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 33110                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33111                                  	; ax = es
 33112                                  	;mov	ax,es ; *

 33114 00002E6D 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 33115 00002E72 40                      	inc	ax
 33116                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33117                                  	;mov	es,ax
 33118 00002E73 EBE4                    	jmp	short uf10
 33119                                  ufX:	
 33120 00002E75 07                      	pop	es
 33121                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33122                                  	;pop	ax
 33123 00002E76 C3                      	retn
 33124                                  
 33125                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33126                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN
 33127                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33128                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 33129                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 33130                                  ; ERROR:    None
 33131                                  ; USES:     Flags
 33132                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33133                                  
 33134                                  isFrozMCB:
 33135                                  	;push	ax
 33136                                  
 33137                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 33138                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 33139 00002E77 26833E010008            	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner
 33140 00002E7D 7522                    	jne	short ifmX
 33141                                  
 33142                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+0]
 33143                                  	;cmp	ax,'FR' ; 5246h
 33144 00002E7F 26813E08004652          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 33145 00002E86 7519                    	jne	short ifmX

 33147                                  	;cmp	ax,'OZ' ; 5A4Fh
 33148 00002E88 26813E0A004F5A          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 33149 00002E8F 7510                    	jne	short ifmX
 33150                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 33151                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 33152 00002E91 26813E0C00454E          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 33153 00002E98 7507                    	jne	short ifmX
 33154                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 33155                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 33156 00002E9A 26813E0E002020          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 33157                                  ifmX:	
 33158                                  	;pop	ax
 33159 00002EA1 C3                      	retn
 33160                                  
 33161                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33162                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0

 33172 00002EA9 26C70608004652          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'

 33201 00002ECA 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax

 33208                                  
 33209                                  	; 22/07/2023

 33212

 33222

 33224                                  fum20:

 33227

 33239

 33258                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33259                                  ;*** UmbTest - returns with carry set if UMBs are not available, else CF==false
 33260                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33261                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 33262                                  ; EXIT:     Carry is clear if UMBs are available, or set if they are not
 33263                                  ; ERROR:    None
 33264                                  ; USES:     CF (AX,BX,DS,ES pushed 'cause they're used by others)

 33282 00002F08 9D                      	popf				; And restore what we found out.

 33288                                  	;pop	ax

 33291                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33292                                  ;*** WalkMem - travels memory chain and returns carry clear iff UMBs are linked
 33293                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33294                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 33295                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.
 33296                                  ; ERROR:    None
 33297                                  ; USES:     Flags

 33304                                  	;push	ax ; ?
 33305                                  	;push	bx ; ?

 33313                                  	; 22/07/2023

 33318                                  ; UM10: ES = Current MCB pointer
 33319                                  ; ------------------------------

 33323                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'

 33327

 33340                                  	;mov	es,ax ; **
 33341

 33344                                  	; 22/07/2023
 33345                                  	; ax = es
 33346                                  	;mov	ax,es
 33347

 33349                                  
 33350                                  	;pop	es ; ?
 33351                                  	;;pop	ds ; ? ; 01/01/2023 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, SYSINIT:353Dh)
 33352                                  	;pop	bx ; ?
 33353                                  	;pop	ax ; ?
 33354                                  	
 33355 00002F29 C3                      	retn

 33674                                  
 33675                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33676                                  ;
 33677                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 33678                                  ;
 33679                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 33680                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 33681                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 33682                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 33683                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 33684                                  ;
 33685                                  ;	Output : none
 33686                                  ;
 33687                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 33688                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 33689                                  ;
 33690                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33691                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 33692                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 33693                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 33694                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 33695                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33696                                  
 33697                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33698                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33699                                  	; (SYSINIT:364Ah)
 33700                                  InitDevLoad:
 33701                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33702                                  	;push	es ; *
 33703                                  
 33704                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33705                                  	; ds = cs
 33706 00002FE4 803E[7B1F]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 33707                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 33708                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 33709 00002FE9 7439                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 33710                                  
 33711                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33712                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33713                                  ; %if 0
 33714                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33715 00002FEB 803E[6B1F]01            	cmp	byte [ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 33716                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 33717 00002FF0 7413                    	je	short InitForConv
 33718                                  
 33719                                  ; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 33720                                  ; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 33721                                  ; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 33722                                  ; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 33723                                  ; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 33724                                  ; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 33725                                  
 33726 00002FF2 E85704                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 33727                                  
 33728 00002FF5 E892FC                  	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 33729 00002FF8 E8CBFE                  	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 33730 00002FFB E85700                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 33731 00002FFE 9C                      	pushf
 33732 00002FFF E851FE                  	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 33733 00003002 9D                      	popf
 33734                                  	;jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 33735                                  	;jmp	short InitForHi
 33736                                  	; 06/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 33737 00003003 EB0B                    	jmp	short idl0
 33738                                  
 33739                                  ;%endif ; 01/11/2022
 33740                                  
 33741                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33742                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 33743                                  InitForConv:
 33744                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33745                                  	; ds = cs
 33746 00003005 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 33747                                  					;  current UMB ?
 33748 00003008 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 33749 0000300A E83F04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 33750 0000300D E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 33751                                  idl0: ; 06/07/2023
 33752 00003010 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 33753                                  					;  in low memory
 33754                                  InitForHi:
 33755                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33756                                  	; ds = cs
 33757                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 33758                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 33759                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 33760 00003012 A1[711F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 33761 00003015 8B16[6D1F]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 33762 00003019 0316[6F1F]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 33763 0000301D EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 33764                                  
 33765                                  InitForLo:
 33766                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33767                                  	; ds = cs
 33768                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 33769 0000301F C606[7B1F]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 33770                                  initforlo_x:
 33771                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33772                                  	; ds = cs
 33773                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 33774                                  					;  we are loading low
 33775                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 33776                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 33777 00003024 A1[6403]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 33778 00003027 8B16[A502]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 33779                                  idl1:
 33780 0000302B E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 33781                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33782                                  	; ds = cs
 33783                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 33784                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 33785                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 33786                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 33787 0000302E A3[5F1F]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 33788 00003031 8916[611F]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 33789 00003035 C706[631F]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 33790 0000303B A3[651F]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 33791                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33792                                  	;pop	es ; *
 33793 0000303E C3                      	retn
 33794                                  
 33795                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33796                                  ;
 33797                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 33798                                  ;
 33799                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 33800                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 33801                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 33802                                  ;		   current UMB
 33803                                  ;
 33804                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33805                                  
 33806                                  SpaceInUMB:
 33807                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33808                                  	; ds = cs
 33809                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 33810                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 33811                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 33812 0000303F A1[6F1F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 33813 00003042 0306[6D1F]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 33814 00003046 2B06[711F]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 33815                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33816                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 33817                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 33818                                  	;stc
 33819                                  	;retn
 33820                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33821 0000304A 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 33822 0000304D 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 33823                                  spcinumb1:
 33824 0000304F 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 33825                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33826                                  	; ds = cs
 33827 00003050 3B06[5D1F]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 33828                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 33829                                  spcinumb2:
 33830 00003054 C3                      	retn
 33831                                  
 33832                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33833                                  ;
 33834                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 33835                                  ;
 33836                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 33837                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 33838                                  ;
 33839                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33840                                  
 33841                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33842                                  ;
 33843                                  ;PrepareMark:
 33844                                  ;	push	ds
 33845                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 33846                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 33847                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 33848                                  ;	pop	ds
 33849                                  ;
 33850                                  ;	inc	ax
 33851                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 33852                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 33853                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 33854                                  ;	retn
 33855                                  
 33856                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33857                                  ;
 33858                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 33859                                  ;
 33860                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 33861                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 33862                                  ;		 the device.
 33863                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 33864                                  ;
 33865                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 33866                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 33867                                  ;	UMB.
 33868                                  ;
 33869                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 33870                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 33871                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 33872                                  ;
 33873                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33874                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33875                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 33876                                  
 33877                                  GetUMBForDev:
 33878                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33879                                  	; ds = cs
 33880 00003055 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 33881 00003058 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 33882 0000305B CD21                    	int	21h
 33883                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 33884                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 33885                                  
 33886 0000305D 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 33887                                  	;jz	short gufd_err
 33888                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33889 0000305F 742E                    	jz	short gufd_error ; bx = 0
 33890                                  
 33891 00003061 4B                      	dec	bx
 33892                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33893                                  	; ds = cs
 33894 00003062 391E[5D1F]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 33895                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 33896 00003066 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 33897                                  
 33898 00003068 43                      	inc	bx
 33899                                  
 33900 00003069 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 33901 0000306C CD21                    	int	21h
 33902 0000306E 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 33903                                  
 33904                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33905                                  	;dec	ax
 33906                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 33907                                  	;
 33908                                  PrepareMark:
 33909 00003070 1E                      	push	ds
 33910 00003071 48                      	dec	ax
 33911 00003072 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 33912 00003074 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 33913 0000307A C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 33914 00003080 40                      	inc	ax
 33915 00003081 1F                      	pop	ds
 33916                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33917                                  	; ds = cs
 33918                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 33919                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 33920                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 33921                                  gufd_x:		; 09/09/2023
 33922 00003082 891E[6F1F]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 33923 00003086 A3[6D1F]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 33924 00003089 A3[711F]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 33925                                  	;
 33926                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33927                                  	; cf=0
 33928                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 33929 0000308C C3                      	retn
 33930                                  
 33931                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33932                                  %if 1
 33933                                  gufd_err:
 33934 0000308D 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 33935                                  gufd_error:
 33936 0000308F 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 33937 00003091 F9                      	stc	; cf=1
 33938 00003092 EBEE                    	jmp	short gufd_x	
 33939                                  %endif
 33940                                  
 33941                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33942                                  %if 0
 33943                                  gufd_err:
 33944                                  	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 33945                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33946                                  	; ds = cs
 33947                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 33948                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 33949                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 33950                                  	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 33951                                  	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 33952                                  	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 33953                                  	stc
 33954                                  	retn
 33955                                  %endif
 33956                                  
 33957                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33958                                  ;
 33959                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 33960                                  ;
 33961                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 33962                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 33963                                  ;
 33964                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 33965                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 33966                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 33967                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 33968                                  ;
 33969                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 33970                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 33971                                  ;
 33972                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33973                                  
 33974                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33975                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 33976                                  
 33977                                  DevSetMark:
 33978 00003094 06                      	push	es
 33979                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33980                                  	;push	di
 33981 00003095 1E                      	push	ds
 33982 00003096 56                      	push	si
 33983 00003097 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33984 00003099 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 33985 0000309F 40                      	inc	ax
 33986 000030A0 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 33987                                  
 33988                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 33989                                  
 33990 000030A4 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 33991                                  
 33992                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33993                                  	; ds = cs
 33994                                  	;lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 33995 000030A5 C536[7C03]              	lds	si,[bpb_addr]
 33996                                  
 33997 000030A9 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 33998 000030AB FC                      	cld
 33999                                  dsm_again:
 34000 000030AC AC                      	lodsb
 34001 000030AD 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 34002 000030AF 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 34003 000030B1 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 34004 000030B3 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 34005                                  isit_slash:
 34006 000030B5 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 34007 000030B7 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 34008 000030B9 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 34009 000030BB EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 34010                                  isit_null:
 34011 000030BD 08C0                    	or	al,al
 34012 000030BF 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 34013 000030C1 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 34014                                  
 34015 000030C3 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 34016 000030C6 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 34017                                  dsm_next_char:
 34018 000030C9 AC                      	lodsb
 34019 000030CA 08C0                    	or	al, al
 34020 000030CC 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 34021 000030CE 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 34022 000030D0 7403                    	je	short blankout
 34023 000030D2 AA                      	stosb
 34024 000030D3 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 34025                                  blankout:
 34026 000030D5 E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 34027 000030D7 B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 34028 000030D9 F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 34029                                  dsm_exit:
 34030 000030DB 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 34031 000030DC 5E                      	pop	si
 34032 000030DD 1F                      	pop	ds
 34033                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34034                                  	;pop	di
 34035 000030DE 07                      	pop	es
 34036 000030DF C3                      	retn
 34037                                  
 34038                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34039                                  ;
 34040                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 34041                                  ;
 34042                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 34043                                  ;
 34044                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 34045                                  ;
 34046                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 34047                                  ;	in DevSize
 34048                                  ;
 34049                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34050                                  
 34051                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34052                                  SizeDevice:
 34053                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34054                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 34055 000030E0 1E                      	push	ds ; *
 34056 000030E1 06                      	push	es
 34057 000030E2 1F                      	pop	ds
 34058 000030E3 89F2                    	mov	dx,si			; ds:dx -> file name
 34059 000030E5 B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 34060 000030E8 CD21                    	int	21h
 34061 000030EA 7237                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 34062                                  
 34063 000030EC 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 34064 000030EE B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 34065 000030F1 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 34066 000030F3 89CA                    	mov	dx,cx			; to end of file
 34067 000030F5 CD21                    	int	21h
 34068 000030F7 7223                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 34069 000030F9 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 34070 000030FC 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 34071 000030FF F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffffh paras ?
 34072                                  	;jz	short szdev1		; no
 34073                                  	; 22/07/2023
 34074 00003103 7409                    	jz	short sd_ctp
 34075 00003105 2EC706[5D1F]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 34076                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 34077 0000310C EB0E                    	jmp	short sd_close
 34078                                  sd_ctp:	
 34079                                  	; 22/07/2023
 34080                                  ;szdev1:
 34081 0000310E B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 34082 00003110 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 34083 00003112 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 34084 00003114 D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 34085 00003116 09D0                    	or	ax,dx ; * ; cf=0
 34086                                  	;
 34087                                  	; 22/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimized)
 34088                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:37A6h 
 34089                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34090                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 34091                                  	;ja	short szdev2
 34092                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 34093                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34094                                  	;clc
 34095                                  ;szdev2:
 34096 00003118 2EA3[5D1F]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size (in paragraps)
 34097                                  	; 22/07/2023
 34098                                  	;clc ; cf=0 ; *	; CLC is not needed here
 34099                                  			; (OR instruction clears CF) - E.TAN 22/07/2023
 34100                                  
 34101                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34102                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34103                                  	; cf=0
 34104                                  	;clc
 34105                                  sd_close:
 34106 0000311C 9C                      	pushf				; let close not spoil our
 34107                                  					;  carry flag
 34108 0000311D B8003E                  	mov	ax,3E00h		; close
 34109 00003120 CD21                    	int	21h			; we are not checking for err
 34110 00003122 9D                      	popf
 34111                                  sd_err:
 34112                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34113                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 34114 00003123 1F                      	pop     ds ; *
 34115 00003124 C3                      	retn
 34116                                  
 34117                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34118                                  ;
 34119                                  ; procedure : ExecDev
 34120                                  ;
 34121                                  ;	Input : ds:dx -> device to be executed
 34122                                  ;		DevLoadAddr - contains where device has to be loaded
 34123                                  ;
 34124                                  ;	Output : Carry if error
 34125                                  ;		 Carry clear if no error
 34126                                  ;
 34127                                  ;	Loads a device driver using the 4b03h function call
 34128                                  ;
 34129                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34130                                  
 34131                                  	; 01/11/2022
 34132                                  ExecDev:
 34133 00003125 2E8B1E[5F1F]            	mov	bx,[cs:DevLoadAddr]
 34134 0000312A 2E891E[771F]            	mov	[cs:DevExecAddr],bx	; Load the parameter block
 34135                                  					;  block for exec with
 34136                                  					;  load address
 34137 0000312F 2E891E[791F]            	mov	[cs:DevExecReloc],bx
 34138 00003134 8CCB                    	mov	bx,cs
 34139 00003136 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 34140 00003138 BB[771F]                	mov	bx,DevExecAddr		; es:bx points to parameters
 34141                                  	;mov	al,3	; (load program only)
 34142                                  	;mov	ah,EXEC ; 4Bh
 34143                                  	; 04/07/2023
 34144 0000313B B8034B                  	mov	ax,(EXEC<<8)|03h
 34145 0000313E CD21                    	int	21h			; load in the device driver
 34146                                   		; DOS - 2+ - LOAD OR EXECUTE (EXEC)
 34147                                  		; DS:DX -> ASCIZ filename
 34148                                  		; ES:BX -> parameter block
 34149                                  		; AL = subfunction 
 34150 00003140 C3                      	retn
 34151                                  
 34152                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34153                                  ;
 34154                                  ; procedure : RetFromUM
 34155                                  ;
 34156                                  ;	Input : None
 34157                                  ;	Output : ConvLoad set if didn't previously call HideUMBs
 34158                                  ;		 ConvLoad clear if did.
 34159                                  ;
 34160                                  ;	Prepares memory for more devices after returning from loading one
 34161                                  ;	using the DOS 6 options (/L:... etc).
 34162                                  ;
 34163                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34164                                  
 34165                                  ; 31/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34166                                  ;  (SYSINIT:37D1h)
 34167
