 34490                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34491                                  ;
 34492                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 34493                                  ;
 34494                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 34495                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 34496                                  ;
 34497                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 34498                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 34499                                  ;
 34500                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 34501                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 34502                                  ;
 34503                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34504                                  
 34505                                  ; 13/05/2019
 34506                                  
 34507                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34508                                  	; (SYSINIT:38C5h)
 34509                                  
 34510                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34511                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 34512                                  GetHexNum:
 34513 00003218 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 34514 0000321A 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 34515                                  ghn_next:
 34516 0000321C 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 34517 0000321F 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 34518 00003222 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 34519 00003224 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 34520 00003227 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 34521 00003229 50                      	push	ax
 34522 0000322A 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 34523 0000322C E8D80F                  	call	delim
 34524 0000322F 58                      	pop	ax
 34525                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34526 00003230 B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 34527 00003233 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 34528 00003235 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 34529                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 34530                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34531 00003238 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 34532                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34533                                  	;mov	cx,4
 34534                                  ghn_shift1:
 34535 0000323A D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 34536 0000323C D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 34537 0000323E E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 34538 00003240 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 34539 00003242 46                      	inc	si
 34540 00003243 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 34541                                  ghn_into_paras:
 34542 00003245 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 34543 00003248 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 34544 0000324B F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 34545 0000324F 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 34546                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34547                                  	;mov	cx,4
 34548                                  ghn_shift2:
 34549 00003251 F8                      	clc
 34550 00003252 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 34551 00003254 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 34552 00003256 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 34553 00003258 F8                      	clc
 34554 00003259 C3                      	retn
 34555                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34556                                  ghn_err:
 34557                                  gnib_err:
 34558 0000325A F9                      	stc
 34559                                  ghn_ret:
 34560                                  gnib_ret:
 34561 0000325B C3                      	retn

 34563                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34564                                  ;
 34565                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 34566                                  ;
 34567                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 34568                                  ;
 34569                                  ;	Returns binary value in BL
 34570                                  ;
 34571                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 34572                                  ;
 34573                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34574                                  
 34575                                  GetNibble:
 34576 0000325C 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 34577                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 34578                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34579 0000325F 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 34580 00003261 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 34581 00003264 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 34582 00003266 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 34583 00003269 C3                      	retn
 34584                                  is_it_hex:
 34585 0000326A 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'
 34586                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 34587                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34588 0000326D 72EC                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 34589 0000326F 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 34590 00003272 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 34591 00003274 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 34592 00003277 C3                      	retn
 34593                                  
 34594                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34595                                  ;gnib_err:
 34596                                  ;	stc
 34597                                  ;gnib_ret:
 34598                                  ;	retn

 34604                                  ; umb.inc (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 34605                                  DOS_ARENA	equ 24h		; offset of arena_head var in DOS data segm.
 34606                                  UMB_ARENA	equ 8Ch		; offset of umb_head in DOS data

 34612                                  
 34613                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34614                                  ;
 34615                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 34616                                  ;
 34617                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 34618                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 34619                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 34620                                  ;			; DS = data
 34621                                  ;
 34622                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 34623                                  ;
 34624                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 34625                                  ;
 34626                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34627                                  
 34628                                  umb_insert:
 34629 00003278 1E                      	push	ds
 34630                                  
 34631                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34632                                  	; ds = cs
 34633                                  
 34634                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34635 00003279 8E1E[8A1F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 34636                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 34637 0000327D 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 34638 00003281 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 34639 00003283 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34640                                  ui_next:
 34641 00003285 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 34642                                  					;    new block
 34643 00003287 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 34644                                  					; Q: is current block the
 34645                                  					;    last
 34646 00003289 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34647 0000328F 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 34648                                  					; N: get next block
 34649 00003291 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 34650                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 34651 00003293 E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34652 00003296 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 34653                                  
 34654                                  ui_insert:
 34655 00003298 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 34656 0000329A 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 34657                                  
 34658 0000329B 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 34659 0000329D F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 34660                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 34661 0000329F C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34662                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 34663 000032A4 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34664                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 34665 000032AA 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 34666                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 34667 000032AE C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34668                                  
 34669                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 34670                                  
 34671 000032B4 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 34672 000032B6 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34673 000032BC 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 34674                                  					; mark as free
 34675 000032C3 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 34676                                  					; start & end of new block
 34677 000032C6 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 34678                                  
 34679                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 34680                                  	
 34681 000032CB 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 34682 000032CD 43                      	inc	bx
 34683 000032CE 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 34684 000032D0 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 34685                                  
 34686                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 34687                                  					; this block
 34688 000032D1 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 34689                                  	
 34690 000032D3 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34691 000032D9 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34692 000032E0 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34693 000032E4 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34694                                  
 34695 000032EB EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 34696                                  
 34697                                  ui_append:
 34698                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 34699 000032ED 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 34700 000032F2 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 34701                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 34702                                  					; block for the next arena.
 34703                                  	; 13/05/2019
 34704 000032F8 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34705                                  
 34706 000032FE 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 34707 00003300 40                      	inc	ax
 34708 00003301 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 34709                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 34710 00003303 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 34711                                  
 34712 00003305 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 34713                                  
 34714 00003307 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34715 0000330D 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34716 00003314 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34717 00003318 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 34718                                  
 34719                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 34720 0000331F 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 34721 00003321 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 34722 00003327 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 34723                                  					; mark as free
 34724 0000332E 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 34725 0000332F 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 34726                                  ui_done:
 34727                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 34728 00003334 1F                      	pop	ds
 34729                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 34730                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 34731                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 34732 00003335 C3                      	retn

 34751 00003343 EBF6                    	jmp	short au_next

 34753                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34754                                  ;	call	umb_coalesce		; coalesce all UMBs
 34755                                  ;au_exit:
 34756                                  ;	; 31/12/2022
 34757                                  ;	; ds = cs
 34758                                  ;	retn
 34759                                  
 34760                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34761                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce
 34762                                  
 34763                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 34764                                  
 34765                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34766                                  
 34767                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34768                                  ;
 34769                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 34770                                  ;
 34771                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 34772                                  ;	if it's free. Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 34773                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 34774                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 34775                                  ;
 34776                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 34777                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 34778                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IF not at end
 34779                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 34780                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 34781                                  ;
 34782                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34783                                  
 34784                                  umb_coalesce:
 34785                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34786                                  	; ds = cs
 34787 00003345 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 34788                                  
 34789 00003346 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 34790                                  
 34791                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34792                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34793 00003348 8E06[8A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 34794 0000334C 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 34795                                  uc_nextfree:
 34796 00003351 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34797 00003353 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 34798                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 34799 00003355 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 34800 0000335A 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 34801                                  					; N: get next arena
 34802 0000335C E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 34803 0000335F 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 34804 00003361 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 34805                                  uc_again:
 34806 00003363 E86400                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 34807 00003366 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 34808                                  uc_check:
 34809 00003368 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 34810 0000336D 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 34811                                  					; Y: coalesce
 34812 0000336F 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 34813 00003374 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 34814                                  	;add	[3],cx
 34815 00003375 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 34816 00003379 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 34817 0000337C 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 34818 0000337E EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 34819                                  
 34820                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34821                                  ;uc_done:
 34822                                  	;retn

 34877                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 34878                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 34879                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 34880                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 34881                                  ;				NC
 34882                                  ;			  else 
 34883                                  ;				CY
 34884                                  ;
 34885                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 34886                                  ;

 34890                                  	; 31/12/2022

 34895                                  					;   possible

 34898                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 34899                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 34900                                  					; the largest UMB
 34901 000033B8 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 34902 000033BA 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 34903                                  	
 34904 000033BC B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 34905                                  
 34906                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34907 000033BE FF1E[731F]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]

 34909

 34911                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 34912                                  	; 27/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 34913 000033C5 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 34914                                  ua_err:
 34915 000033C7 F9                      	stc	
 34916                                  
 34917                                  	;clc
 34918                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34919                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34920                                  	; cf=0
 34921                                  	;clc 
 34922                                  ua_done:
 34923 000033C8 58                      	pop	ax
 34924 000033C9 C3                      	retn

 34951                                  	; 11/12/2022

 34962                                  ;
 34963                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 34964                                  ;
 34965                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34966                                  
 34967                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)

 34969                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 34970                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34971                                  	; ds = cs

 34973 000033E0 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 34974                                  
 34975                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 34976                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 34977                                  
 34978                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34979                                  	; ds = cs
 34980

 34982 000033E4 B106                    	mov	cl,6
 34983 000033E6 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 34984

 34986 000033EA 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 34987                                  
 34988 000033EC F7D8                    	neg	ax
 34989                                  
 34990                                  	;sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 34991                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34992 000033EE 49                      	dec	cx
 34993 000033EF 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 34994                                  	
 34995 000033F1 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34996 000033F7 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34997                                  					
 34998 000033FE 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34999 00003402 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 35000

 35002                                  
 35003 00003409 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 35004 0000340B 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 35005 00003411 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 35006                                  					; mark as free 
 35007 00003418 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 35008 00003419 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 35009                                  
 35010                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 35011                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35012 0000341E 8E06[8A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 35013                                  	; 18/09/2023
 35014 00003422 26890E8C00              	mov	[es:UMB_ARENA],cx
 35015                                  	;mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 35016                                  	;mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 35017                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 35018                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 35019                                  
 35020                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 35021                                  
 35022                                  	;mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h

 35024                                  	; 18/09/2023
 35025 00003427 268E062400              	mov	es,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 35026 0000342C 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 35027                                  ;scan_next
 35028                                  ; 09/12/2022
 35029                                  scannext:
 35030 0000342E 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 35031 00003432 740C                    	je	short got_last
 35032

 35035 0000343B 40                      	inc	ax
 35036 0000343C 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 35037                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 35038                                  	; 09/12/2022
 35039 0000343E EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 35040                                  got_last:
 35041                                  	;sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 35042                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35043 00003440 26FF0E0300              	dec	word [es:ARENA.SIZE]
 35044                                  
 35045 00003445 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 35046                                  	;clc
 35047                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35048                                  	; 11/12/2022
 35049                                  	; cf=0
 35050                                  	;clc
 35051 0000344B C3                      	retn
 35052

 35064                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 35065                                  ;
 35066                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 35067                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 35068                                  ;
 35069                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35070                                  
 35071                                  ShrinkUMB:
 35072                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35073                                  	; ds = cs
 35074 0000344C 833E[6D1F]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 35075                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 35076 00003451 741F                    	je	short su_exit
 35077 00003453 06                      	push	es
 35078                                  	; 01/01/2023
 35079                                  	;push	bx
 35080                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35081                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 35082                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 35083                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 35084 00003454 8B1E[711F]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 35085 00003458 2B1E[6D1F]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 35086 0000345C 8E06[6D1F]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 35087                                  	
 35088 00003460 B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 35089 00003463 CD21                    	int	21h
 35090                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 35091                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 35092                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 35093 00003465 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 35094 00003467 48                      	dec	ax
 35095 00003468 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 35096 0000346A 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 35097                                  	; 01/01/2023
 35098                                  	;pop	bx
 35099 00003471 07                      	pop	es
 35100                                  su_exit:
 35101 00003472 C3                      	retn

 35114 00003473 1E                      	push	ds

 35120                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35121 0000347C 8E06[8A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 35122                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 35123 00003480 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 35124 00003485 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 35125                                  ulu_next:
 35126 0000348A E83DFF                  	call	get_next
 35127 0000348D 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 35128 0000348F 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 35129 00003491 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 35130 00003493 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 35131 00003495 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 35132                                  ulu_found:
 35133                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 35134 00003497 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 35135                                  ulu_x:

 35137 0000349D 1F                      	pop	ds
 35138 0000349E C3                      	retn

 35140                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 35141                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 35142                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 35143                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35144                                  
 35145                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35146                                  ;
 35147                                  ; Summary:
 35148                                  ;
 35149                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 35150                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 35151                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 35152                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 35153                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 35154                                  ;
 35155                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 35156                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 35157                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 35158                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 35159                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 35160                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 35161                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 35162                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 35163                                  ;
 35164                                  ; Example:
 35165                                  ;
 35166                                  ;   [menu]
 35167                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 35168                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 35169                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 35170                                  ;
 35171                                  ;   [network]
 35172                                  ;   include misc
 35173                                  ;   device=foo
 35174                                  ;
 35175                                  ;   [misc]
 35176                                  ;   device=bar
 35177                                  ;   include alternate
 35178                                  ;
 35179                                  ;   [alternate]
 35180                                  ;   device=tar
 35181                                  ;
 35182                                  ;
 35183                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 35184                                  ;
 35185                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 35186                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 35187                                  ;
 35188                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 35189                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 35190                                  ;   following order:
 35191                                  ;
 35192                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 35193                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 35194                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 35195                                  ;
 35196                                  
 35197                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 35198

 35354                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35355                                  ;
 35356                                  ; procedure : parseline
 35357                                  ;
 35358                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 35359                                  ;
 35360                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35361                                  
 35362                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35363                                  	; (SYSINIT:3EDFh)
 35364                                  
 35365                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35366                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 35367                                  parseline:
 35368                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35369                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 35370                                  
 35371                                  	;push	ds ; *
 35372                                  
 35373                                  	;push	cs ; *
 35374                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 35375                                  
 35376                                  nextswtch:
 35377                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 35378                                  	je	short done_line
 35379                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 35380                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 35381                                  
 35382                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 35383                                  
 35384                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 35385                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 35386                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 35387                                  	je	short getparm
 35388                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 35389                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 35390                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35391                                  swterr:
 35392                                  	retn
 35393                                  
 35394                                  getparm:
 35395                                  	call	check_switch
 35396                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 35397                                  	jc	short swterr
 35398                                  getnext:
 35399                                  	call	getchr
 35400                                  	;jc	short done_line
 35401                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 35402                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35403                                  	jnc	short nextswtch
 35404                                  ;swterr:
 35405                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 35406                                  
 35407                                  done_line:
 35408                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35409                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 35410                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 35411                                  	jnz	short okay
 35412                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 35413                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 35414                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35415                                  	retn
 35416                                  
 35417                                  okay:
 35418                                  	mov	ax,[switches]
 35419                                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 35420                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 35421                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 35422                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 35423                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35424                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35425                                  	; cf=0
 35426                                  	;clc
 35427                                  	;call	setdeviceparameters
 35428                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35429                                  	jmp	setdeviceparameters
 35430                                  ;exitpl:
 35431                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35432                                  	; ds = cs
 35433                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 35434                                  	retn
 35435                                  put_back:
 35436                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 35437                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 35438                                  	jmp	short done_line
 35439

 35442                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35443                                  ;
 35444                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 35445                                  ;
 35446                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 35447                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 35448                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 35449                                  ; error.
 35450                                  ;
 35451                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35452                                  
 35453                                  ; 09/09/2023
 35454                                  
 35455                                  err_swtch:
 35456 00003501 31CB                    	xor	bx,cx			; remove this switch from the records
 35457                                  err_check:
 35458 00003503 F9                      	stc
 35459                                  err_chk:
 35460                                  done_swtch:	; 09/09/2023 (cf=0)
 35461 00003504 C3                      	retn
 35462                                  
 35463                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 35464                                  
 35465                                  check_switch:
 35466 00003505 E8240D                  	call	getchr
 35467                                  	;jc	short err_check
 35468 00003508 72FA                    	jc	short err_chk
 35469 0000350A 24DF                            and     al,0DFh                 ; convert it to upper case
 35470 0000350C 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'
 35471                                  	;jb	short err_check
 35472 0000350E 72F4                    	jb	short err_chk ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35473 00003510 3C5A                    	cmp	al,'Z'
 35474 00003512 77EF                    	ja	short err_check
 35475                                  
 35476 00003514 06                      	push	es
 35477                                  
 35478 00003515 0E                      	push	cs
 35479 00003516 07                      	pop	es
 35480                                  
 35481                                  	;mov	cl,[switchlist]		; get number of valid switches
 35482                                  	;mov	ch,0
 35483                                  	;mov	di,1+switchlist		; point to string of valid switches
 35484                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35485 00003517 BF[F049]                	mov	di,switchlist
 35486 0000351A 8A0D                    	mov	cl,[di]
 35487 0000351C B500                    	mov	ch,0
 35488 0000351E 47                      	inc	di	; 1+switchlist
 35489                                  
 35490 0000351F F2AE                    	repne	scasb
 35491                                  
 35492 00003521 07                      	pop	es
 35493 00003522 75DF                    	jnz	short err_check
 35494                                  
 35495 00003524 B80100                  	mov	ax,1
 35496 00003527 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; set bit to indicate switch
 35497 00003529 8B1E[5C49]              	mov	bx,[switches]		; get switches so far
 35498 0000352D 09C3                    	or	bx,ax			; save this with other switches
 35499 0000352F 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 35500                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35501 00003531 A8F8                    	test	al,switchnum ; 0F8h
 35502                                  	;test	ax,switchnum ; 0F8h	; test against switches that require number to follow
 35503 00003533 74CF                    	jz	short done_swtch

 35506 00003538 72C7                    	jc	short err_swtch
 35507                                  
 35508 0000353A 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 35509 0000353C 75C3                    	jne	short err_swtch
 35510                                  
 35511 0000353E E8EB0C                  	call	getchr
 35512 00003541 53                      	push	bx			; preserve switches
 35513                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35514                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],' '	; allow space separators
 35515                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35516                                  	; ds = cs
 35517 00003542 C606[AE02]20            	mov	byte [sepchr],' '

 35519                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 35520                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35521 0000354A C606[AE02]00            	mov	byte [sepchr],0
 35522 0000354F 5B                      	pop	bx			; restore switches
 35523                                  
 35524                                  ; because getnum does not consider carriage-return or line-feed as ok, we do
 35525                                  ; not check for carry set here. if there is an error, it will be detected
 35526                                  ; further on (hopefully).
 35527                                  
 35528                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35529                                  	;call	process_num
 35530                                  	;jmp	short process_num
 35531                                  
 35532                                  ;done_swtch:
 35533                                  ;	;clc
 35534                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35535                                  ;	; 12/12/2022

 35537                                  ;	;clc

 35540                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35541                                  ;
 35542                                  ; procedure : process_num
 35543                                  ;
 35544                                  ; this routine takes the switch just input, and the number following (if any),
 35545                                  ; and sets the value in the appropriate variable. if the number input is zero
 35546                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the
 35547                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.
 35548                                  ;
 35549                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35550                                  
 35551                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35552                                  	; (SYSINIT:3156h)
 35553                                  process_num:
 35554 00003550 850E[5C49]              	test	[switches],cx		; if this switch has been done before,
 35555 00003554 752B                    	jnz	short done_ret		; ignore this one.
 35556                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35557 00003556 F6C108                  	test	cl,flagdrive ; 8
 35558                                  	;test	cx,flagdrive ; 8
 35559 00003559 7404                    	jz	short try_f
 35560 0000355B A2[5B49]                	mov	byte [drive],al
 35561                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35562                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35563                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35564                                  	; cf=0
 35565 0000355E C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35566                                  try_f:
 35567                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35568 0000355F F6C180                  	test	cl,flagff ; 80h
 35569                                  	;test	cx,flagff ; 80h
 35570 00003562 7404                    	jz	short try_t
 35571                                  
 35572                                  ; ensure that we do not get bogus form factors that are not supported
 35573                                  
 35574                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+1],al
 35575 00003564 A2[3448]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],al
 35576                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35577                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35578                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35579                                  	; cf=0
 35580 00003567 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35581                                  try_t:
 35582 00003568 09C0                    	or	ax,ax
 35583 0000356A 7415                    	jz	short done_ret		; if number entered was 0, assume default value
 35584                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35585 0000356C F6C110                  	test	cl,flagcyln ; 10h
 35586                                  	;test	cx,flagcyln ; 10h
 35587 0000356F 7404                    	jz	short try_s
 35588                                  
 35589                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+4],ax
 35590 00003571 A3[3748]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],ax
 35591                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35592                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35593                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35594                                  	; cf=0
 35595 00003574 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35596                                  try_s:
 35597                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35598 00003575 F6C120                  	test	cl,flagseclim ; 20h
 35599                                  	;test	cx,flagseclim ; 20h
 35600 00003578 7404                    	jz	short try_h
 35601 0000357A A3[5949]                	mov	[slim],ax
 35602                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35603                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 35604                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35605                                  	; cf=0
 35606 0000357D C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 35607                                  
 35608                                  ; must be for number of heads
 35609                                  
 35610                                  try_h:
 35611 0000357E A3[5749]                	mov	[hlim],ax
 35612                                  done_ret:
 35613                                  	;clc
 35614                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35615                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35616                                  	; cf=0 (test instruction resets cf)
 35617                                  	;clc
 35618 00003581 C3                      	retn

 35713                                  
 35714                                  %endif
 35715                                  
 35716                                  ;	M047 -- Begin modifications (too numerous to mark specifically)
 35717                                  
 35718                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35719                                  ;
 35720                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 35721                                  ;
 35722                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 35723                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 35724                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 35725                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 35726                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 35727                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 35728                                  ;
 35729                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 35730                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 35731                                  ;
 35732                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 35733                                  ;
 35734                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35735                                  
 35736                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35737                                  
 35738                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35739                                  
 35740                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35741                                  	; (SYSINIT:3FC4h)
 35742                                  
 35743                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 35744                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4236h)
 35745                                  
 35746                                  setdeviceparameters:
 35747                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35748                                  	; ds = cs
 35749                                  
 35750 000035C4 06                      	push	es
 35751                                  
 35752 000035C5 0E                      	push	cs
 35753 000035C6 07                      	pop	es
 35754                                  
 35755 000035C7 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 35756 000035C9 8A1E[3448]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 35757 000035CD 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 35758 000035D0 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 35759                                  
 35760 000035D2 C706[3748]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 35761                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 35762                                  got_80:
 35763 000035D8 D1E3                    	shl	bx,1			; get index into bpb table
 35764 000035DA 8BB7[DC49]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 35765                                  
 35766                                  	;mov	di,deviceparameters+7	
 35767                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35768 000035DE BF[3A48]                	mov	di,deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB ; es:di -> bpb
 35769 000035E1 B91F00                  	mov	cx,A_BPB.size ; 31
 35770                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35771                                  	;mov	cx,59 ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM A_BPB.size
 35772 000035E4 FC                      	cld
 35773                                  	;repe	movsb
 35774                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35775 000035E5 F3A4                    	rep	movsb
 35776                                  
 35777 000035E7 07                      	pop	es
 35778                                  
 35779                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35780 000035E8 F606[5C49]20            	test	byte [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 35781                                  	;test	word [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 35782 000035ED 7406                    	jz	short see_heads
 35783                                  
 35784 000035EF A1[5949]                	mov	ax,[slim]
 35785                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+20],ax
 35786 000035F2 A3[4748]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],ax
 35787                                  
 35788                                  see_heads:
 35789                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35790 000035F5 F606[5C49]40            	test	byte [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 35791                                  	;test	word [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 35792 000035FA 7406                    	jz	short heads_not_altered
 35793                                  
 35794 000035FC A1[5749]                	mov	ax,[hlim]
 35795                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+22],ax	
 35796 000035FF A3[4948]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax
 35797                                  
 35798                                  heads_not_altered:
 35799                                  
 35800                                  ; set up correct media descriptor byte and sectors/cluster
 35801                                  ;   sectors/cluster is always 2 except for any one sided disk or 1.44M
 35802                                  
 35803                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+9],2
 35804                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35805                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],2
 35806                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35807 00003602 B80200                  	mov	ax,2	
 35808 00003605 A2[3C48]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2
 35809                                  
 35810 00003608 B3F0                    	mov	bl,0F0h			; get default mediabyte
 35811                                  
 35812                                  ;	preload the mediadescriptor from the bpb into bh for convenient access
 35813                                  
 35814                                  	;mov	bh,[deviceparameters+17]
 35815                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35816 0000360A 8A3E[4448]              	mov	bh,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 35817                                  	
 35818                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35819                                  	; ax = 2
 35820 0000360E 3906[4948]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 35821                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?
 35822 00003612 773C                    	ja	short got_correct_mediad ; just use default if heads>2
 35823                                  
 35824 00003614 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 35825                                  
 35826                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 35827                                  
 35828 00003616 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 35829                                  
 35830                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 35831                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 35832                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 35833                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 35834                                  
 35835                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 35836                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 35837                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 35838                                  
 35839 00003618 833E[4748]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 35840 0000361D 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 35841 0000361F 833E[3748]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 35842 00003624 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 35843                                  
 35844                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 35845                                  
 35846 00003626 EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 35847                                  
 35848                                  ;	check for 320K
 35849                                  
 35850                                  not_144m:
 35851 00003628 833E[3748]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 35852 0000362D 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 35853 0000362F 833E[4748]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 35854 00003634 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 35855                                  
 35856 00003636 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh
 35857 00003638 EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediad
 35858                                  
 35859                                  only_one_head:
 35860                                  
 35861                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 35862                                  
 35863 0000363A 803E[3448]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 35864 0000363F 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 35865                                  
 35866                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 35867                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 35868                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 35869                                  
 35870 00003641 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh			; single sided 9 sector media id
 35871 00003643 833E[4748]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 35872                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35873 00003648 7502                    	jne	short got_one_secperclus_drive ; okay if anything besides 8
 35874                                  
 35875 0000364A B3FE                    	mov	bl,0FEh			; 160K mediaid
 35876                                  
 35877                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 35878                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 35879                                  
 35880                                  got_one_secperclus_drive:
 35881                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35882                                  	; ax = 2
 35883 0000364C 48                      	dec	ax  ; ax = 1
 35884 0000364D A2[3C48]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 1
 35885                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],1
 35886                                  
 35887                                  got_correct_mediad:
 35888 00003650 881E[4448]              	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR],bl
 35889                                  
 35890                                  ;	 Calculate the correct number of Total Sectors on medium
 35891                                  
 35892 00003654 A1[3748]                	mov	ax,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 35893 00003657 F726[4948]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS]
 35894 0000365B F726[4748]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 35895 0000365F A3[4248]                	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS],ax
 35896 00003662 F8                      	clc				; we currently return no errors
 35897                                  
 35898 00003663 C3                      	retn
 35899                                  
 35900                                  ;	M047 -- end rewritten routine

 35948                                  ;;   because we the case of values in SET commands preserved
 35949                                  ;

 35951                                  ;endif

 35953                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 35954                                  	;call	mapcase
 35955                                  
 35956 0000366F 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 35957 00003671 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 35958 00003673 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 35959                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)	
 35960                                  	;;mov	byte [cs:com_level],0
 35961                                  	; 12/12/2022

 35967                                  org0:
 35968 00003675 C606[5003]00            	mov	byte [com_level],0 ; 09/09/2023
 35969                                  org1:
 35970 0000367A E8EF01                  	call	skip_comment
 35971 0000367D 74E5                    	jz	short end_commd_line	; found a comment string and skipped.
 35972 0000367F E8D001                  	call	get2			; not a comment string. then get a char.
 35973 00003682 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf ; 0Ah
 35974 00003684 74DE                    	je	short end_commd_line	; starts with a blank line.
 35975 00003686 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' ; 20h

 35977                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35978                                  	;jmp	short findit

 35996 0000368A 51                      	push	cx
 35997 0000368B 56                      	push	si
 35998 0000368C 57                      	push	di
 35999 0000368D 89F5                    	mov	bp,si
 36000 0000368F 4D                      	dec	bp
 36001 00003690 BE[5047]                        mov     si,comtab		; prepare to search command table
 36002 00003693 B500                    	mov	ch,0
 36003                                  findcom:

 36005 00003697 8A0C                    	mov	cl,[si]
 36006 00003699 46                      	inc	si
 36007 0000369A E345                    	jcxz	nocom
 36008                                  
 36009                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36010

 36012                                  
 36013                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36014                                  
 36015                                  ;   Simplify future parsing by collapsing ";" onto "REM", and at the same
 36016                                  ;   time skip the upcoming delimiter test (since ";" need not be followed by
 36017                                  ;   anything in particular)
 36018

 36020 000036A0 7430                    	je	short semicolon
 36021                                  loopcom:

 36023                                  	;inc	di

 36026                                  	;cmp	al,[si-1]

 36029 000036A5 47                      	inc	di

 36033                                  	;cmp	al,ah
 36034                                  	;loope	loopcom

 36037 000036AC E1F4                    	loopz	loopcom
 36038                                  ;else
 36039                                  ;	repe	cmpsb
 36040                                  ;endif
 36041                                  	; 02/11/2022

 36043                                  	;repe	cmpsb
 36044                                  
 36045                                  	; 28/07/2023
 36046                                  	;lahf

 36048                                  	;sahf
 36049 000036B0 AC                              lodsb                           ; get indicator letter
 36050                                  	;jnz	short findcom
 36051                                          ; 28/07/2023
 36052 000036B1 08E4                    	or	ah,ah			; (*)
 36053 000036B3 75E0                    	jnz	short findcom		
 36054                                  	
 36055 000036B5 26803D0D                	cmp     byte [es:di],cr		; the next char might be cr,lf
 36056 000036B9 7421                    	je	short gotcom0 		; such as in "rem",cr,lf case.
 36057 000036BB 26803D0A                	cmp	byte [es:di],lf
 36058 000036BF 741B                    	je	short gotcom0
 36059                                  
 36060                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36061                                  
 36062                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36063

 36065                                  
 36066                                  ; Skip the delimiter test for the BEGIN identifier (it doesn't have one).
 36067                                  
 36068 000036C1 3C5B                    	cmp	al,CONFIG_BEGIN  ; '['
 36069 000036C3 7417                    	je	short gotcom0
 36070                                  ;endif
 36071 000036C5 50                      	push	ax
 36072 000036C6 268A05                  	mov	al,[es:di]		; now the next char. should be a delim.
 36073                                  
 36074                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36075                                  
 36076                                  ;   If keyword is *immediately* followed by a question mark (?), then
 36077                                  ;   set the high bit of the ASCII command code (CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY) that is
 36078                                  ;   stored in the CONFIG.SYS memory image.
 36079

 36089                                  no_query:

 36098                                  no_delim:

 36100 000036DA 75B9                    	jnz	short findcom

 36451                                  ;
 36452                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 36453                                  ;
 36454                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 36455                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 36456                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 36457                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 36458                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 36459                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 36460                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 36461                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 36462                                  ;
 36463                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36464                                  
 36465                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36466                                  	; (SYSINIT:428Dh)
 36467                                  
 36468                                  skip_comment:
 36469 0000386C E3EA                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 36470                                  
 36471                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36472                                  	; ds = cs	
 36473                                  
 36474 0000386E 803E[5003]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 36475                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 36476 00003873 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 36477                                  
 36478 00003875 803E[5103]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 36479                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 36480 0000387A 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 36481                                  
 36482 0000387C 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 36483                                  	
 36484 0000387F 3806[5203]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 36485                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 36486 00003883 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 36487                                  
 36488 00003885 803E[5103]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 36489                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 36490 0000388A 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 36491                                  
 36492 0000388C 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 36493                                  	
 36494 00003890 3806[5303]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 36495                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 36496 00003894 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 36497                                  skip_cmmt:
 36498 00003896 E3C0                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 36499 00003898 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 36500 0000389B 46                      	inc	si
 36501 0000389C 49                      	dec	cx
 36502 0000389D 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 36503 0000389F 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 36504                                  no_commt:
 36505 000038A1 C3                      	retn
