 36515                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36516                                  ;
 36517                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 36518                                  ;
 36519                                  ;   INPUT
 36520                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 36521                                  ;
 36522                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36523                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 36524                                  ;
 36525                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36526                                  ;       All
 36527                                  ;
 36528                                  ;   HISTORY
 36529                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 36530                                  ;
 36531                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36532                                  
 36533                                  kbd_read:
 36534 000038A2 F606[FF46]02                    test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 36535 000038A7 7520                            jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 36536                                  
 36537 000038A9 1E                              push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 36538 000038AA 29C0                            sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 36539 000038AC 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 36540                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 36541                                  kbd_loop:
 36542 000038AE B401                            mov     ah,1            ;
 36543 000038B0 CD16                            int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 36544 000038B2 7514                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 36545 000038B4 B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 36546 000038B6 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36547 000038B8 A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 36548 000038BA 750C                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 36549 000038BC A16C04                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 36550                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 36551                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36552 000038BF 2E2B06[8603]            	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 36553                                  
 36554 000038C4 3C25                    	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?  ; (2 seconds)
 36555 000038C6 72E6                            jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 36556                                  kbd_loopdone:
 36557 000038C8 1F                              pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 36558                                  kbd_nodelay:
 36559 000038C9 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 36560 000038CB B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 36561 000038CD CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36562 000038CF A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 36563 000038D1 7407                            jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 36564 000038D3 43                              inc     bx              ; yes
 36565 000038D4 43                              inc     bx
 36566                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 36567 000038D5 800E[0347]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 36568                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 36569 000038DA B401                            mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 36570 000038DC CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36571 000038DE 743E                            jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 36572 000038E0 08C0                            or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 36573 000038E2 753A                            jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 36574                                  
 36575                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 36576 000038E4 80FC62                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 36577 000038E7 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 36578                                  	
 36579 000038E9 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 36580 000038EC 750D                            jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 36581                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 36582 000038EE BA[974B]                        mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 36583 000038F1 E8DD0B                          call    print
 36584                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 36585 000038F4 800E[0347]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 
 36586 000038F9 EB16                            jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 36587                                  kbd_notf5:
 36588                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 36589 000038FB 80FC65                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 36590 000038FE 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 36591                                  
 36592 00003900 80FC42                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 36593 00003903 7523                            jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 36594                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 36595 00003905 BA[D54B]                        mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 36596 00003908 E8C60B                          call    print           ;
 36597 0000390B B301                            mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 36598 0000390D 881E[0347]                      mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 36599                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 36600 00003911 B400                            mov     ah,0            ;
 36601 00003913 CD16                            int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 36602 00003915 C606[0947]FF                    mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 36603 0000391A 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ;
 36604 0000391C 7405                            jz	short kbd_clean	;
 36605                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 36606 0000391E 80FB02                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 36607 00003921 7205                            jb	short kbd_exit	;
 36608                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 36609 00003923 E86E08                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 36610 00003926 F9                              stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 36611 00003927 C3                              retn			;
 36612                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 36613 00003928 F8                              clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 36614 00003929 C3                              retn			;
 36615                                  
 36616                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36617                                  ;
 36618                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 36619                                  ;
 36620                                  ;   INPUT
 36621                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 36622                                  ;
 36623                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36624                                  ;       None
 36625                                  ;

 36635                                  
 36636                                  set_numlock:
 36637                                          ; 04/01/2023
 36638                                  	;push	ax
 36639 0000392A 1E                              push    ds
 36640 0000392B 29C0                            sub     ax,ax
 36641 0000392D 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax
 36642 0000392F 268B04                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 36643 00003932 2E3B06[724B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 36644 00003937 7507                            jne	short not_off	; no
 36645 00003939 80261704DF                      and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 36646 0000393E EB0D                            jmp     short set_done
 36647                                  not_off:
 36648 00003940 2E3B06[704B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 36649 00003945 F9                              stc
 36650 00003946 7505                            jne	short set_done	; no
 36651 00003948 800E170420                      or      byte [0417h],20h
 36652                                  set_done:
 36653 0000394D 1F                              pop     ds
 36654                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36655                                  	;pop	ax
 36656 0000394E C3                              retn
 36657                                  
 36658                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36659                                  
 36660                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36661                                  ;
 36662                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 36663                                  ;
 36664                                  ;   INPUT
 36665                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 36666                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 36667                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 36668                                  ;
 36669                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36670                                  ;       Same as above; the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 36671                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 36672                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 36673                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 36674                                  ;
 36675                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36676                                  ;       All
 36677                                  ;
 36678                                  ;   NOTES
 36679                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 36680                                  ;
 36681                                  ;   HISTORY
 36682                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36683                                  ;
 36684                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36685                                  
 36686                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36687                                  	; (SYSINIT:4378h)
 36688                                  
 36689                                  menu_check:
 36690                                  
 36691                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present; if so, then
 36692                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 36693                                  
 36694 0000394F 51                              push    cx              ;
 36695 00003950 56                              push    si              ;
 36696 00003951 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 36697                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 36698 00003953 E83507                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 36699 00003956 724C                            jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 36700 00003958 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; '['
 36701 0000395A 7503                            jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 36702 0000395C 43                              inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 36703 0000395D EB40                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 36704                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 36705 0000395F 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 36706 00003961 750E                            jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 36707 00003963 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 36708 00003965 7538                            jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 36709 00003967 E8C0FF                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 36710 0000396A 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 36711 0000396F EB2E                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 36712                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 36713 00003971 3C31                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 36714 00003973 752A                            jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 36715                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 36716 00003975 E81307                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 36717                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 36718 00003978 3C0A                            cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 36719 0000397A 7423                            je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 36720 0000397C 3C2F                            cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 36721 0000397E 75F5                            jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 36722 00003980 E80807                          call    get_char        ;
 36723 00003983 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 36724 00003985 3A06[B91E]                      cmp     al,[swit_n+1]	; 'N'
 36725 00003989 7507                            jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 36726 0000398B 800E[FF46]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 36727 00003990 EBE3                            jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 36728                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 36729 00003992 3A06[C51E]                      cmp     al,[swit_f+1]	; 'F'
 36730 00003996 75E0                            jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 36731 00003998 800E[FF46]02                    or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 36732 0000399D EBD6                            jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 36733                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 36734 0000399F E8C306                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36735 000039A2 EBAF                            jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 36736                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 36737 000039A4 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36738 000039A5 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36739                                  
 36740                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 36741                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 36742                                  
 36743 000039A6 F606[FF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36744 000039AB 7508                            jnz	short menu_search
 36745                                  ;
 36746                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 36747                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 36748                                  ;
 36749 000039AD E8F2FE                          call    kbd_read
 36750 000039B0 7303                            jnc	short menu_search
 36751 000039B2 E9EE01                          jmp	menu_abort
 36752                                  
 36753                                  ;   Search for MENU block; it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 36754                                  
 36755                                  menu_search:
 36756 000039B5 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 36757 000039B7 BF[4447]                        mov     di,szMenu	;
 36758 000039BA E80304                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 36759 000039BD 7337                            jnc	short menu_found ;
 36760 000039BF C606[3C47]00                    mov     byte [szBoot],0
 36761 000039C4 E90C02                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 36762                                  
 36763                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 36764                                  
 36765                                  menu_color:
 36766 000039C7 51                      	push	cx              ;
 36767 000039C8 52                      	push	dx              ;
 36768                                  	;;mov	dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 36769                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36770                                  	;mov	dl,7 ; !*!
 36771 000039C9 E89E06                  	call	get_number	; get first number
 36772 000039CC 80E30F                  	and	bl,0Fh  ; !**!	; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 36773 000039CF 88DD                    	mov	ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 36774                                  	; 01/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization) by Erdogan Tan 
 36775                                  	; (high nibble of dl is 0)
 36776                                  	;and	dl,0F0h	; !*!	; (low nibble of dl would be zero)
 36777                                  	;or	dl,bl		; (low nibble of dl is 7) ! 14/08/2023
 36778 000039D1 88DA                    	mov	dl,bl	; 14/08/2023
 36779 000039D3 E83108                  	call	delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 36780 000039D6 750E                    	jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 36781 000039D8 E88F06                  	call	get_number	; get next number
 36782 000039DB 80E30F                  	and	bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 36783 000039DE 88DE                    	mov	dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 36784                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36785                                  	;and	dl,0Fh	; !**!	;
 36786 000039E0 B104                    	mov	cl,4            ;
 36787 000039E2 D2E3                    	shl	bl,cl           ;
 36788 000039E4 08DA                    	or	dl,bl           ;
 36789                                  check_color:
 36790 000039E6 38F5                    	cmp	ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 36791 000039E8 7503                    	jne	short set_color	; no
 36792 000039EA 80F208                  	xor	dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 36793                                  set_color:
 36794 000039ED 8816[FA46]              	mov	[bMenuColor],dl ;
 36795 000039F1 5A                      	pop	dx              ;
 36796 000039F2 59                      	pop	cx              ;
 36797 000039F3 E9A900                  	jmp	menu_nextitem
 36798                                  
 36799                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 36800                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 36801                                  
 36802                                  menu_found:
 36803 000039F6 C606[0447]01                    mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 36804                                          ;mov	word [offDefBlock],0
 36805 000039FB C606[0847]FF                    mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 36806 00003A00 8026[0347]FD                    and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 36807                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36808 00003A05 29D2                    	sub	dx,dx
 36809 00003A07 8916[0647]              	mov	[offDefBlock],dx ; 0
 36810                                  
 36811 00003A0B E85706                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 36812                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36813                                  	;sub	dx,dx		; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 36814                                  
 36815                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 36816                                  
 36817                                  menu_process:
 36818 00003A0E E87A06                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 36819 00003A11 722E                            jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 36820 00003A13 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36821 00003A15 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 36822 00003A17 7428                            je	short to_menu_getdefault
 36823 00003A19 3C4F                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 36824 00003A1B 744D                            je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 36825 00003A1D 3C45                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 36826 00003A1F 7449                            je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 36827 00003A21 3C41                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 36828 00003A23 741E                            je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 36829 00003A25 3C52                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 36830 00003A27 749E                            je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 36831 00003A29 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 36832 00003A2B 740F                            je	short menu_numlock ;
 36833 00003A2D 3C30                            cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 36834 00003A2F 746E                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 36835 00003A31 E8C307                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 36836 00003A34 7469                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 36837 00003A36 F9                              stc                     ;
 36838 00003A37 E82607                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 36839 00003A3A EB63                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 36840                                  menu_numlock:
 36841 00003A3C E8EBFE                          call    set_numlock
 36842 00003A3F EB5E                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 36843                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 36844 00003A41 EB62                            jmp     short menu_getdefault
 36845                                  
 36846                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 36847                                  
 36848                                  menu_default:
 36849 00003A43 8936[0647]                      mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 36850 00003A47 803E[0947]00                    cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 36851 00003A4C 751A                            jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 36852 00003A4E E8EA05                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 36853 00003A51 724C                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 36854 00003A53 E8FB05                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 36855 00003A56 7247                            jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 36856 00003A58 89DE                            mov     si,bx           ;
 36857 00003A5A E80D06                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 36858 00003A5D 80FB5A                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 36859                                  	;jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 36860 00003A60 7602                            jna	short timeout_ok ; 01/08/2023
 36861 00003A62 B35A                    	mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 36862                                  timeout_ok:                    ;
 36863 00003A64 881E[0847]                      mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 36864                                  timeout_skip:
 36865 00003A68 EB35                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 36866                                  
 36867                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 36868                                  
 36869                                  menu_item:
 36870                                  	;cmp	dl,9	; 04/01/2023
 36871 00003A6A 80FA09                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 36872 00003A6D 7330                            jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 36873 00003A6F 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 36874 00003A71 E83303                          call    srch_block      ;
 36875 00003A74 7406                            je	short menu_itemfound ;
 36876 00003A76 F9                              stc                     ;
 36877 00003A77 E8E606                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 36878 00003A7A EB23                            jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 36879                                  
 36880                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 36881                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 36882                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 36883                                  
 36884                                  menu_itemfound:
 36885 00003A7C 42                              inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 36886 00003A7D 89D3                            mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 36887 00003A7F 8887[0A47]                      mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 36888 00003A83 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 36889                                  
 36890                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 36891                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 36892                                  ;   description...
 36893                                  
 36894 00003A85 89B7[1447]                      mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 36895 00003A89 89B7[2847]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 36896 00003A8D 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 36897 00003A8F E8A905                          call    skip_token      ;
 36898 00003A92 720B                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 36899 00003A94 E8BA05                          call    skip_delim      ;
 36900 00003A97 7206                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 36901 00003A99 87DF                            xchg    bx,di           ;
 36902 00003A9B 89BF[2847]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 36903                                  
 36904                                  menu_nextitem:
 36905 00003A9F E8C305                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36906 00003AA2 E969FF                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 36907                                  
 36908                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 36909                                  
 36910                                  menu_getdefault:
 36911 00003AA5 08D2                            or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 36912 00003AA7 7505                            jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 36913 00003AA9 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 36914 00003AAB E9ED00                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 36915                                  menu_valid:
 36916 00003AAE 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ;
 36917 00003AB0 8816[0547]                      mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 36918 00003AB4 8B3E[0647]                      mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 36919 00003AB8 09FF                            or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 36920 00003ABA 741C                            jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 36921 00003ABC 43                              inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 36922                                  menu_chkdefault:
 36923 00003ABD 53                              push    bx              ;
 36924 00003ABE 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 36925 00003AC0 8BB7[1447]                      mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 36926 00003AC4 B98000                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 36927 00003AC7 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36928 00003AC8 06                              push    es              ;
 36929 00003AC9 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36930 00003ACA E81A03                          call    comp_names      ; is this block the same as the default?
 36931 00003ACD 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36932 00003ACE 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 36933 00003ACF 7409                            je	short menu_setdefault ; yes
 36934 00003AD1 43                              inc     bx              ;
 36935 00003AD2 3A1E[0547]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done searching?
 36936 00003AD6 76E5                            jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 36937                                  menu_nodefault:
 36938 00003AD8 B301                            mov     bl,1            ; if no default, force default to #1
 36939                                  menu_setdefault:
 36940 00003ADA 881E[0447]                      mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 36941                                  
 36942                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 36943                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 36944                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 36945                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 36946                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 36947                                  ;   with no timeout)
 36948                                  
 36949 00003ADE 803E[0847]00                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 36950 00003AE3 750A                            jne	short menu_display ; no
 36951 00003AE5 F606[0347]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; yes, but was INTERACTIVE requested?
 36952 00003AEA 7503                            jnz	short menu_display ; yes, so *don't* assume default after all
 36953 00003AEC E9C700                          jmp     not_topmenu	;
 36954                                  
 36955                                  ;   Reset the mode, so that we know screen is clean and cursor is home
 36956                                  
 36957                                  menu_display:
 36958 00003AEF B40F                            mov     ah,0Fh          ; get current video mode
 36959 00003AF1 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36960 00003AF3 B400                            mov     ah,00h          ; just re-select that mode
 36961 00003AF5 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36962 00003AF7 06                              push    es              ;
 36963 00003AF8 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 36964 00003AFB 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 36965 00003AFD 26A14E00                        mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 36966 00003B01 A3[0147]                        mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled
 36967 00003B04 26A06200                        mov     al,[es:0062h]   ;
 36968 00003B08 A2[0047]                        mov     [bCRTPage],al   ;
 36969 00003B0B A1[FB46]                        mov     ax,[bMenuPage]	; select new page for menu
 36970 00003B0E CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36971 00003B10 B80006                          mov     ax,0600h        ; clear entire screen
 36972 00003B13 8A3E[FA46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuColor] ; using this color
 36973 00003B17 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 36974                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 36975 00003B19 268A164A00                      mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 36976 00003B1E FECA                    	dec     dl              ;
 36977                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 36978 00003B20 268A368400                      mov	dh,[es:84h]
 36979 00003B25 08F6                    	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 36980 00003B27 7504                            jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 36981 00003B29 8A36[FE46]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 36982                                  menu_clear:
 36983 00003B2D CD10                            int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 36984 00003B2F 07                              pop     es              ;
 36985 00003B30 8836[FE46]                      mov     [bLastRow],dh   ; save DH
 36986 00003B34 BA[124C]                        mov     dx,_$MenuHeader
 36987 00003B37 E89709                          call    print           ; cursor now on row 3 (numbered from 0)
 36988                                  
 36989 00003B3A F606[FF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36990 00003B3F 751F                            jnz     short menu_nostatus
 36991 00003B41 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 36992 00003B45 8A36[FE46]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; restore DH
 36993 00003B49 B200                            mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 36994 00003B4B B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 36995 00003B4D CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36996 00003B4F BA[604C]                        mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 36997 00003B52 E87C09                          call    print           ;
 36998 00003B55 B403                            mov     ah,3            ; get cursor position
 36999 00003B57 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37000 00003B59 80EA02                          sub     dl,2            ;
 37001 00003B5C 8816[FD46]                      mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 37002                                  
 37003                                  menu_nostatus:
 37004 00003B60 BB0100                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 37005                                  menu_disploop:
 37006 00003B63 E8B002                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 37007 00003B66 43                              inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"? because it's a 1-byte opcode
 37008 00003B67 3A1E[0547]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 37009 00003B6B 76F6                            jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 37010                                  
 37011                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 37012                                  
 37013 00003B6D B200                            mov     dl,0            ; select column
 37014 00003B6F 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 37015 00003B71 80C604                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 37016 00003B74 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 37017 00003B78 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 37018 00003B7A CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37019                                  
 37020 00003B7C BA[4D4C]                        mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 37021 00003B7F E84F09                          call    print           ;
 37022 00003B82 E82903                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 37023 00003B85 BA[1E4A]                        mov     dx,crlfm	
 37024 00003B88 E84609                          call    print           ;
 37025 00003B8B FF36[FF46]                      push    word [bDisableUI]
 37026 00003B8F 800E[FF46]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 37027 00003B94 E86704                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 37028 00003B97 8F06[FF46]                      pop     word [bDisableUI]
 37029                                  
 37030                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 37031                                  
 37032                                  menu_autoselect:
 37033 00003B9B 83FBFF                          cmp     bx,-1 ; 0FFFFh	; clean boot requested?
 37034 00003B9E 7508                            jne	short normal_boot ; no
 37035 00003BA0 E8F105                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 37036                                  menu_abort:
 37037 00003BA3 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 37038 00003BA5 E9E400                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 37039                                  
 37040                                  normal_boot:
 37041 00003BA8 83FBFE                          cmp     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; back to top-level menu?
 37042 00003BAB 7509                            jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 37043 00003BAD 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 37044 00003BB1 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 37045 00003BB3 E9FFFD                          jmp     menu_search
 37046                                  
 37047                                  not_topmenu:
 37048 00003BB6 80BF[0A47]4F                    cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 37049 00003BBB 7510                            jne	short not_submenu
 37050 00003BBD 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 37051 00003BBF 8BBF[1447]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 37052 00003BC3 E8E101                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 37053 00003BC6 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 37054 00003BC8 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 37055 00003BCA E929FE                          jmp     menu_found
 37056                                  
 37057                                  not_submenu:
 37058 00003BCD 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 37059 00003BCF 8B9F[1447]                      mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 37060                                  
 37061                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 37062                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 37063                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 37064                                  
 37065                                  no_selection:
 37066 00003BD3 891E[0647]                      mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 37067 00003BD7 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 37068 00003BDB 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 37069 00003BDD 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37070 00003BDE 8E1E[B614]                      mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 37071 00003BE2 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 37072                                  
 37073                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 37074                                  ;
 37075                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 37076                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 37077                                  ;   within the requested block. Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 37078                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion; the amount of recursion is
 37079                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 37080                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 37081                                  ;
 37082                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 37083                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 37084                                  
 37085                                  copyblock_loop:
 37086 00003BE4 53                              push    bx              ; save selected block name
 37087 00003BE5 E82F01                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 37088 00003BE8 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37089 00003BE9 7232                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 37090                                  
 37091                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons: it hit eof or a new block
 37092                                  
 37093                                  copyblock_begin:
 37094                                  
 37095                                  ; 10/09/2023
 37096                                  %if 0
 37097                                          push    ax              ;
 37098                                          push    cx              ;
 37099                                          push    si              ;
 37100                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 37101                                          mov     di,szCommon
 37102                                          push    ds              ;
 37103                                          push    cs              ;
 37104                                          pop     ds              ;
 37105                                          call    comp_names      ;
 37106                                          pop     ds              ;
 37107                                          pop     di              ;
 37108                                          pop     si              ;
 37109                                          pop     cx              ;
 37110                                          pop     ax              ;
 37111                                          je	short copyblock_check
 37112                                  %endif
 37113                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37114 00003BEB 57                      	push	di
 37115 00003BEC BF[4947]                	mov	di,szCommon	; always do "common" blocks
 37116 00003BEF E81602                  	call	comp_names_x	; (comp_names_safe)
 37117 00003BF2 5F                      	pop	di
 37118 00003BF3 740F                    	je	short copyblock_check
 37119                                  
 37120 00003BF5 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 37121 00003BF7 7414                            jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 37122 00003BF9 57                              push    di              ;
 37123 00003BFA 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 37124 00003BFC 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37125 00003BFD 06                              push    es              ;
 37126 00003BFE 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37127 00003BFF E8E501                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 37128 00003C02 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37129 00003C03 5F                              pop     di              ;
 37130                                  copyblock_check:
 37131 00003C04 7217                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 37132 00003C06 7505                            jne	short copyblock_skip ;
 37133 00003C08 E85A04                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 37134 00003C0B EBD7                            jmp	short copyblock_loop
 37135                                  
 37136                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 37137 00003C0D E85504                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 37138 00003C10 E87804                          call    get_char        ;
 37139 00003C13 7208                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 37140 00003C15 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37141 00003C17 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 37142 00003C19 74D0                            je	short copyblock_begin
 37143 00003C1B EBF0                            jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 37144                                  ;
 37145                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 37146                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 37147                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 37148                                  ;
 37149                                  move_config:
 37150 00003C1D 89F9                            mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 37151 00003C1F 51                              push    cx              ;
 37152                                  ;
 37153                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 37154                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 37155                                  ;
 37156                                   	;mov	cx,7
 37157 00003C20 B90700                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 37158 00003C23 BE[3C47]                        mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 37159 00003C26 47                              inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 37160                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 37161                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 37162                                  copy_boot: 
 37163                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 37164 00003C27 2E                              cs
 37165 00003C28 AC                      	lodsb
 37166 00003C29 8805                    	mov     [di],al         ;
 37167 00003C2B 47                              inc     di              ;
 37168 00003C2C E2F9                            loop    copy_boot       ;
 37169                                  
 37170 00003C2E 06                              push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 37171                                          ;mov	cx,128-7	; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 37172                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37173 00003C2F B179                    	mov	cl,128-7
 37174 00003C31 2E8B36[0647]            	mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 37175 00003C36 09F6                            or      si,si           ; valid?
 37176 00003C38 7505                            jnz	short l1	; yes
 37177 00003C3A 0E                              push    cs              ;
 37178 00003C3B 07                              pop     es              ;
 37179 00003C3C BE[4947]                        mov     si,szCommon
 37180 00003C3F 268A04                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 37181 00003C42 E8B205                          call    any_delim       ;
 37182 00003C45 7406                            je	short l2	;
 37183 00003C47 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 37184 00003C49 46                              inc     si              ;
 37185 00003C4A 47                              inc     di              ;
 37186 00003C4B E2F2                            loop    l1              ;
 37187 00003C4D C6050A                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 37188 00003C50 07                              pop     es              ;
 37189                                  
 37190                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 37191                                  
 37192 00003C51 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 37193 00003C53 2E893E[B414]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 37194 00003C58 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 37195 00003C5A 59                              pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 37196                                  
 37197 00003C5B 51                              push    cx              ;
 37198 00003C5C F3A4                            rep     movsb           ; moved!
 37199 00003C5E 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37200 00003C5F 8CD8                            mov     ax,ds           ;
 37201 00003C61 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37202                                  
 37203                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 37204                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 37205                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 37206                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 37207                                  ;   is empty.
 37208                                  
 37209 00003C62 06                              push    es              ;
 37210 00003C63 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 37211 00003C65 46                              inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 37212 00003C66 26C606000000                    mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 37213 00003C6C E82600                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 37214 00003C6F 07                              pop     es
 37215                                  
 37216                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 37217                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 37218                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 37219                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 37220                                  
 37221                                  menu_done:
 37222 00003C70 803E[FB46]00                    cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 37223 00003C75 7415                            je	short menu_exit	;
 37224 00003C77 06                              push    es              ;
 37225 00003C78 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 37226 00003C7B 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 37227 00003C7D A1[0147]                        mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 37228 00003C80 26A34E00                        mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 37229 00003C84 A0[0047]                        mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 37230 00003C87 26A26200                        mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 37231 00003C8B 07                              pop     es              ;
 37232                                  menu_exit:
 37233 00003C8C 890E[5603]                      mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 37234 00003C90 890E[5803]                      mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 37235                                          ; 10/09/2023 (*) - Erdogan Tan
 37236                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:46D3h
 37237                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:491Ah
 37238                                  	;sub	si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 37239 00003C94 C3                      	retn
 37240                                  
 37241                                  ; (*) NOTE: MSDOS 6.0 source code (SYSINIT2.ASM) contains 'sub si,si' at this
 37242                                  ;	position (then 'retn' just after it)
 37243                                  ;	but MSDOS 6.21 and PCDOS 7.1 SYSINITs contain only 'retn' here.
 37244                                  
 37245                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37246                                  ;
 37247                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 37248                                  ;
 37249                                  ;   INPUT
 37250                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 37251                                  ;
 37252                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37253                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 37254                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 37255                                  ;
 37256                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37257                                  ;       None
 37258                                  ;
 37259                                  ;   NOTES
 37260                                  ;       None
 37261                                  ;
 37262                                  ;   HISTORY
 37263                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37264                                  ;
 37265                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37266                                  
 37267                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37268                                  	; (SYSINIT:46D4h)
 37269                                  
 37270                                  copy_envvar:
 37271 00003C95 51                              push    cx              ;
 37272 00003C96 56                              push    si              ;
 37273 00003C97 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37274 00003C98 06                              push    es              ;
 37275 00003C99 06                              push    es              ;
 37276 00003C9A 8E06[B614]                      mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 37277 00003C9E 1F                              pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 37278                                  
 37279                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 37280                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 37281                                  ;   config.sys line)
 37282                                  ;
 37283                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 37284                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 37285                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 37286                                  
 37287 00003C9F 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ;
 37288                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 37289 00003CA1 AC                              lodsb                   ;
 37290 00003CA2 08C0                            or      al,al           ; NULL?
 37291                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 37292 00003CA4 746B                            jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 37293 00003CA6 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr           ;
 37294                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 37295 00003CA8 7467                            je	short copy_envexit
 37296 00003CAA 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf           ;
 37297                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 37298 00003CAC 7463                            je	short copy_envexit
 37299 00003CAE 41                              inc     cx              ;
 37300 00003CAF 3C3D                            cmp     al,'='          ;
 37301 00003CB1 75EE                            jne	short copy_varlen
 37302 00003CB3 B000                            mov     al,0            ;
 37303 00003CB5 8A24                            mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 37304 00003CB7 29CE                            sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 37305 00003CB9 49                              dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 37306 00003CBA 29FF                            sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 37307                                  copy_varsrch:
 37308 00003CBC 263805                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 37309 00003CBF 7425                            je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 37310 00003CC1 89FB                            mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 37311 00003CC3 51                              push    cx              ;
 37312 00003CC4 56                              push    si              ;
 37313 00003CC5 F3A6                            repe    cmpsb           ;
 37314 00003CC7 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37315 00003CC8 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37316 00003CC9 7531                            jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 37317 00003CCB 26803D3D                        cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 37318 00003CCF 752B                            jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 37319                                  
 37320                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 37321                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 37322                                  
 37323 00003CD1 B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 37324 00003CD4 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 37325 00003CD6 56                              push    si              ;
 37326 00003CD7 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 37327 00003CD9 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ;
 37328 00003CDB 2E8B0E[B414]                    mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 37329 00003CE0 29F1                            sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 37330                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 37331                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 37332                                  
 37333 00003CE2 F3                      	rep	; 0F3h
 37334 00003CE3 26                      	es	; 26h
 37335 00003CE4 A4                      	movsb	; 0A4h
 37336                                  
 37337 00003CE5 5E                      	pop     si
 37338                                  copy_envprep:
 37339 00003CE6 80FC0D                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 37340 00003CE9 741D                            je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 37341 00003CEB 80FC0A                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 37342 00003CEE 7418                            je	short copy_envdel
 37343                                          ;jmp	short copy_envloop
 37344                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37345                                  copy_envloop:                  ;
 37346 00003CF0 AC                      	lodsb                   ;
 37347 00003CF1 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr           ;
 37348 00003CF3 7410                    	je	short copy_envdone
 37349 00003CF5 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf           ;
 37350 00003CF7 740C                    	je	short copy_envdone
 37351 00003CF9 AA                      	stosb                   ;
 37352 00003CFA EBF4                    	jmp	short copy_envloop
 37353                                  
 37354                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 37355 00003CFC 51                              push    cx              ;
 37356 00003CFD B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 37357 00003D00 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ;
 37358 00003D02 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37359 00003D03 EBB7                            jmp	short copy_varsrch
 37360                                  
 37361                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37362                                  ;copy_envloop:                  ;
 37363                                  ;	lodsb                   ;
 37364                                  ;	cmp	al,cr           ;
 37365                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 37366                                  ;	cmp	al,lf           ;
 37367                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 37368                                  ;	stosb                   ;
 37369                                  ;	jmp	short copy_envloop
 37370                                  
 37371                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 37372 00003D05 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 37373 00003D07 AA                              stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 37374                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 37375 00003D08 268805                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 37376 00003D0B 2E893E[B414]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 37377                                  	; 10/09/2023 (x) - Erdogan Tan
 37378 00003D10 F9                      	stc ; in order to clear carry flag via cmc (compact code trick!)
 37379                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 37380 00003D11 F5                      	cmc ; (x) ; reverse carry flag status (je -> cf=1)
 37381 00003D12 07                              pop     es              ;
 37382 00003D13 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37383 00003D14 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37384 00003D15 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37385                                  
 37386                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 37387 00003D16 C3                              retn
 37388                                  
 37389                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37390                                  ;
 37391                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 37392                                  ;
 37393                                  ;   INPUT
 37394                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 37395                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 37396                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 37397                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 37398                                  ;
 37399                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37400                                  ;       Same as above
 37401                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 37402                                  ;
 37403                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37404                                  ;       All
 37405                                  ;
 37406                                  ;   NOTES
 37407                                  ;       None
 37408                                  ;
 37409                                  ;   HISTORY
 37410                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37411                                  ;
 37412                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37413                                  
 37414                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37415                                  	; (SYSINIT:4759h)
 37416                                  
 37417                                  copy_block:
 37418 00003D17 E87103                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 37419 00003D1A 72FA                            jc	short copy_done	;
 37420 00003D1C 247F                    	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37421 00003D1E 3C5B                    	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 37422 00003D20 74F4                            je	short copy_done ;
 37423                                  
 37424 00003D22 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 37425 00003D24 88E0                            mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 37426 00003D26 753A                            jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 37427                                  
 37428                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 37429                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 37430                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 37431                                  
 37432 00003D28 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 37433 00003D2D 57                              push    di              ;
 37434                                  
 37435 00003D2E BF[4447]                        mov     di,szMenu
 37436 00003D31 E8D400                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 37437 00003D34 7426                            je	short copy_skip	;
 37438                                  
 37439 00003D36 BF[4947]                        mov     di,szCommon
 37440 00003D39 E8CC00                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 37441 00003D3C 741E                            je	short copy_skip	;
 37442                                  
 37443 00003D3E 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 37444 00003D40 E86400                          call    srch_block      ;
 37445 00003D43 89FA                            mov     dx,di           ;
 37446                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37447                                  	;pop    di              ;
 37448 00003D45 7514                            jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 37449 00003D47 5F                      	pop	di  ; 10/09/2023
 37450 00003D48 51                              push    cx              ;
 37451 00003D49 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ;
 37452 00003D4B 56                              push    si              ;
 37453 00003D4C 4A                              dec     dx              ;
 37454 00003D4D 89D6                            mov     si,dx           ;
 37455 00003D4F E80E03                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 37456 00003D52 E8C2FF                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 37457 00003D55 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37458 00003D56 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37459 00003D57 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 37460 00003D59 EB2B                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 37461                                  
 37462                                  copy_error:
 37463                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37464 00003D5B F8                      	clc
 37465                                  copy_skip:
 37466 00003D5C 5F                              pop     di
 37467                                  ;copy_error:
 37468                                  	; 10/09/2023 (cf=0)
 37469                                  	;clc                    ;
 37470 00003D5D E80004                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 37471 00003D60 EB24                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 37472                                  
 37473                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 37474                                  
 37475                                  copy_line:
 37476 00003D62 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 37477 00003D64 47                              inc     di              ;
 37478 00003D65 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 37479 00003D67 721D                            jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 37480 00003D69 2E803E[B914]00                  cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 37481 00003D6F 7409                            je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 37482 00003D71 E81700                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 37483 00003D74 891D                            mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 37484 00003D76 47                              inc     di              ;
 37485 00003D77 47                              inc     di              ;
 37486 00003D78 EB08                            jmp     short copy_next ;
 37487                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 37488 00003D7A E80E03                          call    get_char        ;
 37489 00003D7D 7297                            jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 37490 00003D7F 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 37491 00003D81 47                              inc     di              ;
 37492                                  copy_next:
 37493 00003D82 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 37494 00003D84 75F4                            jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 37495                                  
 37496                                  copy_nextline:
 37497 00003D86 E8DC02                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 37498 00003D89 EB8C                            jmp     short copy_block
 37499                                  
 37500                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37501                                  ;copy_done:
 37502                                          ;retn
 37503                                  
 37504                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37505                                  ;
 37506                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 37507                                  ;
 37508                                  ;   INPUT
 37509                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 37510                                  ;
 37511                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37512                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 37513                                  ;
 37514                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37515                                  ;       DX
 37516                                  ;
 37517                                  ;   NOTES
 37518                                  ;       None
 37519                                  ;
 37520                                  ;   HISTORY
 37521                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37522                                  ;
 37523                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37524                                  
 37525                                  get_linenum:
 37526 00003D8B 50                              push    ax              ;
 37527 00003D8C 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 37528 00003D8E 51                              push    cx              ;
 37529 00003D8F 89F2                            mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 37530 00003D91 56                              push    si              ;
 37531 00003D92 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 37532 00003D97 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 37533                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 37534 00003D99 E8C402                          call    skip_line       ;
 37535 00003D9C 7205                            jc	short get_linenum_done
 37536 00003D9E 43                              inc     bx              ;
 37537 00003D9F 39D6                            cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 37538 00003DA1 72F6                            jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 37539                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 37540 00003DA3 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37541 00003DA4 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37542 00003DA5 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37543 00003DA6 C3                              retn
 37544                                  
 37545                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37546                                  ;
 37547                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 37548                                  ;
 37549                                  ;   INPUT
 37550                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 37551                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 37552                                  ;
 37553                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37554                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 37555                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 37556                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 37557                                  ;
 37558                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37559                                  ;       None
 37560                                  ;
 37561                                  ;   NOTES
 37562                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 37563                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 37564                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 37565                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 37566                                  ;
 37567                                  ;   HISTORY
 37568                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37569                                  ;
 37570                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37571
