 37572                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 37573 00003DA7 50                              push    ax              ;
 37574 00003DA8 51                              push    cx              ;
 37575 00003DA9 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 37576 00003DAE 56                              push    si              ;
 37577 00003DAF 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 37578 00003DB1 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37579 00003DB2 06                              push    es              ;
 37580 00003DB3 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37581 00003DB4 E80900                          call    find_block      ;
 37582 00003DB7 89F7                            mov     di,si           ;
 37583 00003DB9 89CB                            mov     bx,cx           ;
 37584 00003DBB 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37585 00003DBC 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37586 00003DBD 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37587 00003DBE 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37588                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 37589 00003DBF C3                              retn			;
 37590                                  
 37591                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37592                                  ;
 37593                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 37594                                  ;
 37595                                  ;   INPUT
 37596                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 37597                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 37598                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 37599                                  ;
 37600                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37601                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 37602                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 37603                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37604                                  ;
 37605                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37606                                  ;       AX
 37607                                  ;
 37608                                  ;   NOTES
 37609                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 37610                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 37611                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 37612                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 37613                                  ;
 37614                                  ;   HISTORY
 37615                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37616                                  ;
 37617                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37618                                  
 37619                                  find_block:
 37620 00003DC0 E8C802                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 37621 00003DC3 72FA                            jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 37622 00003DC5 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 37623 00003DC7 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 37624 00003DC9 740C                            je	short check_line ; no
 37625 00003DCB 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 37626 00003DCD 7513                            jne	short next_line	;
 37627 00003DCF 2E800E[B914]01                  or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 37628 00003DD5 EB0B                            jmp     short next_line ;
 37629                                  check_line:
 37630 00003DD7 2E800E[B914]01                  or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 37631 00003DDD E80700                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 37632 00003DE0 76DD                            jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 37633                                  next_line:
 37634 00003DE2 E88002                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 37635 00003DE5 EBD9                            jmp	short find_block  ;
 37636                                  ;find_exit:
 37637                                  ;	retn
 37638                                  
 37639                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37640                                  ;
 37641                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 37642                                  ;
 37643                                  ;   INPUT
 37644                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 37645                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37646                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37647                                  ;
 37648                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37649                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 37650                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 37651                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37652                                  ;
 37653                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37654                                  ;       AX
 37655                                  ;
 37656                                  ;   NOTES
 37657                                  ;       None
 37658                                  ;
 37659                                  ;   HISTORY
 37660                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37661                                  ;
 37662                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37663                                  
 37664                                  comp_names:
 37665 00003DE7 57                              push    di              ;
 37666                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 37667 00003DE8 E8A002                          call    get_char        ;
 37668 00003DEB 7210                            jc	short comp_exit	;
 37669 00003DED E80704                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 37670 00003DF0 8A25                            mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 37671 00003DF2 740B                            je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 37672 00003DF4 47                              inc     di              ;
 37673 00003DF5 25DFDF                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 37674                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 37675 00003DF8 38E0                            cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 37676 00003DFA 74EC                            je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 37677 00003DFC F8                              clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 37678                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 37679 00003DFD 5F                              pop     di              ;
 37680 00003DFE C3                              retn			;
 37681                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 37682 00003DFF 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 37683 00003E01 E8F303                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 37684 00003E04 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 37685 00003E06 EBF5                            jmp     short comp_exit ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 37686                                  
 37687                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37688                                  
 37689                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37690                                  comp_names_x:
 37691                                  	;
 37692                                  comp_names_safe:
 37693 00003E08 50                              push    ax
 37694 00003E09 51                              push    cx
 37695 00003E0A 56                              push	si
 37696 00003E0B 1E                              push    ds
 37697 00003E0C 0E                              push    cs
 37698 00003E0D 1F                              pop     ds
 37699 00003E0E E8D6FF                          call    comp_names
 37700 00003E11 1F                              pop     ds
 37701 00003E12 5E                      	pop	si
 37702 00003E13 59                              pop     cx
 37703 00003E14 58                              pop     ax
 37704 00003E15 C3                              retn
 37705                                  
 37706                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37707                                  ;
 37708                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 37709                                  ;
 37710                                  ;   INPUT
 37711                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 37712                                  ;
 37713                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37714                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 37715                                  ;
 37716                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37717                                  ;       None
 37718                                  ;
 37719                                  ;   NOTES
 37720                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 37721                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 37722                                  ;
 37723                                  ;   HISTORY
 37724                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37725                                  ;
 37726                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37727                                  
 37728                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37729                                  	; (SYSINIT:485Ah)
 37730                                  
 37731                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 37732 00003E16 50                              push    ax              ;
 37733 00003E17 53                              push    bx              ;
 37734 00003E18 51                              push    cx              ;
 37735 00003E19 52                              push    dx              ;
 37736 00003E1A 56                              push    si              ;
 37737 00003E1B B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37738 00003E1D 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 37739 00003E21 CD10                            int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 37740 00003E23 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 37741 00003E24 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 37742 00003E26 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 37743 00003E28 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 37744 00003E2B B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 37745 00003E2D CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 37746 00003E2F 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37747 00003E31 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 37748 00003E33 8A26[FA46]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 37749 00003E37 3A1E[0447]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 37750 00003E3B 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 37751 00003E3D 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 37752 00003E40 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 37753 00003E42 B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 37754 00003E44 D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 37755 00003E46 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 37756 00003E48 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 37757 00003E4A 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 37758                                  print_other:                    ;
 37759 00003E4D B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 37760 00003E4F 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 37761 00003E51 8BBF[2847]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 37762 00003E55 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 37763 00003E57 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 37764 00003E5B B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 37765 00003E5D B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 37766 00003E60 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37767 00003E62 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37768 00003E64 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37769 00003E66 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37770                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 37771 00003E68 B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
 37772 00003E6B CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 37773 00003E6D FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37774 00003E6F B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37775 00003E71 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37776                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 37777 00003E73 B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 37778 00003E76 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 37779 00003E78 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37780 00003E7A B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37781 00003E7C CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37782 00003E7E 06                              push    es              ;
 37783                                  print_loop:                     ;
 37784 00003E7F 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 37785 00003E82 47                              inc     di              ;
 37786 00003E83 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 37787 00003E85 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 37788 00003E87 B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 37789                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 37790 00003E89 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 37791 00003E8B 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 37792 00003E8D 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 37793 00003E8F 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 37794 00003E91 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 37795 00003E93 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37796 00003E95 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37797 00003E97 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 37798 00003E9A 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 37799 00003E9C B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37800 00003E9E CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37801 00003EA0 EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 37802                                  print_done:                     ;
 37803 00003EA2 07                              pop     es              ;
 37804 00003EA3 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37805 00003EA4 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37806 00003EA6 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 37807 00003EA8 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37808 00003EA9 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37809 00003EAA 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37810 00003EAB 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37811 00003EAC 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37812 00003EAD C3                              retn			;
 37813                                  
 37814                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37815                                  ;
 37816                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 37817                                  ;
 37818                                  ;   INPUT
 37819                                  ;       None
 37820                                  ;
 37821                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37822                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 37823                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 37824                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 37825                                  ;
 37826                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37827                                  ;       None
 37828                                  ;
 37829                                  ;   NOTES
 37830                                  ;       None
 37831                                  ;
 37832                                  ;   HISTORY
 37833                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37834                                  ;
 37835                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37836                                  
 37837                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 37838 00003EAE 8A1E[0447]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 37839 00003EB2 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37840 00003EB4 E83701                          call    disp_num        ;
 37841 00003EB7 E84401                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 37842 00003EBA 803E[0847]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 37843 00003EBF 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 37844 00003EC1 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 37845 00003EC3 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 37846 00003EC5 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 37847                                  check_time:
 37848 00003EC7 A0[0847]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 37849 00003ECA 2A06[0947]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 37850 00003ECE 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 37851 00003ED0 800E[0347]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 37852 00003ED5 C606[0947]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 37853 00003EDA E9F600                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 37854                                  show_time:
 37855 00003EDD 53                              push    bx              ;
 37856 00003EDE 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 37857 00003EE0 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 37858 00003EE4 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37859 00003EE6 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37860 00003EE8 52                              push    dx              ;
 37861 00003EE9 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 37862 00003EEC B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 37863 00003EEE CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37864 00003EF0 BA[C04C]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 37865 00003EF3 E8DB05                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 37866 00003EF6 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 37867 00003EF8 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 37868 00003EF9 B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 37869 00003EFB F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 37870 00003EFD 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 37871 00003EFF 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 37872 00003F01 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 37873 00003F03 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 37874 00003F05 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 37875 00003F07 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 37876 00003F09 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 37877 00003F0B CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 37878 00003F0D 5A                              pop     dx
 37879 00003F0E B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 37880 00003F10 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37881 00003F12 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37882                                  input_key:
 37883 00003F13 B406                            mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 37884 00003F15 B2FF                            mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 37885 00003F17 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 37886 00003F19 751F                            jnz	short got_key	;
 37887 00003F1B 803E[0847]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 37888 00003F20 74F1                            je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 37889 00003F22 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 37890 00003F24 CD21                            int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 37891 00003F26 88F4                            mov     ah,dh           ;
 37892 00003F28 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 37893 00003F2A 88E7                            mov     bh,ah           ;
 37894 00003F2C 7302                            jnc	short got_time	;
 37895 00003F2E B601                            mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 37896                                  got_time:
 37897 00003F30 08F6                            or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 37898 00003F32 74DF                            jz	short input_key	; no
 37899 00003F34 0036[0947]                      add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 37900 00003F38 EB8D                            jmp	short check_time ;
 37901                                  got_key:
 37902 00003F3A 50                              push    ax              ;
 37903 00003F3B B8FFFF                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 37904 00003F3E 8706[0847]                      xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 37905 00003F42 3CFF                            cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 37906 00003F44 740E                            je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 37907 00003F46 53                              push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 37908 00003F47 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 37909 00003F4A 8B1E[FA46]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 37910 00003F4E B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 37911 00003F51 CD10                            int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 37912 00003F53 5B                              pop     bx   		;
 37913                                  
 37914                                  timeout_disabled:
 37915 00003F54 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37916 00003F55 08C0                            or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 37917 00003F57 755A                            jnz	short normal_key ; no
 37918 00003F59 CD21                            int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 37919 00003F5B 74B6                            jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 37920                                  
 37921 00003F5D 3C48                            cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 37922 00003F5F 7510                            jne	short not_up	; no
 37923 00003F61 80FB01                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 37924 00003F64 76AD                            jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 37925 00003F66 FE0E[0447]                      dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 37926 00003F6A E8A9FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 37927 00003F6D FECB                            dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 37928 00003F6F EB12                            jmp     short print1
 37929                                  not_up:
 37930 00003F71 3C50                            cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 37931 00003F73 7518                            jne	short not_down	; no
 37932 00003F75 3A1E[0547]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 37933 00003F79 7310                            jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 37934 00003F7B FE06[0447]                      inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 37935 00003F7F E894FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 37936 00003F82 43                              inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 37937                                  print1: 
 37938 00003F83 88D8                    	mov     al,bl           ;
 37939                                  print2: 
 37940 00003F85 E88EFE                  	call    print_item      ;
 37941 00003F88 E86300                          call    disp_num        ;
 37942                                  to_input_key:
 37943 00003F8B EB86                            jmp	short input_key ; 10/09/2023
 37944                                  not_down:
 37945 00003F8D F606[FF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 37946 00003F92 75F7                            jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 37947 00003F94 3C42                            cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 37948 00003F96 750B                            jne	short not_f8	; no
 37949 00003F98 8036[0347]01                    xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 37950 00003F9D E85E00                          call    show_status     ;
 37951 00003FA0 E970FF                          jmp     input_key	;
 37952                                  not_f8:
 37953 00003FA3 3C3F                            cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 37954 00003FA5 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no
 37955                                  	; 02/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37956                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:49EBh
 37957                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4C32h)

 37963                                  normal_key:

 38106                                  ;
 38107                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 38108                                  ;
 38109                                  ;   INPUT
 38110                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38111                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38112                                  ;
 38113                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38114                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 38115                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 38116                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 38117                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38118                                  ;
 38119                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38120                                  ;       AX
 38121                                  ;
 38122                                  ;   NOTES
 38123                                  ;       None
 38124                                  ;
 38125                                  ;   HISTORY
 38126                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38127                                  ;
 38128                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38129                                  
 38130                                  skip_token:
 38131 0000403B E84D00                          call    get_char
 38132 0000403E 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 38133 00004040 E8B401                          call    any_delim
 38134 00004043 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 38135                                  skip_check_eol:
 38136 00004045 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 38137 00004047 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 38138 00004049 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 38139 0000404B 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 38140 0000404D F8                              clc
 38141                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 38142 0000404E C3                      	retn
 38143                                  skip_token_eol:
 38144 0000404F F9                              stc
 38145                                  skip_token_done:
 38146 00004050 C3                              retn
 38147                                  
 38148                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38149                                  ;
 38150                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 38151                                  ;
 38152                                  ;   INPUT
 38153                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38154                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38155                                  ;
 38156                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38157                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 38158                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 38159                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 38160                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38161                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 38162                                  ;
 38163                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38164                                  ;       AX
 38165                                  ;
 38166                                  ;   NOTES
 38167                                  ;       None
 38168                                  ;
 38169                                  ;   HISTORY
 38170                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38171                                  ;
 38172                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38173                                  
 38174                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 38175 00004051 E83700                          call    get_char        ;
 38176 00004054 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 38177 00004057 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 38178 00004059 E8AB01                          call    delim           ;
 38179 0000405C 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 38180 0000405E EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 38181                                  
 38182                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38183                                  ;
 38184                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 38185                                  ;
 38186                                  ;   INPUT
 38187                                  ;       AL == last character read
 38188                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38189                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38190                                  ;
 38191                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38192                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 38193                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 38194                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 38195                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38196                                  ;
 38197                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38198                                  ;       AX
 38199                                  ;
 38200                                  ;   NOTES
 38201                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 38202                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 38203                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 38204                                  ;
 38205                                  ;   HISTORY
 38206                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38207                                  ;
 38208                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38209                                  
 38210                                  ; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38211                                  ;skip_opt_line:
 38212                                  ;	cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 38213                                  ;	je	short skip_line_done
 38214                                       
 38215                                  	; fall into skip_line
 38216                                  
 38217                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38218                                  ;
 38219                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 38220                                  ;
 38221                                  ;   INPUT
 38222                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38223                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38224                                  ;
 38225                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38226                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 38227                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 38228                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38229                                  ;
 38230                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38231                                  ;       AX
 38232                                  ;
 38233                                  ;   NOTES
 38234                                  ;       None
 38235                                  ;
 38236                                  ;   HISTORY
 38237                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38238                                  ;
 38239                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38240                                  
 38241                                  skip_line:
 38242 00004060 E82800                          call    get_char
 38243 00004063 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 38244                                  skip_opt_line:	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38245 00004065 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 38246 00004067 75F7                            jne	short skip_line
 38247                                  skip_line_done:
 38248                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 38249 00004069 C3                              retn

 38252                                  ;
 38253                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 38254                                  ;
 38255                                  ;   INPUT

 38261                                  ;       BX == binary #

 38280                                  num_loop:

 38282 0000406F 72F8                            jc	short num_done	;

 38289 0000407D 52                              push    dx              ;
 38290 0000407E F7E3                            mul     bx              ;
 38291 00004080 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 38292 00004081 89C3                            mov     bx,ax           ;
 38293 00004083 58                              pop     ax              ;
 38294 00004084 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ;
 38295 00004086 98                              cbw                     ;
 38296 00004087 01C3                            add     bx,ax           ;
 38297 00004089 EBE1                            jmp	short num_loop	;
 38298

 38300                                  ;num_done:
 38301                                          ;retn

 38303                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38304                                  ;
 38305                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 38306                                  ;
 38307                                  ;   INPUT
 38308                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38309                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38310                                  ;
 38311                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38312                                  ;       AL == next character
 38313                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 38314                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38315                                  ;
 38316                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38317                                  ;       AX
 38318                                  ;
 38319                                  ;   NOTES
 38320                                  ;       None
 38321                                  ;
 38322                                  ;   HISTORY
 38323                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38324                                  ;
 38325                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38326                                  
 38327                                  get_char:
 38328 0000408B 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 38329 0000408E 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 38330                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 38331 00004090 26                      	es	
 38332 00004091 AC                      	lodsb
 38333 00004092 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 38334 00004094 C3                              retn			;
 38335                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 38336 00004095 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 38337                                  nearby_ret:
 38338 00004098 C3                              retn

 38340                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38341                                  ;
 38342                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 38343                                  ;
 38344                                  ;   INPUT
 38345                                  ;       AL == current command code
 38346                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 38347                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 38348                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 38349                                  ;
 38350                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38351                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 38352                                  ;
 38353                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38354                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 38355                                  ;
 38356                                  ;   NOTES
 38357                                  ;       None
 38358                                  ;
 38359                                  ;   HISTORY
 38360                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38361                                  ;
 38362                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38363                                  
 38364                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38365                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 38366                                  
 38367                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38368                                  query_user:
 38369 00004099 F606[0347]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 38370                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38371 0000409E 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 38372 000040A0 E9B900                  	jmp	skip_all
 38373                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38374                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 38375                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 38376                                  qu_1:
 38377 000040A3 F606[0347]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 38378 000040A8 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 38379 000040AA 50                              push    ax                      ;
 38380 000040AB A0[B814]                        mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 38381 000040AE F606[0347]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 38382 000040B3 7506                            jnz	short query_all		; yes
 38383 000040B5 A880                            test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 38384                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38385 000040B7 7502                    	jnz	short query_all		;
 38386                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38387                                  	;;jmp	short do_cmd		;

 38389

 38392 000040BA C3                      	retn

 38394                                  query_all:
 38395                                  
 38396                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 38397                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 38398                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 38399                                  
 38400 000040BB 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 38401 000040BC BA[124D]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 38402 000040BF 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 38403 000040C1 7450                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 38404                                  
 38405 000040C3 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 38406 000040C5 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 38407 000040C7 BF[5047]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 38408                                  find_match:                             ;
 38409 000040CA 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 38410 000040CC 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 38411 000040CE 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 38412 000040D0 47                              inc     di                      ;
 38413 000040D1 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 38414 000040D3 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 38415 000040D5 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 38416                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 38417 000040D8 EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 38418                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 38419 000040DA 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 38420 000040DD B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 38421 000040DF B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 38422                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 38423 000040E1 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 38424 000040E3 47                              inc     di                      ;
 38425 000040E4 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 38426 000040E6 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 38427 000040E8 E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 38428 000040EA B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 38429 000040EC 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 38430 000040EF 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 38431 000040F1 B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 38432                                  cmd_notset:
 38433 000040F3 CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 38434                                  line_print:                             ;
 38435                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 38436 000040F5 26                              es
 38437 000040F6 AC                      	lodsb
 38438 000040F7 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 38439 000040F9 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 38440 000040FB B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 38441                                  non_null:                               ;
 38442 000040FD 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 38443 000040FF 720F                            jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 38444 00004101 7505                            jne	short non_space		;
 38445                                          ; 10/09/2023
 38446 00004103 263804                  	cmp	[es:si],al ; 20h
 38447                                  	;cmp	byte [es:si],' '	;
 38448 00004106 7208                            jb	short prompt_user	;
 38449                                  non_space:                              ;
 38450 00004108 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 38451 0000410A B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 38452 0000410C CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 38453 0000410E EBE5                            jmp	short line_print	;
 38454                                  
 38455                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 38456 00004110 BA[B04C]                        mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 38457                                  
 38458                                  generic_prompt:
 38459 00004113 E8BB03                          call    print                   ;
 38460                                  input_loop:                             ;
 38461 00004116 B400                            mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 38462 00004118 CD16                            int     16h                     ;
 38463 0000411A 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 38464 0000411C 750F                            jnz	short not_func		; no
 38465 0000411E 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 38466 00004121 75F3                            jne	short input_loop	; no
 38467 00004123 A0[BC4C]                        mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 38468 00004126 800E[0347]04                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 38469 0000412B EB21                            jmp     short legal_char        ;
 38470                                  not_func:
 38471 0000412D 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 38472 0000412F 3A06[BC4C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 38473 00004133 7419                            je	short legal_char	;
 38474 00004135 3A06[B84C]                      cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 38475 00004139 7413                            je	short legal_char	;
 38476 0000413B 803E[B814]00                    cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 38477 00004140 74D4                            je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 38478 00004142 3C1B                            cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 38479 00004144 75D0                            jne	short input_loop	;
 38480 00004146 800E[0347]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 38481 0000414B A0[B84C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]
 38482                                  legal_char:                             ;
 38483 0000414E E888FE                          call    disp_input              ;

 38561                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 38562                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables
 38563                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 38564                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 38565                                  
 38566                                  disable_autoexec:
 38567                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 38568                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 38569

 38577 000041AD BA4420                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 38578                                  dae_1:

 38582 000041B3 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; anything there?

 38587 000041BF 80C303                          add     bl,3                    ;

 38589 000041C5 7717                            ja	short disable_exit	;

 38757 00004246 06                      	push	es
 38758 00004247 1F                      	pop	ds

 38760                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38761

 38764                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG

 38766                                  ;else

 38771                                  	;xor	si, si

 38773                                  convloop:
 38774 0000424A AC                      	lodsb
 38775 0000424B 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 38776 0000424D 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 38777 0000424F 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 38778 00004251 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 38779 00004253 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 38780 00004255 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 38781                                  noconv:
 38782                                  
 38783                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38784                                  
 38785                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38786                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 38787                                  
 38788                                  ;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 38789                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 38790                                  ;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 38791                                  ;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 38792                                  ;
 38793 00004258 80FB56                  	cmp	bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 38794 0000425B 7504                    	jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 38795 0000425D 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 38796 0000425F 740A                    	je	short convdone		; yes
 38797                                  check_eol:

 38799 00004263 7406                    	je	short convdone

 38801 00004267 7402                    	je	short convdone
 38802                                  ;endif

 38928                                  ;
 38929                                  ; procedure : getnum
 38930                                  ;
 38931                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 38932                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 38933                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 38934                                  ;
 38935                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38936                                  
 38937                                  getnum:
 38938 000042E2 53                      	push	bx
 38939 000042E3 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 38940                                  b2:
 38941 000042E5 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 38942 000042E8 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 38943                                  
 38944 000042EA 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 38945 000042EB 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 38946                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 38947                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38948 000042EC B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 38949 000042EE F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 38950 000042F0 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 38951 000042F1 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 38952 000042F3 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 38953 000042F6 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 38954                                  
 38955 000042F8 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 38956                                  
 38957 000042F9 E830FF                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 38958 000042FC 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 38959 000042FE 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 38960 00004300 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 38961 00004302 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 38962 00004304 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 38963 00004306 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 38964 00004308 7417                    	je	short b15
 38965 0000430A 2E3A06[AE02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 38966 0000430F 7410                    	je	short b15
 38967 00004311 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 38968                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38969                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38970                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 38971                                  	;nop
 38972 00004313 740C                    	je	short b15
 38973 00004315 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 38974 00004317 7408                    	je	short b15
 38975 00004319 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 38976 0000431B 7404                    	je	short b15
 38977 0000431D 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 38978 0000431F 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 38979                                  b15:
 38980 00004321 2EFF06[5603]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 38981 00004326 2EFF0E[5A03]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 38982                                  b1:
 38983 0000432B 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 38984 0000432D 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 38985 0000432F 5B                      	pop	bx
 38986 00004330 C3                      	retn
 38987                                  badnum:
 38988                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38989                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 38990 00004331 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 38991                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 38992 00004333 2EA2[AE02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 38993 00004337 5B                      	pop	bx
 38994 00004338 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 38995 00004339 C3                      	retn
 38996

 39003                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 39004                                  ;	si = 0
 39005                                  ;	ax = country id
 39006                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 39007                                  ;	bx = file handle
 39008                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 39009                                  ;
 39010                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 39011                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 39012                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 39013                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 39014                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39015                                  
 39016                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39017                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 39018                                  
 39019                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39020                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4FCAh)

 39023 0000433B 50                      	push	ax

 39027 0000433F 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx

 39041

 39044 00004357 753A                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 39045

 39047 0000435C 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 39048 0000435F 7532                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 39049

 39052 00004364 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 39053 00004367 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.

 39055 0000436D 7224                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail

 39065 0000437B 5F                      	pop	di

 39068 0000437C 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 39069 0000437F 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 39070                                  
 39071                                  	;cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?

 39076 00004385 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 39077 00004388 7411                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it

 39156

 39164 0000440B 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.

 39262                                  getcountrydestination:
 39263                                  
 39264                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39265                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 39266                                  ;
 39267                                  ;input: al - data id
 39268                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 39269                                  ;on return:
 39270                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 39271                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 39272                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39273                                  
 39274                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39275                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)
 39276                                  
 39277                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39278                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:50F9h)
 39279                                  
 39280 0000445F 51                      	push	cx
 39281                                  	;add	di,74
 39282 00004460 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 39283                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 39284 00004463 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 39285 00004466 47                      	inc	di
 39286 00004467 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 39287                                  
 39288                                  getcntrydest:
 39289 00004468 263805                  	cmp	byte [es:di],al
 39290 0000446B 7413                    	je	short getcntrydest_ok
 39291                                  
 39292 0000446D 26803D01                	cmp	byte [es:di],SetCountryInfo ;was it setcountryinfo entry?
 39293 00004471 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 39294                                  
 39295 00004473 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 39296 00004476 EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 39297                                  
 39298                                  getcntrydest_1:
 39299                                  	;add	di,41
 39300 00004478 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 39301                                  getcntrydest_loop:
 39302 0000447B E2EB                    	loop	getcntrydest
 39303 0000447D F9                      	stc
 39304                                  	;jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 39305                                  getcntrydest_exit:
 39306                                  	; 10/09/2023
 39307 0000447E 59                      	pop	cx
 39308 0000447F C3                      	retn
 39309                                  
 39310                                  getcntrydest_ok:
 39311                                  	; 10/09/2023
 39312 00004480 47                      	inc	di
 39313                                  
 39314                                  ;	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;select country info?

 39318                                  ;	jmp	short getcntrydest_exit

 39329 00004488 59                      	pop	cx
 39330 00004489 C3                      	retn

 39332                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39333                                  
 39334                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 39335                                  
 39336                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39337                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 39338                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 39339                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 39340                                  ;
 39341                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 39342                                  ;	 be moved.
 39343                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 39344                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 39345                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 39346                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 39347                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 39348                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 39349                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39350                                  
 39351 0000448A 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 39352 0000448B B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 39353 0000448E F9                      	stc
 39354 0000448F CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 39355 00004491 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 39356 00004492 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 39357                                  
 39358 00004494 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 39359 00004496 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 39360 00004498 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 39361 0000449A F9                      	stc
 39362 0000449B CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 39363                                  ricb_exit:
 39364 0000449D C3                      	retn
 39365

 39368                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !
 39369                                  ; Erdogan Tan - 04/08/2023
 39370                                  %if 0
 39371                                  
 39372                                  set_country_path:
 39373                                  
 39374                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39375                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 39376                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 39377                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 39378                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 39379                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 39380                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 39381                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39382                                  
 39383                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39384                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 39385                                  
 39386                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39387                                  	; (Retrodos v5.0 Pre-Works)
 39388                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:513Bh)
 39389                                  
 39390                                  	push	si
 39391                                  
 39392                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 39393                                  	push	es
 39394                                  	pop	ds
 39395                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 39396                                  
 39397                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 39398                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 39399                                  
 39400                                  	mov	al,[si]
 39401                                  	inc	si
 39402                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 39403                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 39404                                  
 39405                                  scp_default_drv:
 39406                                  	mov	ah,19h
 39407                                  	int	21h
 39408                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 39409                                  
 39410                                  scp_setdrv:
 39411                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 39412                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 39413                                  	mov	al,[si]
 39414                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 39415                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 39416                                  
 39417                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 39418                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 39419                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 39420                                  	; 04/01/2023
 39421                                  	jne	short scp_path
 39422                                  
 39423                                  scp_root_dir:
 39424                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 39425                                  scp_path:
 39426                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 39427                                  
 39428                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 39429                                  scpath_exit:
 39430                                  
 39431                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 39432                                  	push	es
 39433                                  	pop	ds
 39434                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 39435                                  
 39436                                  	pop	si
 39437                                  	retn
 39438                                  
 39439                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39440                                  
 39441                                  chk_drive_letter:
 39442                                  
 39443                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 39444                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 39445                                  ;carry set if not.
 39446                                  
 39447                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 39448                                  
 39449                                  	push	ax
 39450                                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 39451                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 39452                                  	jb	short cdletter_exit
 39453                                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 39454                                  	ja	short cdletter_no
 39455                                  	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 39456                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 39457                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 39458                                  	; 04/01/2023
 39459                                  	je	short cdletter_exit
 39460                                  
 39461                                  cdletter_no:
 39462                                  	stc
 39463                                  cdletter_exit:
 39464                                  	pop	ax
 39465                                  	retn
 39466                                  
 39467                                  %endif
 39468

 39471                                  move_asciiz:
 39472                                  
 39473                                  ;in: ds:si -> source es:di -> target
 39474                                  ;out: copy the string until 0.
 39475                                  ;assumes there exists a 0.
 39476                                  
 39477                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39478                                  	; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4F40h)
 39479                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:5187h)
 39480                                  
 39481                                  masciiz_loop:
 39482                                  	; 10/09/2023
 39483 0000449E F604FF                  	test	byte [si],0FFh
 39484 000044A1 A4                      	movsb
 39485                                  	;cmp	byte [si-1],0	; was it 0?
 39486                                  	;jne	short masciiz_loop
 39487 000044A2 75FA                    	jnz	short masciiz_loop ; 10/09/2023

 39496                                  badfil:
 39497 000044A5 0E                      	push	cs
